K10bsu036_u:250: sucitracitrā ratanopaśobhitā buddhāśca dṛśyanti anantacakṣuṣaḥ // Saddhp_1.55 //
K10bsu036_u:251: pṛccheti maitreyu jinasya putra spṛhenti te naramaruyakṣarākṣasāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:252: catvārimā parṣa udīkṣamāṇā mañjusvaraḥ kiṃ nviha vyākariṣyati // Saddhp_1.56 //
K10bsu036_u:253: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ
K10bsu036_u:256: ca mahādharmolkāsaṃprajvālanaṃ ca mahādharmaśaṅkhābhiprapūraṇaṃ ca mahādharmabherīparāhaṇanaṃ
K10bsu036_u:257: ca mahādharmanirdeśaṃ ca adya kulaputrāstathāgatasya kartumabhiprāyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:259: yathā ca mayā pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmidamevaṃrūpaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭamabhūt,
K10bsu036_u:261: tenaivaṃ prajānāmi - mahādharmaśravaṇasāṃkathyaṃ tathāgataḥ kartukāmo mahādharmaśravaṇaṃ śrāvayitukāmaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:267: parataraṃ yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena candrasūryapradīpo nāma (Vaidya 12)
K10bsu036_u:268: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:269: sa dharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:270: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:271: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
K10bsu036_u:273: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma
K10bsu036_u:274: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
K10bsu036_u:275: pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /
K10bsu036_u:276: iti hi ajita etena paraṃparodāhāreṇa candrasūryapradīpanāmakānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ
K10bsu036_u:278: tatra ajita teṣāṃ viṃśatitathāgatasahasrāṇāṃ pūrvakaṃ tathāgatamupādāya yāvat paścimakastathāgataḥ,
K10bsu036_u:279: so 'pi candrasūryapradīpanāmadheya eva tathāgato 'bhūdarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K10bsu036_u:280: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:281: so 'pi dharmaṃ deśitavān ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:282: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
K10bsu036_u:283: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān
K10bsu036_u:285: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya sarvajñajñānaparyavasānaṃ dharma deśitavān //
K10bsu036_u:286: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:295: teṣāṃ khalu punarajita aṣṭānāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyaputrāṇāṃ vipularddhirabhūt /
K10bsu036_u:298: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:300: sadā ca brahmacāriṇo bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāśca te rājakumārā abhuvan //
K10bsu036_u:301: tena khalu punarajita samayena sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10bsu036_u:302: mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
K10bsu036_u:304: tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte tasminneva parṣatsaṃnipāte tasminneva mahādharmāsane
K10bsu036_u:307: samanantarasamāpannasya khalu punastasya bhagavato māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇāṃ ca divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ mahatpuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat
K10bsu036_u:309: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam /
K10bsu036_u:310: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
K10bsu036_u:313: te sarve saparivārāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ vyavalokayanti sma āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:314: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /
K10bsu036_u:316: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
K10bsu036_u:317: tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante //
K10bsu036_u:318: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan /
K10bsu036_u:320: te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ kautūhalasamutpannā etena mahāraśmyavabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā //
K10bsu036_u:321: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:323: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
K10bsu036_u:324: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena kāyena aniñjamānena cittena /
K10bsu036_u:325: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma /
K10bsu036_u:326: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt,
K10bsu036_u:329: taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ
K10bsu036_u:331: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
K10bsu036_u:332: purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti //
K10bsu036_u:333: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ
K10bsu036_u:334: nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ
K10bsu036_u:335: parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ
K10bsu036_u:339: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ
K10bsu036_u:340: taṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān /
K10bsu036_u:341: aśītiṃ cāntarakalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya śāsanaṃ sa varaprabho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāritavān saṃprakāśitavān /
K10bsu036_u:342: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,
K10bsu036_u:346: taiśca tataḥ paścādbahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭāni satkṛtāni ca /
K10bsu036_u:349: teṣāṃ ca aṣṭānāmantevāsiśatānāmeko bodhisattvo 'dhimātraṃ lābhaguruko 'bhūt satkāraguruko jñātaguruko yaśaskāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:353: ārāgayitvā ca satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitānyarcitānyapacāyitāni /
K10bsu036_u:354: syātkhalu punaste ajita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ
K10bsu036_u:357: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūddharmabhāṇakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:359: tvameva ajita sa tena kālena tena samayena yaśaskāmo nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt kausīdyaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:360: iti hi ajita ahamanena paryāyeṇedaṃ bhagavataḥ pūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃrūpāṃ raśmimutsṛṣṭāmevaṃ parimīmāṃse,
K10bsu036_u:361: yathā bhagavānapi taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:362: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:364: yadā jino āsi prajāna uttamaścandrasya sūryasya pradīpa nāma // Saddhp_1.57 //
K10bsu036_u:365: saddharma deśeti prajāna nāyako vineti sattvāna anantakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:368: ye cāṣṭa putrāstada tasya āsan kumārabhūtasya vināyakasya /
K10bsu036_u:369: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pravrajitaṃ mahāmuniṃ jahitva kāmāṃllaghu sarvi prāvrajan // Saddhp_1.59 //
K10bsu036_u:370: dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /
K10bsu036_u:371: nāmeva vaipulyamidaṃ pravucyati prakāśayī prāṇisahasrakoṭinām // Saddhp_1.60 //
K10bsu036_u:372: samanantaraṃ bhāṣiya so vināyakaḥ paryaṅka bandhitva kṣaṇasmi tasmin /
K10bsu036_u:373: anantanirdeśavaraṃ samādhiṃ dharmāsanastho muniśreṣṭha dhyāyī // Saddhp_1.61 //
K10bsu036_u:375: devāśca yakṣāśca sthitāntarīkṣe kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya // Saddhp_1.62 //
K10bsu036_u:376: sarvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pracacāla tatkṣaṇam āścaryamatyadbhutamāsi tatra /
K10bsu036_u:377: raśmiṃ ca ekāṃ pramumoca nāyako bhruvāntarāttāmatidarśanīyām // Saddhp_1.63 //
K10bsu036_u:378: pūrvāṃ ca gatvā diśa sā hi raśmiraṣṭādaśakṣetrasahasra pūrṇā /
K10bsu036_u:379: prabhāsayaṃ bhrājati sarvalokaṃ darśeti sattvāna cyutopapādam // Saddhp_1.64 //
K10bsu036_u:380: ratnāmayā kṣetra tathātra kecidvaiḍūryanirbhāsa tathaiva kecit /
K10bsu036_u:381: dṛśyanti citrā atidarśanīyā raśmiprabhāsena vināyakasya // Saddhp_1.65 //
K10bsu036_u:382: devā manuṣyāstatha nāga yakṣā gandharva tatrāpsarakinnarāśca /
K10bsu036_u:384: ye cābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya pūjayā dṛśyanti pūjenti ca lokadhātuṣu // Saddhp_1.66 //
K10bsu036_u:385: buddhāśca dṛśyanti svayaṃ svayaṃbhuvaḥ suvarṇayūpā iva darśanīyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:386: vaiḍūryamadhye ca suvarṇabimbaṃ parṣāya madhye pravadanti dharmam // Saddhp_1.67 //
K10bsu036_u:387: tahi śrāvakāṇāṃ gaṇanā na vidyate te cāpramāṇāḥ sugatasya śrāvakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:388: ekaikakṣetrasmi vināyakānāṃ raśmiprabhā darśayate hi sarvān // Saddhp_1.68 //
K10bsu036_u:390: dṛśyanti putrā naranāyakānāṃ viharanti ye parvatakandareṣu // Saddhp_1.69 //
K10bsu036_u:392: bahubodhisattvā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ sarve 'pi dṛśyanti tayā hi raśmyā // Saddhp_1.70 //
K10bsu036_u:393: aniñjamānāśca avedhamānāḥ kṣāntau sthitā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:394: dṛśyanti putrāḥ sugatasya aurasā dhyānena te prasthita agrabodhim // Saddhp_1.71 //
K10bsu036_u:395: bhūtaṃ padaṃ śāntamanāsravaṃ ca prajānamānāśca prakāśayanti /
K10bsu036_u:396: deśenti dharmaṃ bahulokadhātuṣu sugatānubhāvādiyamīdṛśī kriyā // Saddhp_1.72 //
K10bsu036_u:397: dṛṣṭvā ca tā parṣa catasra tāyinaścandrārkadīpasya imaṃ prabhāvam /
K10bsu036_u:398: harṣasthitāḥ sarvi bhavitva tatkṣaṇamanyonya pṛcchanti kathaṃ nu etat // Saddhp_1.73 //
K10bsu036_u:400: acirācca so naramaruyakṣapūjitaḥ samādhito vyutthita lokanāyakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:401: varaprabhaṃ putra tadādhyabhāṣata yo bodhisattvo vidu dharmabhāṇakaḥ // Saddhp_1.74 //
K10bsu036_u:402: lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /
K10bsu036_u:403: tvaṃ hyatra sākṣī mama dharmakośe yathāhu bhāṣiṣyi hitāya prāṇinām // Saddhp_1.75 //
K10bsu036_u:405: prabhāṣate tajjina agradharmān paripūrṇa so antarakalpa ṣaṣṭim // Saddhp_1.76 //
K10bsu036_u:406: yaṃ caiva so bhāṣati lokanātho ekāsanasthaḥ pravarāgradharmam /
K10bsu036_u:407: taṃ sarvamādhārayi so jinātmajo varaprabho yo abhu dharmabhāṇakaḥ // Saddhp_1.77 //
K10bsu036_u:408: so co jino bhāṣiya agradharmaṃ praharṣayitvā janatāmanekām /
K10bsu036_u:409: tasmiṃśca divase vadate sa nāyakaḥ purato hi lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_1.78 //
K10bsu036_u:410: prakāśitā me iya dharmanetrī ācakṣito dharmasvabhāva yādṛaśaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:411: nirvāṇakālo mama adya bhikṣavo rātrīya yāmasmiha madhyamasmin // Saddhp_1.79 //
K10bsu036_u:412: bhavathāpramattā adhimuktisārā abhiyujyathā mahya imasmi śāsane /
K10bsu036_u:413: sudurlabhā bhonti jinā maharṣayaḥ kalpāna koṭīnayutāna atyayāt // Saddhp_1.80 //
K10bsu036_u:416: śrutvāna ghoṣaṃ dvipadottamasya nirvāṇaśabdaṃ atikṣiprametat // Saddhp_1.81 //
K10bsu036_u:417: āśvāsayitvā ca narendrarājā tāḥ prāṇakoṭyo bahavo acintiyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:418: mā bhāyathā bhikṣava nirvṛte mayi bhaviṣyatha buddha mamottareṇa // Saddhp_1.82 //
K10bsu036_u:419: śrīgarbha eṣo vidu bodhisattvo gatiṃ gato jñāni anāsravasmin /
K10bsu036_u:420: spṛśiṣyate uttamamagrabodhiṃ vimalāgranetro ti jino bhaviṣyati // Saddhp_1.83 //
K10bsu036_u:421: tāmeva rātriṃ tada yāmi madhyame parinirvṛto hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:422: śarīra vaistāriku tasya cābhūt stūpāna koṭīnayutā anantakā // Saddhp_1.84 //
K10bsu036_u:423: bhikṣuśca tatrā tatha bhikṣuṇīyo ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /
K10bsu036_u:424: analpakāste yatha gaṅgabālikā abhiyukta tasyo sugatasya śāsane // Saddhp_1.85 //
K10bsu036_u:425: yaścāpi bhikṣustada dharmabhāṇako varaprabho yena sa dharma dhāritaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:426: aśīti so antarakalpa pūrṇāṃ tahi śāsane bhāṣati agradharmān // Saddhp_1.86 //
K10bsu036_u:427: aṣṭāśataṃ tasya abhūṣi śiṣyāḥ paripācitā ye tada tena sarve /
K10bsu036_u:428: dṛṣṭā ca tebhirbahubuddhakoṭyaḥ satkāru teṣāṃ ca kṛto maharṣiṇām // Saddhp_1.87 //
K10bsu036_u:429: caryāṃ caritvā tada ānulomikīṃ buddhā abhūvan bahulokadhātuṣu
K10bsu036_u:430: parasparaṃ te ca anantareṇa anyonya vyākarṣu tadāgrabodhaye // Saddhp_1.88 //
K10bsu036_u:432: teṣāṃ ca buddhāna paraṃpareṇa dīpaṃkaraḥ paścimako abhūṣi /
K10bsu036_u:434: yaścāsi tasyo sugatātmajasya varaprabhasyo tada dharma bhāṣataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:435: śiṣyaḥ kusīdaśca sa lolupātmā lābhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_1.90 //
K10bsu036_u:437: uddeśa svādhyāyu tathāsya sarvo na tiṣṭhate bhāṣitu tasmi kāle // Saddhp_1.91 //
K10bsu036_u:438: nāmaṃ ca tasyo imamevamāsīd yaśakāmanāmnā diśatāsu viśrutaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:439: sa cāpi tenākuśalena karmaṇā kalmāṣabhūtenabhisaṃskṛtena // Saddhp_1.92 //
K10bsu036_u:440: ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāmakārṣīt /
K10bsu036_u:441: cīrṇā ca caryā vara ānulomikī dṛṣṭaśca buddho ayu śākyasiṃhaḥ // Saddhp_1.93 //
K10bsu036_u:442: ayaṃ ca so paścimako bhaviṣyati anuttarāṃ lapsyati cāgrabodhim /
K10bsu036_u:443: maitreyagotro bhagavān bhaviṣyati vineṣyati prāṇasahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_1.94 //
K10bsu036_u:444: kausīdyaprāptastada yo babhūva parinirvṛtasya sugatasya śāsane /

K10bsu036_u:446: imena haṃ kāraṇahetunādya dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ idamevarūpam /

K10bsu036_u:450: tameva yaṃ icchati bhāṣaṇāya paryāyamagraṃ tadadyo mayā śrutaḥ // Saddhp_1.97 //
K10bsu036_u:452: saṃsthāpanaṃ kurvati śākyasiṃho bhāṣiṣyate dharmasvabhāvamudrām // Saddhp_1.98 //
K10bsu036_u:453: prayatā sucittā bhavathā kṛtāñjalī bhāṣiṣyate lokahitānukampī /

K10bsu036_u:455: yeṣāṃ ca saṃdehagatīha kācid ye saṃśayā yā vicikitsa kācit /
K10bsu036_u:456: vyapaneṣyate tā vidurātmajānāṃ ye bodhisattvā iha bodhiprasthitāḥ // Saddhp_1.100 //
K10bsu036_u:460: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃstataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:461: vyutthāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - gambhīraṃ śāriputra durdṛśaṃ duranubodhaṃ buddhajñānaṃ tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ
K10bsu036_u:473: alaṃ śāriputra etāvadeva bhāṣituṃ bhavatu - paramāścaryaprāptāḥ śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:474: tathāgata eva śāriputra tathāgatasya dharmān deśayet,
K10bsu036_u:483: ye ca yathā ca yādṛśāśca yallakṣaṇāśca yatsvabhāvāśca te dharmā iti /
K10bsu036_u:485: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:487: na śakyaṃ sarvaśo jñātuṃ sarvasattvairvināyakāḥ // Saddhp_2.1 //
K10bsu036_u:488: balā vimokṣā ye teṣāṃ vaiśāradyāśca yādṛśāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:489: yādṛśā buddhadharmāśca na śakyaṃ jñātu kenacit // Saddhp_2.2 //
K10bsu036_u:491: gambhīrā caiva sūkṣmā ca durvijñeyā sudurdṛśā // Saddhp_2.3 //
K10bsu036_u:493: phalaṃ me bodhimaṇḍasmin dṛṣṭaṃ yādṛśakaṃ hi tat // Saddhp_2.4 //
K10bsu036_u:494: ahaṃ ca tatprajānāmi ye cānye lokanāyakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:495: yathā yad yādṛśaṃ cāpi lakṣaṇaṃ cāsya yādṛśam // Saddhp_2.5 //
K10bsu036_u:497: na taddarśayituṃ śakyaṃ vyāhāro 'sya na vidyate /
K10bsu036_u:498: nāpyasau tādṛśaḥ kaścit sattvo lokasmi vidyate // Saddhp_2.6 //
K10bsu036_u:499: yasya taṃ deśayeddharma deśitaṃ cāpi jāniyāt /
K10bsu036_u:500: anyatra bodhisattvebhyo adhimuktīya ye sthitāḥ // Saddhp_2.7 //
K10bsu036_u:501: ye cāpi te lokavidusya śrāvakāḥ kṛtādhikārāḥ sugatānuvarṇitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:502: kṣīṇāsravā antimadehadhāriṇo na teṣa viṣayo 'sti jināna jñāne // Saddhp_2.8 //
K10bsu036_u:503: sa caiva sarvā iya lokadhātu pūrṇā bhavecchārisutopamānām /
K10bsu036_u:504: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānaṃ na hi śakya jānitum // Saddhp_2.9 //
K10bsu036_u:505: saceha tvaṃ sādṛśakehi paṇḍitaiḥ pūrṇā bhaveyurdaśā pi ddiśāyo /
K10bsu036_u:506: ye cāpi mahyaṃ imi śrāvakānye teṣāṃ pi pūrṇā bhavi evameva // Saddhp_2.10 //
K10bsu036_u:507: ekībhavitvāna ca te 'dya sarve vicintayeyuḥ sugatasya jñānam /
K10bsu036_u:508: na śakta sarve sahitā pi jñātuṃ yathāprameyaṃ mama buddhajñānam // Saddhp_2.11 //
K10bsu036_u:510: diśo daśaḥ sarva bhaveyuḥ pūrṇā yathā naḍānāṃ vanaveṇunāṃ vā // Saddhp_2.12 //
K10bsu036_u:512: kalpāna koṭīnayutānanantānna tasya bhūtaṃ parijāni artham // Saddhp_2.13 //
K10bsu036_u:515: suviniścitārthā bahudharmabhāṇakāsteṣāṃ pi pūrṇā daśimā diśo bhavet // Saddhp_2.14 //
K10bsu036_u:516: naḍāna veṇūna va nityakālamacchidrapūrṇo bhavi sarvalokaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:517: ekībhavitvāna vicintayeyuryo dharma sākṣāt sugatena dṛṣṭaḥ // Saddhp_2.15 //
K10bsu036_u:518: anucintayitvā bahukalpakoṭyo gaṅgā yathā vālika aprameyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:519: ananyacittāḥ sukhumāya prajñayā teṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate // Saddhp_2.16 //
K10bsu036_u:520: avivartikā ye bhavi bodhisattvā analpakā yathariva gaṅgavālikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:521: ananyacittāśca vicintayeyusteṣāṃ pi cāsmin viṣayo na vidyate // Saddhp_2.17 //
K10bsu036_u:522: gambhīra dharmā sukhumā pi buddhā atarkikāḥ sarvi anāsravāśca /
K10bsu036_u:523: ahaṃ ca jānāmiha yādṛśā hi te te vā jinā loki daśaddiśāsu // Saddhp_2.18 //
K10bsu036_u:524: yaṃ śāriputro sugataḥ prabhāṣate adhimuktisaṃpanna bhavāhi tatra /
K10bsu036_u:525: ananyathāvādi jino maharṣī cireṇa pī bhāṣati uttamārtham // Saddhp_2.19 //
K10bsu036_u:526: āmantrayāmī imi sarvaśrāvakān pratyekabodhāya ca ye 'bhiprasthitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:527: saṃsthāpitā ye maya nirvṛtīya saṃmokṣitā duḥkhaparaṃparātaḥ // Saddhp_2.20 //
K10bsu036_u:528: upāyakauśalya mametadagraṃ bhāṣāmi dharmaṃ bahu yena loke /
K10bsu036_u:529: tahiṃ tahiṃ lagna pramocayāmi trīṇī ca yānānyupadarśayāmi // Saddhp_2.21 //
K10bsu036_u:531: atha khalu ye tatra parṣatsaṃnipāte mahāśrāvakā ājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhā arhantaḥ
K10bsu036_u:532: kṣīṇāsravā dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni ye cānye śrāvakayānikā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā
K10bsu036_u:534: teṣāṃ sarveṣāmetadabhavat - ko nu hetuḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ yad bhagavānadhimātramupāyakauśalyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ saṃvarṇayati?
K10bsu036_u:539: asya ca vayaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtha na jānīmaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:540: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vicikitsākathaṃkathāṃ viditvā
K10bsu036_u:541: cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya ātmanā ca dharmasaṃśayaprāptastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:543: kaḥ pratyayo yad bhagavānadhimātraṃ punaḥ punastathāgatānāmupāyakauśalyajñānadarśanadharmadeśanāṃ saṃvarṇayati - gambhīraśca me dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti /
K10bsu036_u:544: durvijñeyaṃ ca saṃghābhāṣyamiti punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇayati /
K10bsu036_u:545: na ca me bhagavato 'ntikādevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:547: tatsādhu bhagavānnirdiśatu yatsaṃghāya tathāgato gambhīrasya tathāgatadharmasya punaḥ punaḥ saṃvarṇanāṃ karoti //
K10bsu036_u:548: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:550: balā vimokṣā dhyānāśca aprameyā mi sparśitāḥ // Saddhp_2.22 //
K10bsu036_u:551: bodhimaṇḍaṃ ca kīrtesi pṛcchakaste na vidyate /
K10bsu036_u:552: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ ca kīrtesi na ca tvāṃ kaści pṛcchati // Saddhp_2.23 //
K10bsu036_u:554: jñānādhigama kīrtesi gambhīraṃ ca prabhāṣase // Saddhp_2.24 //
K10bsu036_u:556: nirvāṇaṃ prasthitā ye ca kimetad bhāṣate jinaḥ // Saddhp_2.25 //
K10bsu036_u:558: devā nāgāśca yakṣāśca gandharvāśca mahoragāḥ // Saddhp_2.26 //
K10bsu036_u:563: mamāpi saṃśayo hyatra svake sthāne narottama /
K10bsu036_u:564: kiṃ niṣṭhā mama nirvāṇe atha caryā mi darśitā // Saddhp_2.29 //
K10bsu036_u:566: pramuñca ghoṣaṃ varadundubhisvarā udāharasvā yatha eṣa dharmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:567: ime sthitā putra jinasya aurasā vyavalokayantaśca kṛtāñjalī jinam // Saddhp_2.30 //
K10bsu036_u:568: devāśca nāgāśca sayakṣarākṣasāḥ koṭīsahasrā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:569: ye cāpi prārthenti samagrabodhiṃ sahasraśītiḥ paripūrṇa ye sthitāḥ // Saddhp_2.31 //
K10bsu036_u:570: rājāna ye mahipati cakravartino ye āgatāḥ kṣetrasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:571: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sagauravāḥ sthitāḥ kathaṃ nu caryāṃ paripūrayema // Saddhp_2.32 //
K10bsu036_u:575: utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ sadevako loko 'sminnarthe vyākriyamāṇe /
K10bsu036_u:576: dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān,
K10bsu036_u:579: santi bhagavaṃstasyāṃ parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pūrvabuddhadarśāvīni
K10bsu036_u:580: yāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti //
K10bsu036_u:582: vispaṣṭu bhāṣasva jināna uttamā santīha parṣāya sahasra prāṇinām /
K10bsu036_u:583: śrāddhāḥ prasannāḥ sugate sagauravā jñāsyanti ye dharmamudāhṛtaṃ te // Saddhp_2.33 //
K10bsu036_u:584: atha khalu bhagavān dvaitīyakamapyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - alaṃ śāriputra anenārthena prakāśitena /
K10bsu036_u:585: utrasiṣyati śāriputra ayaṃ sadevako loko 'sminnarthe vyākriyamāṇe /
K10bsu036_u:588: alaṃ hi dharmeṇiha bhāṣitena sūkṣmaṃ idaṃ jñānamatarkikaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:589: abhimānaprāptā bahu santi bālā nirdiṣṭadharmasmi kṣipe ajānakāḥ // Saddhp_2.34 //
K10bsu036_u:591: traitīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma - bhāṣatāṃ bhagavān,
K10bsu036_u:593: mādṛśānāṃ bhagavanniha parṣadi bahūni prāṇiśatāni saṃvidyante,
K10bsu036_u:594: anyāni ca bhagavan bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:596: tāni bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śraddhāsyanti pratīyiṣyanti udgahīṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:598: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:599: bhāṣasva dharmaṃ dvipadānamuttamā ahaṃ tvāmadhyeṣami jyeṣṭhaputraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:600: santīha prāṇīna sahasrakoṭayo ye śraddadhāsyanti te dharma bhāṣitam // Saddhp_2.35 //
K10bsu036_u:601: ye ca tvayā pūrvabhaveṣu nityaṃ paripācitāḥ sattva sudīrgharātram /
K10bsu036_u:602: kṛtāñjalī te pi sthitātra sarve ye śraddadhāsyanti tavaita dharmam // Saddhp_2.36 //
K10bsu036_u:603: asmādṛśā dvādaśime śatāśca ye cāpi te prasthita agrabodhaye /
K10bsu036_u:604: tān paśyamānaḥ sugataḥ prabhāṣatāṃ teṣāṃ ca harṣaṃ paramaṃ janetu // Saddhp_2.37 //
K10bsu036_u:605: atha khalu bhagavāṃstraitīyakamapyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yadidānīṃ tvaṃ śāriputra yāvatraitīyakamapi tathāgatamadhyeṣase /
K10bsu036_u:608: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K10bsu036_u:611: atha khalu tataḥ parṣada ābhimānikānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāmupāsakānāmupāsikānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:612: pañcamātrāṇi sahasrāṇyutthāya āsanebhyo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā tataḥ
K10bsu036_u:615: te ātmānaṃ savraṇaṃ jñātvā tataḥ parṣado 'pakrāntāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:617: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - nippalāvā me śāriputra parṣat apagataphalguḥ śraddhāsāre pratiṣṭhitā /
K10bsu036_u:622: bhagavānetadavocat - kadācit karhicicchāriputra tathāgata evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati /
K10bsu036_u:623: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra udumbarapuṣpaṃ kadācit karhicit saṃdṛśyate,
K10bsu036_u:624: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pi kadācit karhicit evaṃrūpāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kathayati /
K10bsu036_u:634: ekakṛtyena śāriputra ekakaraṇīyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate mahākṛtyena mahākaraṇīyena /
K10bsu036_u:635: katamaṃ ca śāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyaṃ yena kṛtyena tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate?
K10bsu036_u:636: yadidaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanasamādāpanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
K10bsu036_u:638: tathāgatajñānadarśanāvatāraṇahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
K10bsu036_u:639: tathāgatajñānapratibodhanahetunimittaṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /
K10bsu036_u:641: idaṃ tacchāriputra tathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyamekaprayojanaṃ loke prādurbhāvāya /
K10bsu036_u:642: iti hi śāriputra yattathāgatasya ekakṛtyamekakaraṇīyaṃ mahākṛtyaṃ mahākaraṇīyam,
K10bsu036_u:650: ekamevāhaṃ śāriputra yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharma deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānam /
K10bsu036_u:651: na kiṃcicchāriputra dvitīyaṃ vā tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate /
K10bsu036_u:656: samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya
K10bsu036_u:657: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:658: ye nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:659: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśitavantaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:664: yairapi śāriputra sattvaisteṣāmatītānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt saddharmaḥ śrutaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:667: ye 'pi te śāriputra anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
K10bsu036_u:668: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai
K10bsu036_u:669: mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
K10bsu036_u:670: ye ca nānābhirnihāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:671: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,
K10bsu036_u:675: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:677: ye 'pi te śāriputra etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti ghriyante yāpayanti,
K10bsu036_u:678: dharmaṃ ca deśayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanahitāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
K10bsu036_u:680: te 'pi sarve śāriputra buddhā bhagavanta ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,
K10bsu036_u:684: ye 'pi te śāriputra sattvāsteṣāṃ pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikāt taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti,
K10bsu036_u:686: ahamapi śāriputra etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya
K10bsu036_u:687: lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nānābhinirhāranirdeśavividhahetukāraṇanidarśanārambaṇaniruktyupāyakauśalyairnānādhimuktānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:689: ahamapi śāriputra ekameva yānamārabhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi yadidaṃ buddhayānaṃ sarvajñatāparyavasānam,

K10bsu036_u:1071: virajā ca nāmnā tada lokadhātuḥ kṣetraṃ viśuddhaṃ dvipadottamasya // Saddhp_3.25 //
K10bsu036_u:1075: ye śikṣitā buddhaśateṣu caryāṃ te tatra kṣetre upapadya santi // Saddhp_3.27 //
K10bsu036_u:1078: sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
K10bsu036_u:1079: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati // Saddhp_3.29 //
K10bsu036_u:1080: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
K10bsu036_u:1081: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_3.30 //
K10bsu036_u:1083: saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
K10bsu036_u:1084: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam // Saddhp_3.31 //
K10bsu036_u:1085: etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
K10bsu036_u:1086: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ // Saddhp_3.32 //
K10bsu036_u:1089: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1090: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1093: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma /
K10bsu036_u:1094: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam
K10bsu036_u:1095: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
K10bsu036_u:1096: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:1102: na cāyamīdṛśo dharmaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ kadācana // Saddhp_3.35 //
K10bsu036_u:1104: yathārtho vyākṛto hyeṣa śāriputro viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_3.36 //
K10bsu036_u:1108: ārāgitaśca yadbuddhaḥ prārthanā bhotu bodhaye // Saddhp_3.38 //
K10bsu036_u:1110: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - niṣkāṅkṣo 'smi bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:1111: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni
K10bsu036_u:1112: evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1114: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:1117: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ //
K10bsu036_u:1118: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1120: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ deśayati /
K10bsu036_u:1122: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham /
K10bsu036_u:1125: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade
K10bsu036_u:1126: vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo
K10bsu036_u:1128: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ
K10bsu036_u:1134: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1135: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā /
K10bsu036_u:1137: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt
K10bsu036_u:1139: evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ nirdhāvitum /
K10bsu036_u:1140: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
K10bsu036_u:1141: imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti nodvegamāpadyante,
K10bsu036_u:1142: saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti,
K10bsu036_u:1145: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1147: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam /
K10bsu036_u:1148: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva /
K10bsu036_u:1153: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1158: atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante,
K10bsu036_u:1160: nāpi jānanti na vijānanti kimetadādīptaṃ nāmeti /
K10bsu036_u:1165: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam /
K10bsu036_u:1166: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe /
K10bsu036_u:1170: teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni,
K10bsu036_u:1172: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
K10bsu036_u:1177: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1179: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:1183: atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:1184: kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā tasmādādīptādagārāt kṣipramevārabdhavīryā
K10bsu036_u:1185: balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1187: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1188: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman,
K10bsu036_u:1189: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta tāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyāni /
K10bsu036_u:1191: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān (Vaidya 53)
K10bsu036_u:1198: tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca /
K10bsu036_u:1199: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmanyairyānairdattairiti /
K10bsu036_u:1204: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam /
K10bsu036_u:1208: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1209: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt,
K10bsu036_u:1210: yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni,
K10bsu036_u:1214: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1218: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt,
K10bsu036_u:1219: tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1221: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti
K10bsu036_u:1222: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1223: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni,
K10bsu036_u:1226: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
K10bsu036_u:1237: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1238: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:1239: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:1241: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti
K10bsu036_u:1242: na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
K10bsu036_u:1245: tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti //
K10bsu036_u:1246: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - ahaṃ khalveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pitā /
K10bsu036_u:1247: mayā hyete sattvā asmādevaṃrūpānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayitavyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1251: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - sacedahaṃ jñānabalo 'smīti kṛtvā ṛddhibalo 'smīti kṛtvā anupāyenaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānabalavaiśāradyāni
K10bsu036_u:1254: adhyavasitā hyamī sattvāḥ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣu traidhātukaratyām /
K10bsu036_u:1258: tatra śāriputra tathāgato yadyathāpi nāma sa puruṣo bāhubalikaḥ sthāpayitvā bāhubalam,
K10bsu036_u:1260: niṣkāsayitvā sa teṣāṃ paścādudārāṇi mahāyānāni dadyāt,
K10bsu036_u:1262: upāyakauśalyajñānenādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣkāsanahetostrīṇi yānānyupadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
K10bsu036_u:1264: evaṃ caiṣāṃ vadati - mā bhavanto 'sminnādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramadhvaṃ hīneṣu rūpaśabdagandharasasparśeṣu /
K10bsu036_u:1265: atra hi yūyaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiratāḥ pañcakāmaguṇasahagatayā tṛṣṇayā dahyatha tapyatha paritapyatha /
K10bsu036_u:1267: trīṇi yānānyanuprāpsyatha yadidaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
K10bsu036_u:1271: evaṃ caitāṃllobhayāmi - etāni bhoḥ sattvā yāni āryāṇi ca āryapraśastāni ca mahāramaṇīyakasamanvāgatāni ca /
K10bsu036_u:1276: tatra śāriputra ye sattvāḥ paṇḍitajātīyā bhavanti,
K10bsu036_u:1281: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā mṛgarathamākāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1282: anye sattvā anācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ damaśamathamākāṅkṣamāṇā ātmaparinirvāṇahetorhetupratyayānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante,
K10bsu036_u:1284: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā ajarathamāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1285: apare punaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamanācāryakaṃ jñānamākāṅkṣamāṇā
K10bsu036_u:1286: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
K10bsu036_u:1292: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sa puruṣastān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānnirdhāvitān
K10bsu036_u:1293: dṛṣṭvā kṣemasvastibhyāṃ parimuktānabhayaprāptāniti viditvā ātmānaṃ ca mahādhanaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1295: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā paśyati - anekāḥ sattvakoṭīstraidhātukāt
K10bsu036_u:1299: tānetān śāriputra tasmin samaye tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prabhūto mahājñānabalavaiśāradyakośa
K10bsu036_u:1300: iti viditvā sarve caite mamaiva putrā iti jñātvā buddhayānenaiva tān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
K10bsu036_u:1301: na ca kasyacit sattvasya pratyātmikaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadati /
K10bsu036_u:1304: ye cāpi te śāriputra sattvāstraidhātukāt parimuktā bhavanti,
K10bsu036_u:1305: teṣāṃ tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīrāryāṇi paramasukhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakāni dadāti,
K10bsu036_u:1307: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:1308: yena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā teṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekameva mahāyānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dattaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1309: saptaratnamayaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitamekavarṇameva udārayānameva sarveṣāmagrayānameva dattaṃ bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1310: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho na mṛṣāvādī bhavati,
K10bsu036_u:1311: yena pūrvamupāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścānmahāyānenaiva sattvān parinirvāpayati /
K10bsu036_u:1313: tathāgato hi śāriputra prabhūtajñānabalavaiśāradyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ pratibalaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvajñajñānasahagataṃ (Vaidya 56)
K10bsu036_u:1317: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:1318: yathā hi puruṣasya bhavedagāraṃ jīrṇaṃ mahantaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:1319: viśīrṇa prāsādu tathā bhaveta stambhāśca mūleṣu bhaveyu pūtikāḥ // Saddhp_3.39 //
K10bsu036_u:1320: gavākṣaharmyā galitaikadeśā viśīrṇa kuḍayaṃ kaṭalepanaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:1321: jīrṇu pravṛddhoddhṛtavedikaṃ ca tṛṇacchadaṃ sarvata opatantam // Saddhp_3.40 //
K10bsu036_u:1322: śatāna pañcāna anūnakānāṃ āvāsu so tatra bhaveta prāṇinām /
K10bsu036_u:1323: bahūni cā niṣkuṭasaṃkaṭāni uccārapūrṇāni jugupsitāni // Saddhp_3.41 //
K10bsu036_u:1324: gopānasī vigalita tatra sarvā kuḍayāśca bhittīśca tathaiva srastāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1325: gṛdhrāṇa koṭyo nivasanti tatra pārāvatolūka tathānyapakṣiṇaḥ // Saddhp_3.42 //
K10bsu036_u:1326: āśīviṣā dāruṇa tatra santi deśapradeśeṣu mahāviṣogrāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1327: vicitrikā vṛścikamūṣikāśca etāna āvāsu suduṣṭaprāṇinām // Saddhp_3.43 //
K10bsu036_u:1328: deśe ca deśe amanuṣya bhūyo uccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:1329: kṛmikīṭakhadyotakapūritaṃ ca śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiśca nināditaṃ ca // Saddhp_3.44 //
K10bsu036_u:1330: bheruṇḍakā dāruṇā tatra santi manuṣyakuṇapāni ca bhakṣayantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1331: teṣāṃ ca niryāṇu pratīkṣamāṇāḥ śvānāḥ śṛgālāśca vasantyaneke // Saddhp_3.45 //
K10bsu036_u:1333: te durbalā nitya kṣudhābhibhūtā deśeṣu deśeṣu vikhādamānāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1334: kalahaṃ karontāśca ninādayanti subhairavaṃ tadgṛhamevarūpam // Saddhp_3.46 //

K10bsu036_u:1514: udyānabhūmī narako 'sya bhoti niveśanaṃ tasya apāyabhūmiḥ /

K10bsu036_u:1517: parapreṣya so bhoti daridra nityaṃ tatkāli tasyābharaṇānimāni // Saddhp_3.132 //
K10bsu036_u:1518: vastrāṇi co vyādhayu bhonti tasya vraṇāna koṭīnayutāśca kāye /
K10bsu036_u:1519: vicarcikā kaṇḍu tathaiva pāmā kuṣṭhaṃ kilāsaṃ tatha āmagandhaḥ // Saddhp_3.133 //
K10bsu036_u:1520: satkāyadṛṣṭiśca ghanāsya bhoti udīryate krodhabalaṃ ca tasya /
K10bsu036_u:1521: saṃrāgu tasyātibhṛśaṃ ca bhoti tiryāṇa yonīṣu ca so sadā ramī // Saddhp_3.134 //
K10bsu036_u:1522: sacedahaṃ śārisutādya tasya paripūrṇakalpaṃ pravadeya doṣān /
K10bsu036_u:1523: yo hī mamā etu kṣipeta sūtraṃ paryantu doṣāṇa na śakya gantum // Saddhp_3.135 //
K10bsu036_u:1525: saṃpaśyamāno idameva cārthaṃ tvāṃ saṃdiśāmī ahu śāriputra /
K10bsu036_u:1526: mā haiva tvaṃ bālajanasya agrato bhāṣiṣyase sūtramimevarūpam // Saddhp_3.136 //
K10bsu036_u:1527: ye tū iha vyakta bahuśrutāśca smṛtimanta ye paṇḍita jñānavantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1528: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ tān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat // Saddhp_3.137 //
K10bsu036_u:1529: dṛṣṭāśca yehī bahubuddhakoṭyaḥ kuśalaṃ ca yai ropitamaprameyam /
K10bsu036_u:1530: adhyāśayāścā dṛḍha yeṣa co syāttān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat // Saddhp_3.138 //
K10bsu036_u:1531: ye vīryavantaḥ sada maitracittā bhāventi maitrīmiha dīrgharātram /
K10bsu036_u:1532: utsṛṣṭakāyā tatha jīvite ca teṣāmidaṃ sūtra bhaṇeḥ samakṣam // Saddhp_3.139 //
K10bsu036_u:1533: anyonyasaṃkalpa sagauravāśca teṣāṃ ca bālehi na saṃstavo 'sti /
K10bsu036_u:1534: ye cāpi tuṣṭā girikandareṣu tān śrāvayestvaṃ ida sūtra bhadrakam // Saddhp_3.140 //
K10bsu036_u:1536: yānīdṛśān paśyasi buddhaputrāṃsteṣāmidaṃ sūtra prakāśayesi // Saddhp_3.141 //
K10bsu036_u:1538: paśyesi yānīdṛśa buddhaputrāṃsteṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.142 //
K10bsu036_u:1539: akrodhanā ye sada ārjavāśca kṛpāsamanvāgata sarvaprāṇiṣu /
K10bsu036_u:1541: sagauravā ye sugatasya antike teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.143 //
K10bsu036_u:1542: yo dharmu bhāṣe pariṣāya madhye asaṅgaprāpto vadi yuktamānasaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1544: mūrdhnāñjaliṃ yaśca karoti baddhvā sarvajñabhāvaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1545: daśo diśo yo 'pi ca caṃkrameta subhāṣitaṃ bhikṣu gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_3.145 //
K10bsu036_u:1546: vaipulyasūtrāṇi ca dhārayeta na cāsya rucyanti kadācidanye /
K10bsu036_u:1547: ekāṃ pi gāthāṃ na ca dhāraye 'nyatastaṃ śrāvayestvaṃ varasūtrametat // Saddhp_3.146 //
K10bsu036_u:1548: tathāgatasyo yatha dhātu dhārayettathaiva yo mārgati koci taṃ naraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1549: emeva yo mārgati sūtramīdṛśaṃ labhitva yo mūrdhani dhārayeta // Saddhp_3.147 //
K10bsu036_u:1550: anyeṣu sūtreṣu na kāci cintā lokāyatairanyataraiśca śāstraiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1551: bālāna etādṛśa bhonti gocarāstāṃstvaṃ vivarjitva prakāśayeridam // Saddhp_3.148 //
K10bsu036_u:1552: pūrṇaṃ pi kalpaṃ ahu śāriputra vadeyamākāra sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1553: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.149 //
K10bsu036_u:1557: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca
K10bsu036_u:1558: mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ imamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamāyuṣmataśca
K10bsu036_u:1559: śāriputrasya vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā
K10bsu036_u:1561: upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
K10bsu036_u:1563: praṇatakāyāstasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocan - vayaṃ hi bhagavan jīrṇā vṛddhā
K10bsu036_u:1564: mahallakā asmin bhikṣusaṃghe sthavirasaṃmatā jarājīrṇībhūtā nirvāṇaprāptāḥ sma iti
K10bsu036_u:1569: vayaṃ ca tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavāmaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1570: tadāpyasmākaṃ bhagavan ciraṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ bhagavantaṃ ciraṃ paryupāsitānāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni duḥkhanti,
K10bsu036_u:1572: tato vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayamānasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ sarvamāviṣkurmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1573: nāsmābhireṣu buddhadharmeṣu buddhakṣetravyūheṣu vā bodhisattvavikrīḍiteṣu vā tathāgatavikrīḍiteṣu vā spṛhotpāditā /
K10bsu036_u:1577: tato bhagavan asmābhirapyanye bodhisattvā avavaditā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:1580: te vayaṃ bhagavannetarhi bhagavato 'ntikācchrāvakāṇāmapi vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhavatīti śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāptā mahālābhaprāptāḥ smaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1581: bhagavannadya sahasaivemamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ tathāgataghoṣaṃ śrutvā mahāratnapratilabdhāśca smaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1583: bhagavan amārgitamaparyeṣṭamacintitamaprārthitaṃ cāsmābhirbhagavannidamevaṃ rūpaṃ mahāratnaṃ pratilabdham /
K10bsu036_u:1586: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ piturantikādapakrāmet /
K10bsu036_u:1588: sa tatra bahūni varṣāṇi vipravased viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā /
K10bsu036_u:1589: atha sa bhagavan mahān puruṣo bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1591: sa ca vṛttiṃ paryeṣamāṇa āhāracīvarahetordiśo vidiśaḥ prakāman anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ gacchet /
K10bsu036_u:1592: tasya ca sa pitā anyatamaṃ janapadaṃ prakrāntaḥ syāt /
K10bsu036_u:1604: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret
K10bsu036_u:1606: evaṃ ca cintayet - ahamasmi jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1611: sa taṃ punaḥ punaḥ putramanusmaret - aho nāmāhaṃ nirvṛtiprāpto bhaveyaṃ yadi me sa putra imaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ paribhuñjīta //
K10bsu036_u:1612: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena tasya
K10bsu036_u:1614: atha khalu bhagavan sa tasya daridrapuruṣasya pitā svake niveśanadvāre mahatyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrapariṣadā
K10bsu036_u:1615: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto mahāsiṃhāsane sapādapīṭhe suvarṇarūpyapratimaṇḍite upaviṣṭo hiraṇyakoṭīśatasahasrairvyavahāraṃ
K10bsu036_u:1616: kurvan vālavyajanena vījyamāno vitatavitāne pṛthivīpradeśe muktakusumābhikīrṇe ratnadāmābhipralambite
K10bsu036_u:1618: adrākṣīt sa bhagavan daridrapuruṣastaṃ svakaṃ pitaraṃ svake niveśanadvāre evaṃrūpayā ṛdhyā upaviṣṭaṃ mahatā janakāyena parivṛtaṃ gṛhapatikṛtyaṃ kurvāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:1619: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvignamānasaḥ evamanuvicintayāmāsa - sahasaivāyaṃ mayā rājā vā rājamātro vā āsāditaḥ
K10bsu036_u:1626: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo duḥkhaparaṃparāmanasikārabhayabhītastvaramāṇaḥ prakrāmet palāyet,
K10bsu036_u:1628: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt /
K10bsu036_u:1629: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:1630: evaṃ ca cintayet - āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1634: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet - gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam
K10bsu036_u:1635: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1636: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet /
K10bsu036_u:1638: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ (Vaidya 73)
K10bsu036_u:1640: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet - mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam /
K10bsu036_u:1645: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti /
K10bsu036_u:1646: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet /
K10bsu036_u:1650: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet - mamaiṣa putra iti /
K10bsu036_u:1651: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
K10bsu036_u:1652: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
K10bsu036_u:1654: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
K10bsu036_u:1655: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
K10bsu036_u:1657: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1658: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1660: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt,
K10bsu036_u:1661: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām /
K10bsu036_u:1662: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
K10bsu036_u:1663: sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ - saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ sahāvābhyāmiti /
K10bsu036_u:1664: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām /
K10bsu036_u:1665: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ
K10bsu036_u:1666: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1667: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam /
K10bsu036_u:1669: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
K10bsu036_u:1672: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
K10bsu036_u:1677: enaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva /
K10bsu036_u:1680: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:1682: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena
K10bsu036_u:1687: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa,
K10bsu036_u:1694: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā /
K10bsu036_u:1695: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ, karoṣi vā /
K10bsu036_u:1696: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
K10bsu036_u:1697: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
K10bsu036_u:1700: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt /
K10bsu036_u:1702: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet /
K10bsu036_u:1703: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
K10bsu036_u:1705: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1706: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet /
K10bsu036_u:1707: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
K10bsu036_u:1710: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:1715: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi //
K10bsu036_u:1716: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt /
K10bsu036_u:1722: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā
K10bsu036_u:1723: avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1724: jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato
K10bsu036_u:1725: jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ
K10bsu036_u:1727: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1739: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:1740: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti //
K10bsu036_u:1743: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti,
K10bsu036_u:1749: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1751: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1752: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1753: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
K10bsu036_u:1761: tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
K10bsu036_u:1762: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1767: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1770: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
K10bsu036_u:1774: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:1779: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
K10bsu036_u:1780: āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
K10bsu036_u:1781: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya // Saddhp_4.1 //
K10bsu036_u:1784: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve // Saddhp_4.2 //
K10bsu036_u:1785: yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:1786: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram // Saddhp_4.3 //
K10bsu036_u:1787: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
K10bsu036_u:1788: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni // Saddhp_4.4 //

K10bsu036_u:2034: śṛṇotha me devamanuṣyasaṃghā upasaṃkramadhvaṃ mama darśanāya /

K10bsu036_u:2036: bhāṣāmi ca prāṇisahasrakoṭināṃ dharmaṃ viśuddhaṃ abhidarśanīyam /

K10bsu036_u:2038: svareṇa caikena vadāmi dharmaṃ bodhiṃ nidānaṃ kariyāna nityam /
K10bsu036_u:2039: samaṃ hi etadviṣamatva nāsti na kaści vidveṣu na rāgu vidyate // Saddhp_5.21 //
K10bsu036_u:2040: anunīyatā mahya na kācidasti premā ca doṣaśca na me kahiṃcit /

K10bsu036_u:2042: ananyakarmā pravadāmi dharmaṃ gacchantu tiṣṭhantu niṣīdamānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2044: niṣaṇṇa śayyāsanamāruhitvā kilāsitā mahya na jātu vidyate // Saddhp_5.23 //
K10bsu036_u:2045: saṃtarpayāmī imu sarvalokaṃ megho va vāriṃ sama muñcamānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2046: āryeṣu nīceṣu ca tulyabuddhirduḥśīlabhūteṣvatha śīlavatsu // Saddhp_5.24 //
K10bsu036_u:2048: dṛṣṭisthitā ye ca vinaṣṭadṛṣṭī samyagdṛśo ye cāviśuddhadṛṣṭayaḥ // Saddhp_5.25 //
K10bsu036_u:2049: hīneṣu cotkṛṣṭamatīṣu cāpi mṛdvindriyeṣu pravadāmi dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:2050: kilāsitāṃ sarva vivarjayitvā samyak pramuñcāmyahu dharmavarṣam // Saddhp_5.26 //
K10bsu036_u:2051: yathābalaṃ ca śruṇiyāna mahyaṃ vividhāsu bhūmīṣu pratiṣṭhihanti /
K10bsu036_u:2052: deveṣu martyeṣu manorameṣu śakreṣu brahmeṣvatha cakravartiṣu // Saddhp_5.27 //
K10bsu036_u:2053: kṣudrānukṣudrā ima oṣadhīyo kṣudrīka etā iha yāva loke /
K10bsu036_u:2054: anyā ca madhyā mahatī ca oṣadhī śṛṇotha tāḥ sarva prakāśayiṣye // Saddhp_5.28 //
K10bsu036_u:2055: anāsravaṃ dharma prajānamānā nirvāṇaprāptā viharanti ye narāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2056: ṣaḍabhijña traividya bhavanti ye ca sā kṣudrikā oṣadhi saṃpravuttā // Saddhp_5.29 //
K10bsu036_u:2057: girikandeṣū viharanti ye ca pratyekabodhiṃ spṛhayanti ye narāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2058: ye īdṛśā madhyaviśuddhabuddhayaḥ sā madhyamā oṣadhi saṃpravuttā // Saddhp_5.30 //
K10bsu036_u:2060: ye prārthayante puruṣarṣabhatvaṃ buddho bhaviṣye naradevanāthaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2061: vīryaṃ ca dhyānaṃ ca niṣevamāṇāḥ sā oṣadhī agra iyaṃ pravuccati // Saddhp_5.31 //
K10bsu036_u:2062: ye cāpi yuktāḥ sugatasya putrā maitrīṃ niṣevantiha śāntacaryām /
K10bsu036_u:2063: niṣkāṅkṣaprāptā puruṣarṣabhatve ayaṃ drumo vucyati evarūpaḥ // Saddhp_5.32 //
K10bsu036_u:2064: avivarticakraṃ hi pravartayantā ṛddhībalasmin sthita ye ca dhīrāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2065: pramocayanto bahu prāṇikoṭī mahādrumo so ca pravuccate hi // Saddhp_5.33 //
K10bsu036_u:2066: samaśca so dharma jinena bhāṣito meghena vā vāri samaṃ pramuktam /
K10bsu036_u:2067: citrā abhijñā ima evarūpā yathauṣadhīyo dharaṇītalasthāḥ // Saddhp_5.34 //
K10bsu036_u:2069: yathā ca so bhāṣati ekadharmaṃ nānāniruktī jalabindavo vā // Saddhp_5.35 //
K10bsu036_u:2070: mamāpi co varṣatu dharmavarṣaṃ loko hyayaṃ tarpitu bhoti sarvaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2071: yathābalaṃ cānuvicintayanti subhāṣitaṃ ekarasaṃ pi dharmam // Saddhp_5.36 //
K10bsu036_u:2072: tṛṇagulmakā vā yatha varṣamāṇe madhyā pi vā oṣadhiyo yathaiva /
K10bsu036_u:2073: drumā pi vā te ca mahādrumā vā yatha śobhayante daśadikṣu sarve // Saddhp_5.37 //
K10bsu036_u:2074: iyaṃ sadā lokahitāya dharmatā tarpeti dharmeṇimu sarvalokam /
K10bsu036_u:2075: saṃtarpitaścāpyatha sarvalokaḥ pramuñcate oṣadhi puṣpakāṇi // Saddhp_5.38 //
K10bsu036_u:2077: madhyāpi ca oṣadhiyo vivardhayī arhanta ye te sthita āsravakṣaye /
K10bsu036_u:2078: pratyekabuddhā vanaṣaṇḍacāriṇo niṣpādayī dharmamimaṃ subhāṣitam // Saddhp_5.39 //
K10bsu036_u:2079: bahubodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhīrāḥ sarvatra traidhātuki ye gatiṃgatāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2080: paryeṣamāṇā imamagrabodhiṃ drumā va vardhanti ti nityakālam // Saddhp_5.40 //
K10bsu036_u:2081: ye ṛddhimantaścatudhyānadhyāyino ye śūnyatāṃ śrutva janenti prītim /
K10bsu036_u:2082: raśmīsahasrāṇi pramuñcamānāste caiva vuccanti mahādrumā iha // Saddhp_5.41 //
K10bsu036_u:2083: etādṛśī kāśyapa dharmadeśanā meghena vā vāri samaṃ pramuktam /
K10bsu036_u:2084: bahvī vivardhanti mahauṣadhīyo manuṣyapuṣpāṇi anantakāni // Saddhp_5.42 //
K10bsu036_u:2085: svapratyayaṃ dharma prakāśayāmi kālena darśemi ca buddhabodhim /
K10bsu036_u:2086: upāyakauśalyu mamaitadagraṃ sarveṣa co lokavināyakānām // Saddhp_5.43 //
K10bsu036_u:2087: paramārtha evaṃ mayaṃ bhūtabhāṣito te śrāvakāḥ sarvi na enti nirvṛtim /
K10bsu036_u:2088: caranti ete vara bodhicārikāṃ buddhā bhaviṣyantimi sarvaśrāvakāḥ // Saddhp_5.44 //
K10bsu036_u:2089: punaraparaṃ kāśyapa tathāgataḥ sattvavinaye samo na cāsamaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2090: tadyathā kāśyapa candrasuryaprabhā sarvalokamavabhāsayati kuśalakāriṇamakuśalakāriṇaṃ cordhvāvasthitamadharāvasthitaṃ ca sugandhi durgandhi,
K10bsu036_u:2091: sā sarvatra samaṃ prabhā nipatati na viṣamam,
K10bsu036_u:2092: evameva kāśyapa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñajñānacittaprabhā sarveṣu
K10bsu036_u:2095: na ca tathāgatasya jñānaprabhāyā ūnatā vā atiriktatā vā yathāpuṇyajñānasamudāgamāya saṃbhavati /
K10bsu036_u:2100: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadi bhagavan na santi trīṇi yānāni,
K10bsu036_u:2101: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratyutpanne 'dhvani śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptiḥ prajñapyate?
K10bsu036_u:2102: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapametadavocat - tadyathā kāśyapa kumbhakāraḥ samāsu mṛttikāsu bhājanāni karoti /
K10bsu036_u:2108: atha ca dravyaprakṣepamātreṇa bhājanānāṃ nānātvaṃ prajñāyate /
K10bsu036_u:2109: evameva kāśyapa ekamevedaṃ yānaṃ yaduta buddhayānam /
K10bsu036_u:2110: na dvitīyaṃ na tṛtīyaṃ vā yānaṃ saṃvidyate //
K10bsu036_u:2111: evamukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantametadavocat - yadyapi bhagavan sattvā nānādhimuktayo ye traidhātukānniḥsṛtāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2112: kiṃ teṣāmekaṃ nirvāṇamuta dve trīṇi vā?
K10bsu036_u:2115: tena hi kāśyapa upamāṃ te kariṣyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:2118: sa evaṃ brūyānna santi suvarṇadurvaṇāni rūpāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:2124: athānye puruṣāstasya jātyandhasya puruṣasya purata evaṃ vadeyuḥ - santi suvarṇadurvarṇāni rūpāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:2130: sa ca jātyandhaḥ puruṣasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na śraddadhyāt,
K10bsu036_u:2134: tasyaivaṃ syāt - tasya puruṣasya pūrvapāpena karmaṇā vyādhirutpannaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2136: te sarve caturvidhāḥ - vātikāḥ paittikāḥ ślaiḥmikāḥ sāṃnipātikāśca /
K10bsu036_u:2137: atha sa vaidyastasya vyādhervyupaśamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarupāyaṃ cintayet /
K10bsu036_u:2138: tasyaivaṃ syāt - yāni khalvimāni dravyāṇi pracaranti,
K10bsu036_u:2140: santi tu himavati parvatarāje catasra oṣadhayaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2147: atha sa vaidyastasmin jātyandhe kāruṇyamutpādya tādṛśamupāyaṃ cintayet,
K10bsu036_u:2153: ārāgya ca kāṃciddantaiḥ kṣoditāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
K10bsu036_u:2161: sa pratilabdhacakṣurbahiradhyātmaṃ dūre āsanne ca candrasūryaprabhāṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahān sarvarūpāṇi ca paśyet /
K10bsu036_u:2162: evaṃ ca vadet - aho batāhaṃ mūḍhaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2170: te taṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - kevalaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā cakṣuḥ pratilabdham /
K10bsu036_u:2175: tamenamevaṃ vadeyuḥ - yadā tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa antargṛhaṃ niṣaṇṇo bahiranyāni rūpāṇi na paśyasi,
K10bsu036_u:2177: nāpi te ye sattvāḥ snigdhacittā vā drugdhacittā vā /
K10bsu036_u:2179: bherīśaṅkhādīnāṃ śabdaṃ na prajānāsi, na śṛṇoṣi /
K10bsu036_u:2185: vadasi? tatsādhu bhoḥ puruṣa yadandhakāraṃ tatprakāśamiti saṃjānīṣe,
K10bsu036_u:2187: atha sa puruṣastān ṛṣīnevaṃ vadet - ka upāyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2188: kiṃ vā śubhaṃ karma kṛtvedṛśīṃ prajñāṃ pratilabheya,
K10bsu036_u:2190: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasya puruṣasyaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ - yadīcchasi,
K10bsu036_u:2196: araṇye vasan ekāgracitto lokatṛṣṇāṃ prahāya pañcābhijñāḥ prāpnuyāt /
K10bsu036_u:2201: iti hi kāśyapa upamaiṣā kṛtā asyārthasya vijñaptaye /
K10bsu036_u:2209: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:2211: tathāgatastu karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātukānniḥsṛtaḥ piteva priye ekaputrake karuṇāṃ janayitvā traidhātuke 'vatīrya sattvān saṃsāracakre paribhramataḥ saṃpaśyati /
K10bsu036_u:2214: dṛṣṭvā ca jānāti - amī sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ kṛtvā mandadveṣāstīvrarāgāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2220: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgata upāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānāni deśayati /
K10bsu036_u:2221: tatra yathā te ṛṣayaḥ pañcābhijñā viśuddhacakṣuṣaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2222: evaṃ bodhisattvā bodhicittānyutpādya anutpattikīṃ dharmakṣāntiṃ pratilabhya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
K10bsu036_u:2230: yathā catasra oṣadhayastathā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitanirvāṇadvāraṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu036_u:2233: evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayitvā sattvā avidyāṃ nirodhayanti /
K10bsu036_u:2235: yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:2236: evaṃ cāsya cittaṃ na kuśale tiṣṭhati na pāpe //
K10bsu036_u:2242: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate - na santyapare dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2248: sa utpannabodhicitto na saṃsārasthito na nirvāṇaprāpto bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:2249: so 'vabudhya traidhātukaṃ daśasu dikṣu śūnyaṃ nirmitopamaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnamarīcipratiśrutkopamaṃ lokaṃ paśyati /
K10bsu036_u:2250: sa sarvadharmānanutpannānaniruddhān abaddhānamuktān atamondhakārān naprakāśān paśyati /
K10bsu036_u:2253: atha khalu bhagavānimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2257: sarvasattvān vinayate na conā naiva cādhikā // Saddhp_5.46 //
K10bsu036_u:2258: yathā kulālo mṛdbhāṇḍaṃ kurvan mṛtsu samāsvapi /
K10bsu036_u:2261: mṛdamekāṃ sa gṛhṇāti kurvan bhāṇḍāni bhārgavaḥ // Saddhp_5.48 //
K10bsu036_u:2262: yādṛk prakṣipyate dravyaṃ bhājanaṃ tena lakṣyate /
K10bsu036_u:2268: saṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiṃ jānāti tattvataḥ // Saddhp_5.51 //
K10bsu036_u:2275: jātyandhe tu mahāvaidyaḥ kāruṇyaṃ saṃniveśya ha /
K10bsu036_u:2279: dantaiḥ saṃcūrṇya kāṃcittu piṣṭvā cānyāṃ tathāparām /
K10bsu036_u:2283: evaṃ sattvā mahājñānā jātyandhāḥ saṃsaranti hi /
K10bsu036_u:2292: bhavatyevaṃ mayā prāptaṃ nirvāṇamamalaṃ śivam // Saddhp_5.63 //
K10bsu036_u:2296: maharṣayo yathā tasmai karuṇāṃ saṃniveśya vai /
K10bsu036_u:2297: kathayanti ca mūḍho 'si mā te 'bhūjjñānavānaham // Saddhp_5.65 //
K10bsu036_u:2299: bahiryadvartate tadvai na jānīṣe tvamalpadhīḥ // Saddhp_5.66 //
K10bsu036_u:2301: so adyāpi na jānāti kutastvaṃ vetsyase 'lpadhīḥ // Saddhp_5.67 //
K10bsu036_u:2303: taṃ śrotuṃ na samartho 'si prāgevānyaṃ vidūrataḥ // Saddhp_5.68 //
K10bsu036_u:2305: te na śakyaṃ tvayā jñātumabhimānaḥ kuto 'sti te // Saddhp_5.69 //
K10bsu036_u:2306: krośamātre 'pi gantavye padavīṃ na vinā gatiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2307: mātuḥ kukṣau ca yadvṛttaṃ vismṛtaṃ tattadeva te // Saddhp_5.70 //
K10bsu036_u:2308: abhijñā yasya pañcaitāḥ sa sarvajña ihocyate /
K10bsu036_u:2312: dharmaṃ viśuddhaṃ tena tvamabhijñāḥ pratilapsyase // Saddhp_5.72 //
K10bsu036_u:2314: abhijñāḥ prāptavān pañca nacireṇa guṇānvitaḥ // Saddhp_5.73 //
K10bsu036_u:2316: jino 'tha deśayettasmai viśrāmo 'yaṃ na nirvṛtiḥ // Saddhp_5.74 //
K10bsu036_u:2317: upāya eṣa buddhānāṃ vadanti yadimaṃ nayam /
K10bsu036_u:2319: tryadhvajñānamanantaṃ ca ṣaṭ ca pāramitāḥ śubhāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2321: bodhicittaṃ ca ye cānye dharmā nirvāṇagāminaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2329: abaddhamavimuktaṃ ca na vijānāti nirvṛtim // Saddhp_5.80 //
K10bsu036_u:2331: na caitān prekṣate nāpi kiṃciddharmaṃ vipaśyati // Saddhp_5.81 //
K10bsu036_u:2334: sarvadharmāḥ samāḥ sarve samāḥ samasamāḥ sadā /
K10bsu036_u:2335: evaṃ jñātvā vijānāti nirvāṇamamṛtaṃ śivam // Saddhp_5.83 //
K10bsu036_u:2339: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2341: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo bhikṣustriṃśato buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2343: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:2344: sa paścime samucchraye avabhāsaprāptāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāvyūhe kalpe raśmiprabhāso
K10bsu036_u:2345: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
K10bsu036_u:2346: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:2351: samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇam /
K10bsu036_u:2354: na ca tatra māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ lapsyate,
K10bsu036_u:2357: api tu khalu punastatra lokadhātau tasyaiva bhagavato raśmiprabhāsasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmaparigrahāyābhiyuktā bhaviṣyanti //
K10bsu036_u:2358: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2359: paśyāmyahaṃ bhikṣava buddhacakṣuṣā sthaviro hyayaṃ kāśyapa buddha bheṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:2360: anāgate 'dhvāni asaṃkhyakalpe kṛtvāna pūjāṃ dvipadottamānām // Saddhp_6.1 //
K10bsu036_u:2361: triṃśatsahasrāḥ paripūrṇakoṭyo jinānayaṃ drakṣyati kāśyapo hyayam /
K10bsu036_u:2362: cariṣyatī tatra ca brahmacaryaṃ bauddhasya jñānasya kṛtena bhikṣavaḥ // Saddhp_6.2 //
K10bsu036_u:2363: kṛtvāna pūjāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ samudāniya jñānamidaṃ anuttaram /
K10bsu036_u:2364: sa paścime cocchrayi lokanātho bhaviṣyate apratimo maharṣiḥ // Saddhp_6.3 //
K10bsu036_u:2365: kṣetraṃ ca tasya pravaraṃ bhaviṣyati vicitra śuddhaṃ śubha darśanīyam /
K10bsu036_u:2367: manojñarūpaṃ sada premaṇīyaṃ suvarṇasūtraiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ ca // Saddhp_6.4 //
K10bsu036_u:2368: ratnāmayā vṛkṣa tahiṃ vicitrā aṣṭāpadasmiṃ tahi ekameke /
K10bsu036_u:2369: manojñagandhaṃ ca vimuñcamānā bheṣyanti kṣetrasmi imasmi bhikṣo // Saddhp_6.5 //
K10bsu036_u:2371: śvabhraprapātā na ca tatra santi samaṃ śivaṃ bheṣyati darśanīyam // Saddhp_6.6 //
K10bsu036_u:2373: vaipulyasūtrāntadharāṇa tāyināṃ bahū bhaviṣyanti sahasra neke // Saddhp_6.7 //
K10bsu036_u:2374: anāsravā antimadehadhāriṇo bheṣyanti ye śrāvaka dharmarājñaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2375: pramāṇu teṣāṃ na kadāci vidyate divyena jñānena gaṇitva kalpān // Saddhp_6.8 //
K10bsu036_u:2376: so dvādaśa antarakalpa sthāsyati saddharma viṃśāntarakalpa sthāsyati /
K10bsu036_u:2377: pratirūpakaścāntarakalpa viṃśatiṃ raśmiprabhāsasya viyūha bheṣyati // Saddhp_6.9 //
K10bsu036_u:2378: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sthavira āyuṣmāṃśca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ pravepamānaiḥ kāyairbhagavantamanimiṣairnetrairvyavalokayanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:2379: tasyāṃ ca velāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅamanaḥsaṃgītyā imā gāthā abhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:2385: pratīkṣa bhūya ucyeta hastaprāptasmi bhojane // Saddhp_6.12 //
K10bsu036_u:2390: yathā hastasmi prakṣiptaṃ na tadbhuñjīta bhojanam // Saddhp_6.14 //
K10bsu036_u:2391: evaṃ ca utsukā vīra śrutvā ghoṣamanuttaram /
K10bsu036_u:2392: vyākṛtā yada bheṣyāmastadā bheṣyāma nirvṛtāḥ // Saddhp_6.15 //
K10bsu036_u:2395: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣā mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ sthavirāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K10bsu036_u:2396: punarapi sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ me bhikṣavo mahāśrāvakaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2397: sthaviraḥ subhūtistriṃśata eva buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2401: evaṃrūpāṃścādhikārān kṛtvā paścime samucchraye śaśiketurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10bsu036_u:2402: loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10bsu036_u:2403: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:2404: ratnasaṃbhavaṃ ca nāmāsya tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:2415: sa ca bhagavān vaihāyasamantarīkḥe sthitvā abhīkḥṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiḥyati,
K10bsu036_u:2416: bahūni ca bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca śrāvakaśatasahasrāṇi vineḥyati //
K10bsu036_u:2417: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2418: ārocayāmi ahamadya bhikṣavaḥ prativedayāmyadya mamā śṛṇotha /
K10bsu036_u:2419: sthaviraḥ subhūtirmama śrāvako 'yaṃ bhaviṣyate buddha anāgate 'dhvani // Saddhp_6.17 //
K10bsu036_u:2420: buddhāṃśca paśyitva mahānubhāvān triṃśacca pūrṇānayutāna koṭīḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2422: cariṣyate carya tadānulomikīmimasya jñānasya kṛtena caiṣaḥ // Saddhp_6.18 //
K10bsu036_u:2425: sudarśanīyaṃ ca sukṣetra bheṣyati iṣṭaṃ manojñaṃ ca mahājanasya /
K10bsu036_u:2426: vihariṣyate yatra sa lokabandhustāritva prāṇīnayutāna koṭīḥ // Saddhp_6.20 //
K10bsu036_u:2428: tīkṣṇendriyāstasya jinasya śāsane ye śobhayiṣyanti ta buddhakṣetram // Saddhp_6.21 //
K10bsu036_u:2429: bahuśrāvakāstasya na saṃkhya teṣāṃ pramāṇu naivāsti kadāci teṣām /
K10bsu036_u:2430: ṣaḍabhijña traividya maharddhikāśca aṣṭāvimokṣeṣu pratiṣṭhitāśca // Saddhp_6.22 //
K10bsu036_u:2432: devā manuṣyā yatha gaṅgavālikā bheṣyanti tasyo satataṃ kṛtāñjalī // Saddhp_6.23 //
K10bsu036_u:2433: so dvādaśo antarakalpa sthāsyapi saddharmu viṃśāntarakalpa sthāsyati /
K10bsu036_u:2434: pratirūpako viṃśatimeva sthāsyati kalpāntarāṇi dvipadottamasya // Saddhp_6.24 //
K10bsu036_u:2435: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi vo bhikṣayaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2437: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ sthaviro mahākātyāyano 'ṣṭānāṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2439: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ stūpān kariṣyati yojanasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa pañcāśad yojanāni pariṇāhena saptānāṃ ratnānām /
K10bsu036_u:2440: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmargabhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya /
K10bsu036_u:2442: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa punarviśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāmantike evarūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2444: sa paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe jāmbūnadaprabhāso nāma tathāgato
K10bsu036_u:2445: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu036_u:2446: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavan /
K10bsu036_u:2447: pariśuddhaṃ cāsya buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2453: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2454: śṛṇotha me bhikṣava adya sarve udāharantasya girāmananyathām /
K10bsu036_u:2455: kātyāyanaḥ sthaviru ayaṃ mi śrāvakaḥ kariṣyate pūja vināyakānām // Saddhp_6.25 //
K10bsu036_u:2456: satkāru teṣāṃ ca bahuprakāraṃ bahūvidhaṃ lokavināyakānām /
K10bsu036_u:2457: stūpāṃśca kārāpayi nirvṛtānāṃ puṣpehi gandhehi ca pūjayiṣyati // Saddhp_6.26 //
K10bsu036_u:2458: labhitva so paścimakaṃ samucchrayaṃ pariśuddhakṣetrasmi jino bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:2459: paripūrayitvā imameva jñānaṃ deśeṣyate prāṇisahasrakoṭinām // Saddhp_6.27 //
K10bsu036_u:2460: sa satkṛto loki sadevakasmin prabhākaro buddha vibhurbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:2461: jāmbūnadābhāsu sa cāpi nāmnā saṃtārako devamanuṣyakoṭinām // Saddhp_6.28 //
K10bsu036_u:2462: bahubodhisattvāstatha śrāvakāśca amitā asaṃkhyā pi ca tatra kṣetre /
K10bsu036_u:2463: upaśobhayiṣyanti ti buddhaśāsanaṃ bhavaprahīṇā vibhavāśca sarve // Saddhp_6.29 //
K10bsu036_u:2465: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2468: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ vividhaṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2470: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ stūpān kārayiṣyati saptaratnamayān /
K10bsu036_u:2471: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaidūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya /
K10bsu036_u:2473: teṣāṃ ca stūpānāṃ vividhāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2474: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa viṃśaterbuddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmevaṃrūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:2476: paścime ca ātmabhāvapratilambhe tamālapatracandanagandho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10bsu036_u:2477: loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K10bsu036_u:2478: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:2482: samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ sudarśanīyaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣābhivicitritaṃ muktakusumābhikīrṇaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2487: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2489: viṃśatsahasrāṇi jināna tāyināmanyāṃśca aṣṭau virajāna drakṣyati // Saddhp_6.30 //
K10bsu036_u:2490: cariṣyate tatra ca brahmacaryaṃ bauddhaṃ imaṃ jñāna gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2491: satkāru teṣāṃ dvipadottamānāṃ vividhaṃ tadā kāhi vināyakānām // Saddhp_6.31 //
K10bsu036_u:2492: saddharmu teṣāṃ vipulaṃ praṇītaṃ dhāretva kalpāna sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2493: pūjāṃ ca stūpeṣu kariṣyate tadā parinirvṛtānāṃ sugatāna teṣām // Saddhp_6.32 //
K10bsu036_u:2494: ratnāmayān stūpa savaijayantān kariṣyate teṣa jinottamānām /
K10bsu036_u:2496: puṣpehi gandhehi ca pūjayanto vādyehi vā lokahitānukampinām // Saddhp_6.33 //
K10bsu036_u:2497: tatpaścime caiva samucchrayasmin priyadarśane tatra manojñakṣetre /
K10bsu036_u:2500: prakāśayantasyima buddhanetrīṃ manujeṣu deveṣu ca nityakālam // Saddhp_6.35 //
K10bsu036_u:2501: bahuśrāvakātasya jinasya tatra koṭī sahasrā yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2502: ṣaḍabhijña traividya maharddhikāśca abhijñaprāptāḥ sugatasya śāsane // Saddhp_6.36 //
K10bsu036_u:2504: abhiyuktarūpāḥ sugatasya śāsane teṣāṃ sahasrāṇi bahūni tatra // Saddhp_6.37 //
K10bsu036_u:2505: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya saddharmu saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle /
K10bsu036_u:2506: viṃśacca viṃśāntarakalpa pūrṇā etatpramāṇaṃ pratirūpakasya // Saddhp_6.38 //
K10bsu036_u:2507: maharddhikāḥ pañca mi śrāvakā ye nirdiṣṭa ye te maya agrabodhaye /
K10bsu036_u:2508: anāgate 'dhvāni jināḥ svayaṃbhuvasteṣāṃ ca caryāṃ śṛṇuthā mamāntikāt // Saddhp_6.39 //
K10bsu036_u:2513: pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena mahābhijñājñānābhibhūrnāma
K10bsu036_u:2514: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu036_u:2515: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstāḥ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān saṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau mahārūpe kalpe /
K10bsu036_u:2517: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavo yāvāniha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2520: atha khalu sa puruṣastasmāllokadhātorekaṃ paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātusahasramatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet /
K10bsu036_u:2521: atha sa puruṣo dvitīyaṃ ca paramāṇurajo gṛhītvā tataḥ pareṇa parataraṃ lokadhātusahasramatikramya dvitīyaṃ paramāṇuraja upanikṣipet /
K10bsu036_u:2522: anena paryāyeṇa sa puruṣaḥ sarvāvantaṃ pṛthivīdhātumupanikṣipet pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
K10bsu036_u:2523: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ śakyaṃ teṣāṃ lokadhātūnāmanto vā paryanto vā gaṇanayādhigantum?
K10bsu036_u:2526: bhagavānāha - śakyaṃ punarbhikṣavasteṣāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ kenacid gaṇakena vā gaṇakamahāmātreṇa vā gaṇanayā paryanto 'dhigantum,
K10bsu036_u:2529: na tveva teṣāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ śakyaṃ gaṇanāyogena paryanto 'dhigantum /
K10bsu036_u:2533: taṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavastathāgataṃ tāvacciraṃ parinirvṛtamanena tathāgatajñānadarśanabalādhānena yathādya śvo vā parinirvṛtamanusmarāmi //
K10bsu036_u:2534: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2535: abhū atītā bahu kalpakoṭyo anusmarāmi dvipadānamuttamam /
K10bsu036_u:2537: yathā trisāhasrima lokadhātuṃ kaścid rajaṃ kurya aṇupramāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:2538: paramāṇumekaṃ ca tato gṛhītvā kṣetraṃ sahasraṃ gamiyāna nikṣipet // Saddhp_7.2 //
K10bsu036_u:2539: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pi ca eva nikṣipet sarvaṃ pi so nikṣipi taṃ rajogatam /
K10bsu036_u:2540: riktā bhavetā iya lokadhātuḥ sarvaśca so pāṃsu bhaveta kṣīṇaḥ // Saddhp_7.3 //
K10bsu036_u:2542: yo lokadhātūṣu bhaveta tāsu pāṃsu rajo yasya pramāṇu nāsti /
K10bsu036_u:2543: rajaṃ karitvāna aśeṣatastaṃ lakṣyaṃ dade kalpaśate gate ca // Saddhp_7.4 //
K10bsu036_u:2544: evāprameyā bahu kalpakoṭyaḥ parinirvṛtasya sugatasya tasya /
K10bsu036_u:2545: paramāṇu sarve na bhavanti lakṣyāstāvadbahu kṣīṇa bhavanti kalpāḥ // Saddhp_7.5 //
K10bsu036_u:2546: tāvacciraṃ nirvṛtu taṃ vināyakaṃ tān śrāvakāṃstāṃśca pi bodhisattvān /
K10bsu036_u:2547: etādṛśaṃ jñānu tathāgatānāṃ smarāmi vṛttaṃ yatha adya śvo vā // Saddhp_7.6 //
K10bsu036_u:2549: buddhaṃ mayā kalpaśatairanekaiḥ smṛtīya sūkṣmāya anāsravāya // Saddhp_7.7 //
K10bsu036_u:2551: pūrve ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñānābhibhūstathāgato 'nabhisaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragrata eva sarvāṃ mārasenāṃ prābhañjīt parājaiṣīt /
K10bsu036_u:2552: prabhañjayitvā parājayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmiti na ca tāvattasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:2556: tṛtīyamapi caturthamapi pañcamamapi ṣaṣṭhamapi saptamamapi aṣṭamamapi navamamapi daśamamapyantarakalpaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2559: na ca tāvadasya te dharmā āmukhībhavanti sma //
K10bsu036_u:2560: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya devaistrāyastriṃśairmahāsiṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūd yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa,
K10bsu036_u:2561: yatra sa bhagavān niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2562: samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca khalu punastasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe,
K10bsu036_u:2564: bodhimaṇḍasya parisāmantakena yojanaśatamantarikṣe ca vātān pramuñcanti,
K10bsu036_u:2566: yathāpravarṣitaṃ ca tat puṣpavarṣaṃ tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya avyucchinnaṃ pravarṣayanti /
K10bsu036_u:2568: tathā pravarṣitaṃ ca tatpuḥpavarḥaṃ pravarḥayanti yāvat parinirvāṇakālasamaye tasya bhagavatastaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti /
K10bsu036_u:2570: tasya bhagavato bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatasya satkārārthamavyucchinnaṃ pravādayāmāsuḥ paripūrṇān daśāntarakalpān tasya bhagavato niḥaṇṇasya /
K10bsu036_u:2571: tata uttari tāni divyāṇi tūryāṇi satatasamitaṃ pravādayāmāsuryāvattasya bhagavato mahāparinirvāṇakālasamayāt //
K10bsu036_u:2572: atha khalu bhikṣavo daśānāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2573: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhaṃ ca taṃ viditvā ye tasya bhagavataḥ kumārabhūtasya ṣoḍaśa putrā abhūvannaurasāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2575: teṣāṃ ca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rājakumārāṇāmekaikasya ca vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakānyabhūvan vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni /
K10bsu036_u:2576: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāstāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni rāmaṇīyakāni visarjayitvā,
K10bsu036_u:2577: taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā,
K10bsu036_u:2578: mātṛbhirdhātrībhiśca rudantībhiḥ parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ tena ca mahārājñā cakravartinā
