K10bsu036_u:2795: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2797: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śikhī nāma mahābrahmā taṃ mahāntaṃ brahmagaṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:2798: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ mārṣa idaṃ bhaviṣyati yenā vimānāni parisphuṭāni /
K10bsu036_u:2799: ojena varṇena dyutīya cāpi adhimātra vṛddhāni kimatra kāraṇam // Saddhp_7.44 //
K10bsu036_u:2800: na īdṛśaṃ no abhidṛṣṭapūrvaṃ śrutaṃ ca keno tatha pūrva āsīt /
K10bsu036_u:2801: oja 'sphuṭāni yatha adya etā adhimātra bhrājanti kimatra kāraṇam // Saddhp_7.45 //
K10bsu036_u:2803: yadi vā nu kaścidbhavi devaputraḥ śubhena karmeṇa samanvito iha /
K10bsu036_u:2804: upapannu tasyo ayamānubhāvo yadi vā bhaved buddha kadāci loke // Saddhp_7.46 //
K10bsu036_u:2805: atha khalu bhikṣavasteṣu pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2806: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyabhiruhya divyāṃśca
K10bsu036_u:2807: sumerumātrān puṣpapuṭān gṛhītvā catasṛṣu dikṣvanucaṃkramanto 'nuvicaranto yena adhodigbhāgastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2808: adrākṣuḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇo 'dhodigbhāge taṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2813: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taiḥ sumerumātraiḥ puṣpapuṭaistaṃ bhagavantamabhyavakiranti
K10bsu036_u:2814: abhiprakiranti sma taṃ ca bodhivṛkṣaṃ daśayojanapramāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:2815: abhyavakīrya tāni divyāni svāni svāni brāhmāṇi vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātayāmāsuḥ - pratigṛhṇātu bhagavānimāni brāhmāṇi vimānānyasmākamanukampāmupādāya
K10bsu036_u:2817: atha khalu bhikṣavaste 'pi mahābrahmāṇastāni svāni svāni vimānāni tasya bhagavato niryātya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃmukhamābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭuvanti sma -
K10bsu036_u:2819: tradhātukasmi buddhā vai sattvānāṃ ye pramocakāḥ // Saddhp_7.47 //
K10bsu036_u:2822: śūnyā acintiyāḥ kalpā atītāḥ pūrvi ye abhū /
K10bsu036_u:2826: divyāḥ kāyāśca hīyante cyutā gacchanti durgatim /
K10bsu036_u:2827: aśrutvā dharma buddhānāṃ gatyeṣāṃ bhoti pāpikā // Saddhp_7.51 //
K10bsu036_u:2829: sukhaṃ vinaśyatī teṣāṃ sukhasaṃjñā ca naśyati // Saddhp_7.52 //
K10bsu036_u:2832: adāntā lokanāthena durgatiṃ prapatanti te // Saddhp_7.53 //
K10bsu036_u:2836: vayaṃ te anumodāmo lokaścaiva sadevakaḥ // Saddhp_7.55 //
K10bsu036_u:2838: dadāma te mahāvīra pratigṛhṇa mahāmune // Saddhp_7.56 //
K10bsu036_u:2840: vayaṃ ca sarvasattvāśca agrāṃ bodhiṃ spṛśemahi // Saddhp_7.57 //
K10bsu036_u:2841: atha khalu bhikṣavaste mahābrahmāṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2849: dharmamasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2850: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokanukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca //
K10bsu036_u:2851: atha khalu bhikṣavastāni pañcāśad brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekasvareṇa samasaṃgītyā taṃ bhagavantamābhyāṃ sārūpyābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta
K10bsu036_u:2853: pramocayā duḥkhaśataiśca sattvān nirvāṇamārgaṃ ca pradarśayasva // Saddhp_7.58 //
K10bsu036_u:2854: asmābhiradhyeṣitu bhāṣa dharmamasmānanugṛhṇa imaṃ ca lokam /
K10bsu036_u:2855: valgusvaraṃ co madhuraṃ pramuñca samudānitaṃ kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ // Saddhp_7.59 //
K10bsu036_u:2856: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
K10bsu036_u:2857: brahmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā teṣāṃ ca ṣoḍaśānāṃ putrāṇāṃ rājakumārāṇām,
K10bsu036_u:2858: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsa triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāramapravartitaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2859: śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā kenacit punarloke saha dharmeṇa /
K10bsu036_u:2864: pratītyasamutpādapravṛttiṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa - iti hi bhikṣavo 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2874: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:2886: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati //
K10bsu036_u:2887: sahapravartitaṃ cedaṃ bhikṣavastena bhagavatā mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvā tathāgatenārhatā
K10bsu036_u:2888: samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakraṃ sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
K10bsu036_u:2890: atha tasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte ṣaṣṭeḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni /
K10bsu036_u:2891: sarve ca te traividyāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2892: punaranupūrveṇa bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dvitīyāṃ dharmadeśanāmakārṣīt,
K10bsu036_u:2897: tataḥ paścād bhikṣavastasya bhagavato gaṇanāsamatikrāntaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho 'bhūt //
K10bsu036_u:2898: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā eva samānāḥ śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2899: sarve ca te śrāmaṇerā abhūvan paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ kuśalā bahubuddhaśatasahasracaritāvino 'rthinaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2900: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2902: bahūni śrāvakakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi maharddhikāni mahānubhāvāni maheśākhyāni bhagavato
K10bsu036_u:2904: tat sādhu bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākamanukampāmupādāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya dharmaṃ deśayatu,
K10bsu036_u:2908: tvaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvāśayajño jānīṣe asmākamadhyāśayamiti //
K10bsu036_u:2910: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tān bālān dārakān rājakumārān pravrajitān śrāmaṇerān dṛṣṭvā yāvāṃstasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ parivāraḥ,
K10bsu036_u:2912: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
K10bsu036_u:2914: nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2915: vistareṇa saṃprakāśayāmāsa tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām //
K10bsu036_u:2916: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ te ṣodaśa rājakumārāḥ śrāmaṇerā udgṛhītavanto dhāritavanta ārādhitavantaḥ paryāptavantaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2917: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān vyākārṣīdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu036_u:2918: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya śrāvakāścādhimuktavantaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2919: te ca ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerā bahūni ca prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi vicikitsāprāptānyabhūvan //
K10bsu036_u:2920: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
K10bsu036_u:2921: imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamaṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇyaviśrānto bhāṣitvā vihāraṃ
K10bsu036_u:2923: tathā pratisaṃlīnaśca bhikṣavaḥ sa tathāgataścaturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi vihārasthita evāsīt //
K10bsu036_u:2924: atha khalu bhikṣavaste ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2925: tathāgataṃ pratisaṃlīnaṃ viditvā pṛthak pṛthag dharmāsanāni siṃhāsanāni prajñāpya
K10bsu036_u:2926: teṣu niṣaṇṇāstaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahābhijñājñānābhibhuvaṃ tathāgataṃ namaskṛtya taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
K10bsu036_u:2927: dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ caturaśītikalpasahasrāṇi saṃprakāśitavantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2928: tatra bhikṣava ekaikaḥ śrāmaṇero bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāyāṃ
K10bsu036_u:2929: samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavān samādāpitavān saṃharṣitavān samuttejitavān saṃpraharṣitavānavatāritavān //
K10bsu036_u:2930: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ
K10bsu036_u:2932: vyutthāya ca sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgato yena taddharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu036_u:2934: samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ sa bhagavān mahābhijñājñānābhibhūstathāgatastasmin dharmāsane,
K10bsu036_u:2938: paryupāsadhvaṃ bhikṣava etān ṣoḍaśa śrāmaṇerān punaḥ punaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2940: śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā eṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na pratikṣepsyanti /
K10bsu036_u:2944: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulaputraistasya bhagavataḥ śāsane 'yaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃprakāśito 'bhūt
K10bsu036_u:2945: taiḥ khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāmaṇerairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairyāni tānyekaikena
K10bsu036_u:2948: sarvāṇi ca tāni taireva sārdhaṃ tāsu tāsu jātiṣvanupravrajitāni /
K10bsu036_u:2954: ye te ṣoḍaśa rājakumārāḥ kumārabhūtā ye tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane śrāmaṇerā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan,
K10bsu036_u:2956: sarve ca ta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti /
K10bsu036_u:2957: daśasu dikṣu nānābuddhakṣetreṣu bahūnāṃ śrāvakabodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu036_u:2958: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'bhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvakṣobhyo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukūṭaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2959: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ siṃhaghoṣaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2960: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ ākāśapratiṣṭhitaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho nityaparinirvṛtaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2961: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣava indradhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho brahmadhvajaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2962: paścimāyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo 'mitāyuśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvalokadhātūpadravodvegapratyuttīrṇaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2963: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavastamālapatracandanagandhābhijñaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho merukalpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2964: uttarasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavo meghasvaradīpaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho meghasvararājaśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2965: uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi bhikṣavaḥ sarvalokabhayacchambhitatvavidhvaṃsanarakaraśca nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:2966: ahaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣoḍaśamo madhye khalvasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ
K10bsu036_u:2967: ye punaste bhikṣavastadā asmākaṃ śrāmaṇerabhūtānāṃ sattvāṃ dharmaṃ śrutavantaḥ tasya
K10bsu036_u:2968: bhagavataḥ śāsana ekaikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni
K10bsu036_u:2976: ye mayā bodhisattvena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvajñatādharmamanuśrāvitāni?
K10bsu036_u:2977: yūyaṃ te bhikṣavastena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan //
K10bsu036_u:2978: ye ca mama parinirvṛtasya anāgate 'dhvani śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:2981: kiṃcāpi te bhikṣavaḥ sarve parinirvāṇasaṃjñinaḥ parinirvāsyanti,
K10bsu036_u:2982: api tu khalu punarbhikṣavo yadahamanyāsu lokadhātuṣvanyonyairnāmadheyairviharāmi,
K10bsu036_u:2984: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:2988: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ samaye tathāgataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamayamātmanaḥ samanupaśyati,
K10bsu036_u:2989: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
K10bsu036_u:2990: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati /
K10bsu036_u:2991: na bhikṣavaḥ kiṃcidasti loke dvitīyaṃ nāma yānaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:2993: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
K10bsu036_u:2995: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram /
K10bsu036_u:2996: mahāṃścātra janakāyaḥ pratipanno bhaved ratnadīpaṃ gamanāya /
K10bsu036_u:2997: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām /

K10bsu036_u:3213: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dvāvāhārau bhaviṣyataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3216: aprameyāṇi cāsaṃkhyeyāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti sarveṣāṃ ca mahābhijñāprāptānāṃ pratisaṃvidgatiṃgatānāṃ sattvāvavādakuśalānām
K10bsu036_u:3217: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāścāsya śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti maharddhikā mahānubhāvā aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyinaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3222: parinirvṛtasya ca tasya bhagavato dharmaprabhāsasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saddharmaścirasthāyī bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:3223: ratnamayaiśca stūpaiḥ sā lokadhātuḥ sphuṭā bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:3227: śṛṇotha me bhikṣava etamarthaṃ yathā carī mahya sutena cīrṇā /
K10bsu036_u:3228: upāyakauśalyasuśikṣitena yathā ca cīrṇā iya bodhicaryā // Saddhp_8.1 //
K10bsu036_u:3229: hīnādhimuktā ima sattva jñātvā udārayāne ca samuttrasanti /
K10bsu036_u:3231: tatu śrāvakā bhontimi bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ ca nidarśayanti // Saddhp_8.2 //
K10bsu036_u:3233: evaṃ ca bhāṣanti vayaṃ hi śrāvakā dūre vayaṃ uttamamagrabodhiyā // Saddhp_8.3 //
K10bsu036_u:3234: etāṃ cariṃ teṣvanuśikṣamāṇāḥ paripāku gacchanti hi sattvakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3235: hīnādhimuktāśca kusīdarūpā anupūrva te sarvi bhavanti buddhāḥ // Saddhp_8.4 //
K10bsu036_u:3236: ajñānacaryāṃ ca caranti ete vayaṃ khalu śrāvaka alpakṛtyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3237: nirviṇṇa sarvāsu cyutopapattiṣu svakaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pariśodhayanti // Saddhp_8.5 //
K10bsu036_u:3238: sarāgatāmātmani darśayanti sadoṣatāṃ cāpi samohatāṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:3239: dṛṣṭīvilagnāṃśca viditva sattvāṃsteṣāṃ pi dṛṣṭiṃ samupāśrayanti // Saddhp_8.6 //
K10bsu036_u:3240: evaṃ caranto bahu mahya śrāvakāḥ sattvānupāyena vimocayanti /
K10bsu036_u:3241: unmādu gaccheyu narā avidvasū sa caiva sarvaṃ caritaṃ prakāśayet // Saddhp_8.7 //
K10bsu036_u:3242: pūrṇo ayaṃ śrāvaka mahya bhikṣavaścarito purā buddhasahasrakoṭiṣu /
K10bsu036_u:3243: teṣāṃ ca saddharma parigrahīṣīd bauddhaṃ idaṃ jñāna gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_8.8 //
K10bsu036_u:3244: sarvatra caiṣo abhu agraśrāvako bahuśrutaścitrakathī viśāradaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3245: saṃharṣakaścā akilāsi nityaṃ sada buddhakṛtyena ca pratyupasthitaḥ // Saddhp_8.9 //
K10bsu036_u:3247: mahāabhijñāsu sadā gatiṃgataḥ pratisaṃvidānāṃ ca abhūṣi lābhī /
K10bsu036_u:3248: sattvāna co indriyagocarajño dharmaṃ ca deśeti sadā viśuddham // Saddhp_8.10 //
K10bsu036_u:3249: saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ ca prakāśayantaḥ paripācayī sattvasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3250: anuttarasminniha agrayāne kṣetraṃ svakaṃ śreṣṭhu viśodhayantaḥ // Saddhp_8.11 //
K10bsu036_u:3251: anāgate cāpi tathaiva adhve pūjeṣyatī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3252: saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ ca parigrahīṣyati svakaṃ ca kṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyati // Saddhp_8.12 //
K10bsu036_u:3254: bahūṃśca sattvān paripācayiṣyati sarvajñajñānasmi anāsravasmin // Saddhp_8.13 //
K10bsu036_u:3255: so pūja kṛtvā naranāyakānāṃ saddharma śreṣṭhaṃ sada dhārayitvā /
K10bsu036_u:3256: bhaviṣyatī buddha svayaṃbhu loke dharmaprabhāso diśatāsu viśrutaḥ // Saddhp_8.14 //
K10bsu036_u:3257: kṣetraṃ ca tasya suviśuddha bheṣyatī ratnāna saptāna sadā viśiṣṭam /
K10bsu036_u:3258: ratnavabhāsaśca sa kalpu bheṣyatī suviśuddha so bheṣyati lokadhātuḥ // Saddhp_8.15 //
K10bsu036_u:3260: yehi sphuṭo bheṣyati lokadhātuḥ suviśuddha śuddhehi maharddhikehi // Saddhp_8.16 //
K10bsu036_u:3261: atha śrāvakāṇāṃ pi sahasrakoṭyaḥ saṃghastadā bheṣyati nāyakasya /
K10bsu036_u:3264: sarve ca sattvāstahi buddhakṣetre śuddhā bhaviṣyanti ca brahmacāriṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3266: āhārasaṃjñā ca na tatra bheṣyati anyatra dharme rati dhyānaprītiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3267: na mātṛgrāmo 'pi ca tatra bheṣyati na cāpyapāyāna ca durgatībhayam // Saddhp_8.19 //
K10bsu036_u:3269: ākīrṇa sattvehi subhadrakehi yatkiṃcimātraṃ pi idaṃ prakāśitam // Saddhp_8.20 //
K10bsu036_u:3270: atha khalu teṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ vaśībhūtaśatānāmetadabhavat - āścaryaprāpta sma,
K10bsu036_u:3274: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma - imāni kāśyapa dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni,
K10bsu036_u:3277: tatra kāśyapa kauṇḍinyo bhikṣurmahāśrāvako dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ samantaprabhāso nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:3278: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:3279: tatra kāśyapa anenaikena nāmadheyena pañca tathāgataśatāni bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:3282: tadyathā gayākāśyapo nadīkāśyapaḥ urubilvakāśyapaḥ kālaḥ kālodāyī aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo bakkulaścundaḥ svāgataḥ ityevaṃpramukhāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatāni //
K10bsu036_u:3283: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3284: kauṇḍinyagotro mama śrāvako 'yaṃ tathāgato bheṣyati lokanāthaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3286: samantaprabho nāma jino bhaviṣyati kṣetraṃ ca tasya pariśuddha bheṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:3288: anantakalpasmi anāgate 'dhvani dṛṣṭvāna buddhān bahavo hyanantān // Saddhp_8.22 //
K10bsu036_u:3292: viharanta tatra anucintayanti viśuddhaśīlā sada sādhuvṛttayaḥ // Saddhp_8.24 //
K10bsu036_u:3293: śrutvāna dharmaṃ dvipadottamasya anyāni kṣetrāṇyapi co sadā te /
K10bsu036_u:3294: vrajanti te buddhasahasravandakāḥ pūjāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāṃ karonti // Saddhp_8.25 //
K10bsu036_u:3295: kṣeṇena te cāpi tadāsya kṣetraṃ pratyāgamiṣyanti vināyakasya /
K10bsu036_u:3296: prabhāsanāmasya narottamasya caryābalaṃ tādṛśakaṃ bhaviṣyati // Saddhp_8.26 //
K10bsu036_u:3298: tataśca bhūyo dviguṇena tāyinaḥ parinirvṛtasyeha sa dharma sthāsyati // Saddhp_8.27 //
K10bsu036_u:3299: pratirūpakaścāsya bhaviṣyate punastriguṇaṃ tato ettakameva kālam /
K10bsu036_u:3300: saddharmabhraṣṭe tada tasya tāyino dukhitā bhaviṣyanti narā marū ca // Saddhp_8.28 //
K10bsu036_u:3302: paripūrṇa pañcāśata nāyakānāṃ ete bhaviṣyanti paraṃparāya // Saddhp_8.29 //
K10bsu036_u:3304: sarveṣa etādṛśakāśca vyūhā ṛddhibalaṃ ca tatha buddhakṣetram /
K10bsu036_u:3305: gaṇaśca saddharma tathaiva īdṛśaḥ saddharmasthānaṃ ca samaṃ bhaviṣyati // Saddhp_8.30 //
K10bsu036_u:3306: sarveṣametādṛśakaṃ bhaviṣyati nāmaṃ tadā loki sadevakasmin /
K10bsu036_u:3307: yathā mayā pūrvi prakīrtitāsīt samantaprabhāsasya narottamasya // Saddhp_8.31 //
K10bsu036_u:3308: paraṃparā eva tathānyamanyaṃ te vyākariṣyanti hitānukampī /
K10bsu036_u:3309: anantarāyaṃ mama adya bheṣyati yathaiva śāsāmyahu sarvalokam // Saddhp_8.32 //
K10bsu036_u:3310: evaṃ khu ete tvamihādya kāśyapa dhārehi pañcāśatanūnakāni /
K10bsu036_u:3311: vaśibhūta ye cāpi mamānyaśrāvakāḥ kathayāhi cānyeṣvapi śrāvakeṣu // Saddhp_8.33 //
K10bsu036_u:3312: atha khalu tāni pañcārhacchatāni bhagavataḥ saṃmukhamātmano vyākaraṇāni śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasa pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
K10bsu036_u:3313: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirobhirnipatya evamāhuḥ - atyayaṃ vayaṃ bhagavan deśayāmo yairasmābhirbhagavannevaṃ satatasamitaṃ cittaṃ paribhāvitam - idamasmākaṃ parinirvāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:3317: yairnāma asmābhirbhagavaṃstathāgatajñāne 'bhisaṃboddhavye evaṃrūpeṇa parīttena jñānena paritoṣaṃ gatāḥ sma /
K10bsu036_u:3318: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kasyacideva puruṣasya kaṃcideva mitragṛhaṃ praviṣṭasya mattasya
K10bsu036_u:3319: vā suptasya vā sa mitro 'narghamaṇiratnaṃ vastrānte badhnīyāt - asyedaṃ maṇiratnaṃ bhavatviti /
K10bsu036_u:3320: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣa utthāyāsanāt prakāmet /
K10bsu036_u:3324: mahatā ca vyāyāmena kathaṃcit kaṃcidāhāraṃ pratilabheta /
K10bsu036_u:3326: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya sa purāṇamitraḥ puruṣo yena tasya tadanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte baddham,
K10bsu036_u:3328: tamevaṃ vadet - kiṃ tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṛcchramāpadyase āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3329: yadā yāvad bhoḥ puruṣa mayā tava sukhavihārārthaṃ sarvakāmanivartakamanargheyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ vastrānte upanibaddham /
K10bsu036_u:3332: na ca nāma tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa pratyavekṣase - kiṃ mama baddhaṃ yena vā baddhaṃ ko hetuḥ kiṃnidānaṃ vā (Vaidya 135)
K10bsu036_u:3334: bālajātīyastvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yastvaṃ kṛcchreṇa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇastuṣṭimāpadyase /
K10bsu036_u:3335: gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa etanmaṇiratnaṃ grahāya mahānagaraṃ gatvā parivartayastva /
K10bsu036_u:3336: tena ca dhanena sarvāṇi dhanakaraṇīyāni kuruṣveti //
K10bsu036_u:3337: evameva bhagavan asmākamapi tathāgatena pūrvameva bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvajñatācittānyutpāditānyabhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:3338: tāni ca vayaṃ bhagavan na jānīmo na budhyāmahe /
K10bsu036_u:3339: te vayaṃ bhagavan arhadbhūmau nirvṛtāḥ sma iti saṃjānīmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3341: yadvayaṃ bhagavan evaṃ parīttena jñānena paritoṣamāpadyāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3343: te vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena saṃbodhyamānāḥ - mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava etannirvāṇaṃ manyadhvam /
K10bsu036_u:3344: saṃvidyante bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ saṃtāne kuśalamūlāni yāni mayā pūrvaṃ paripācitāni /
K10bsu036_u:3345: etarhi ca mamaivedamupāyakauśalyaṃ dharmadeśanābhilāpena yad yūyametarhi nirvāṇamiti manyadhve /
K10bsu036_u:3346: evaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavatā saṃbodhayitvā adyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāḥ //
K10bsu036_u:3347: atha khalu tāni pañca vaśībhūtaśatānyājñātakauṇḍinyapramukhāni tasyāṃ velāyamimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:3348: hṛṣṭā prahṛṣṭā sma śruṇitva etāṃ āśvāsanāmīdṛśikāmanuttarām /
K10bsu036_u:3349: yaṃ vyākṛtāḥ sma paramāgrabodhaye namo 'stu te nāyaka nantacakṣuḥ // Saddhp_8.34 //
K10bsu036_u:3350: deśemahe atyayu tubhyamantike yathaiva bālā avidū ajānakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3351: yaṃ vai vayaṃ nirvṛtimātrakeṇa parituṣṭa āsīt sugatasya śāsane // Saddhp_8.35 //
K10bsu036_u:3352: yathāpi puruṣo bhavi kaścideva praviṣṭa sa syādiha mitraśālam /
K10bsu036_u:3353: mitraṃ ca tasya dhanavantamāḍhyaṃ so tasya dadyād bahū khādyabhojyam // Saddhp_8.36 //
K10bsu036_u:3354: saṃtarpayitvāna ca bhojanena anekamūlyaṃ ratanaṃ ca dadyāt /
K10bsu036_u:3355: baddhvāntarīye vasanānti granthiṃ datvā ca tasyeha bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ // Saddhp_8.37 //
K10bsu036_u:3356: so cāpi prakrāntu bhaveta bālo utthāya so 'nyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajeta /
K10bsu036_u:3357: so kṛcchraprāptaḥ kṛpaṇo gaveṣī āhāra paryeṣati khidyamānaḥ // Saddhp_8.38 //
K10bsu036_u:3359: paryeṣitaḥ bhojananirvṛtaḥ syād bhaktaṃ udāraṃ avicintayantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3360: taṃ cāpi ratnaṃ hi bhaveta vismṛtaṃ baddhvāntarīye smṛtirasya nāsti // Saddhp_8.39 //
K10bsu036_u:3361: tameva so paśyati pūrvamitro yenāsya dattaṃ ratanaṃ gṛhe sve /
K10bsu036_u:3362: tameva suṣṭhū paribhāṣayitvā darśeti ratnaṃ vasanāntarasmin // Saddhp_8.40 //
K10bsu036_u:3363: dṛṣṭvā ca so paramasukhaiḥ samarpito ratnasya tasyo anubhāva īdṛśaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3364: mahādhanī kośabalī ca so bhavet samarpitaḥ kāmaguṇehi pañcahi // Saddhp_8.41 //
K10bsu036_u:3366: tathāgatenaiva idaṃ hi dattaṃ bhaveṣu pūrveṣviha dīrgharātram // Saddhp_8.42 //
K10bsu036_u:3367: vayaṃ ca bhagavanniha bālabuddhayo ajānakāḥ smo sugatasya śāsane /
K10bsu036_u:3368: nirvāṇamātreṇa vayaṃ hi tuṣṭā na uttarī prārthayi nāpi cintayī // Saddhp_8.43 //
K10bsu036_u:3369: vayaṃ ca saṃbodhita lokabandhunā na eṣa etādṛśa kāci nirvṛtiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3370: jñānaṃ praṇītaṃ puruṣottamānāṃ yā nirvṛtīyaṃ paramaṃ ca saukhyam // Saddhp_8.44 //
K10bsu036_u:3371: idaṃ cudāraṃ vipulaṃ bahūvidhaṃ anuttaraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca śrutvā /
K10bsu036_u:3372: prītā udagrā vipulā sma jātāḥ parasparaṃ vyākaraṇāya nātha // Saddhp_8.45 //
K10bsu036_u:3376: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cintayāmāsa - apyeva nāma vayamevaṃrūpaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhemahi /
K10bsu036_u:3377: evaṃ ca cintayitvā anuvicintya prārthayitvā utthāyāsanād bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya,
K10bsu036_u:3378: āyuṣmāṃśca rāhulo 'pyevaṃ cintayitvā anuvicintya prārthayitvā bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya evaṃ vācamabhāṣata - asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avasaro bhavatu /
K10bsu036_u:3380: asmākaṃ hi bhagavān pitā janako layanaṃ trāṇaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:3381: vayaṃ hi bhagavan sadevamānuṣāsure loke 'tīva citrīkṛtāḥ - bhagavataścaite putraḥ bhagavataścopasthāyakāḥ bhagavataśca dharmakośaṃ dhārayantīti
K10bsu036_u:3382: tannāma bhagavan kṣiprameva pratirūpaṃ bhaved yad bhagavānasmākaṃ vyākuryādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K10bsu036_u:3383: anye ca dve bhikṣusahasre sātireke śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāmutthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3384: kṛtvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavantamullokayamāne tasthatuḥ etāmeva
K10bsu036_u:3385: cintāmanuvicintayamāne yaduta idameva buddhajñānam - apyeva nāma vayamapi vyākaraṇaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3387: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - bhaviṣyasi tvamānanda anāgate
K10bsu036_u:3389: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
K10bsu036_u:3395: sa tvamānanda anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃbuddhaḥ samāno viṃśatigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi paripācayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:3396: samṛddhaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati vaiḍūryamayaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:3399: aparimitāṃśca kalpāṃstasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:3400: yeṣāṃ kalpānāṃ na śakyaṃ gaṇanayā paryanto 'dhigantum /
K10bsu036_u:3401: tāvadasaṃkhyeyāni tāni kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tasya bhagavata āyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:3402: yāvacca ānanda tasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:3406: tasya khalu punarānanda sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasya daśasu dikṣu bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyanti //
K10bsu036_u:3407: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3408: ārocayāmi ahu bhikṣusaṃghe ānandabhadro mama dharmadhārakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3410: anāgate 'dhvāni jino bhaviṣyati pūjitva ṣaṣṭiṃ sugatāna koṭyaḥ // Saddhp_9.1 //
K10bsu036_u:3411: nāmena so sāgarabuddhidhārī abhijñaprāpto iti tatra viśrutaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3413: tahi bodhisattvā yathā gaṅgavālikāstataśca bhūyo paripācayiṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:3414: maharddhikaśco sa jino bhaviṣyati daśaddiśe lokavighuṣṭaśabdaḥ // Saddhp_9.3 //
K10bsu036_u:3415: amitaṃ ca tasyāyu tadā bhaviṣyati yaḥ sthāsyate lokahitānukampakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3416: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tāyino dviguṇaṃ ca saddharmu sa tasya sthāsyati // Saddhp_9.4 //
K10bsu036_u:3417: pratirūpakaṃ taddviguṇena bhūyaḥ saṃsthāsyate tasya jinasya śāsane /
K10bsu036_u:3418: tadāpi sattvā yathā gaṅgavālikā hetuṃ janeṣyantiha buddhabodhau // Saddhp_9.5 //
K10bsu036_u:3419: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi navayānasaṃprasthitānāmaṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - na bodhisattvānāmapi tāvadasmābhirevamudāraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3423: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥ parivitarkamājñāya tān bodhisattvānāmantrayāmāsa
K10bsu036_u:3424: - samamasmābhiḥ kulaputrā ekakṣaṇe ekamuhūrte mayā ca ānandena ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu036_u:3429: ayaṃ punarānandabhadro buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmakośadhara eva bhavati sma - yaduta bodhisattvānāṃ pariniṣpattihetoḥ praṇidhānametatkulaputrā asya kulaputrasyeti //
K10bsu036_u:3430: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavato 'ntikādātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:3434: tasmiṃśca samaye bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ saddharmamanusmarati sma,
K10bsu036_u:3438: āścaryabhūtā jina aprameyā ye smārayanti mama dharmadeśanām /
K10bsu036_u:3439: parinirvṛtānāṃ hi jināna tāyināṃ samanusmarāmī yatha adya śvo vā // Saddhp_9.6 //
K10bsu036_u:3441: paricārako 'haṃ sugatasya bhomi saddharma dhāremi ca bodhikāraṇāt // Saddhp_9.7 //
K10bsu036_u:3442: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ rāhulabhadramāmantrayate sma - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ rāhulabhadra
K10bsu036_u:3444: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
K10bsu036_u:3447: sadā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jyeṣṭhaputro bhaviṣyasi tadyathāpi nāma mamaitarhi /
K10bsu036_u:3448: tasya khalu punā rāhulabhadra bhagavataḥ saptaratnapadmavikrāntagāminastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpamevāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:3449: evaṃ rūpaiva sarvākāraguṇasaṃpad bhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma tasya bhagavataḥ sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya
K10bsu036_u:3451: tasyāpi rāhula sāgaravaradharabuddhivikrīḍitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tvameva jyeṣṭhaputro bhaviṣyasi /
K10bsu036_u:3453: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3454: ayaṃ mamā rāhula jyeṣṭhaputro yo auraso āsi kumārabhāve /
K10bsu036_u:3455: bodhiṃ pi prāptasya mamaiṣa putro dharmasya dāyādyadharo maharṣiḥ // Saddhp_9.8 //
K10bsu036_u:3456: anāgate 'dhve bahubuddhakoṭyo yān drakṣyase yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
K10bsu036_u:3457: sarveṣa teṣāṃ hi jināna putro bhaviṣyatī bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_9.9 //
K10bsu036_u:3459: ajñātacaryā iya rāhulasya praṇidhānametasya ahaṃ prajānami /
K10bsu036_u:3460: karoti saṃvarṇana lokabandhuṣu ahaṃ kilā putra tathāgatasya // Saddhp_9.10 //
K10bsu036_u:3461: guṇāna koṭīnayutāprameyāḥ pramāṇu yeṣāṃ na kadācidasti /
K10bsu036_u:3462: ye rāhulasyeha mamaurasatya tathā hi eṣo sthitu bodhikāraṇāt // Saddhp_9.11 //
K10bsu036_u:3463: adrākṣītkhalu punarbhagavāṃste dve śrāvakasahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ bhagavantamavalokayamāne abhimukhaṃ prasannacitte mṛducitte mārdavacitte
K10bsu036_u:3464: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - paśyasi tvamānanda ete dve śrāvakasahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇām?
K10bsu036_u:3467: bhagavānāha - sarva evaite ānanda dve bhikṣu sahasre samaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ samudānayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3468: pañcāśallokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃśca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā
K10bsu036_u:3469: pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyitvā saddharma ca dhārayitvā paścime samucchraye ekakṣaṇenaikamuhūrtenaikalavenaikasaṃnipātena
K10bsu036_u:3470: daśasu dikṣvanyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu sveṣu sveṣu buddhakṣetreṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
K10bsu036_u:3471: ratnaketurājā nāma tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:3477: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3478: dve vai sahasre ime śrāvakāṇāṃ ānanda ye te mama agrataḥ sthitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3479: tān vyākaromī ahamadya paṇḍitānanāgate 'dhvāni tathāgatatve // Saddhp_9.12 //
K10bsu036_u:3480: ananta aupamyanidarśanehi buddhāna agryāṃ kariyāṇa pūjām /
K10bsu036_u:3481: ārāgayiṣyanti mamāgrabodhiṃ sthihitva carimasmi samucchrayasmin // Saddhp_9.13 //
K10bsu036_u:3482: ekena nāmena daśaddiśāsu kṣaṇasmi ekasmi tathā muhūrte /
K10bsu036_u:3484: niṣadya ca drumapravarāṇa mūle buddhā bhaviṣyanti spṛśitva jñānam // Saddhp_9.14 //
K10bsu036_u:3485: ekaṃ ca teṣāmiti nāma bheṣyati ratnasya ketūtiha loki viśrutāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3486: samāni kṣetrāṇi varāṇi teṣāṃ samo gaṇaḥ śrāvakabodhisattvāḥ // Saddhp_9.15 //
K10bsu036_u:3487: ṛddhiprabhūtā iha sarvi loke samantataste daśasu ddiśāsu /
K10bsu036_u:3488: dharmaṃ prakāśetva yadāpi nirvṛtāḥ saddharmu teṣāṃ samameva sthāsyati // Saddhp_9.16 //
K10bsu036_u:3489: atha khalu te śaikṣāśaikṣāḥ śrāvakā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhaṃ svāni svāni vyākaraṇāni
K10bsu036_u:3490: śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskāḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:3491: tṛptāḥ sma lokapradyota śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ idam /
K10bsu036_u:3492: amṛtena yathā siktāḥ sukhitāḥ sama tathāgata // Saddhp_9.17 //
K10bsu036_u:3494: adyāsmābhiḥ sukhaṃ prāptaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ idam // Saddhp_9.18 //
K10bsu036_u:3495: ityāryasaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye ānandarāhulābhyāmanyābhyāṃ ca dvābhyāṃ bhikṣusahasrābhyāṃ vyākaraṇaparivarto nāma navamaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:3498: atha khalu bhagavan bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya tānyaśītiṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇyāmantrayate
K10bsu036_u:3499: sma - paśyasi tvaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja asyāṃ parṣadi bahudevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyān
K10bsu036_u:3504: bhagavānāha - sarve svalvete bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3505: yairasyāṃ parṣadi antaśaḥ ekāpi gāthā śrutā,
K10bsu036_u:3508: sarvā etā ahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja catasraḥ parṣado vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:3509: ye 'pi kecid bhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3512: tānapyahaṃ bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrān va kuladuhitṛrvā vyākaromyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:3513: paripūrṇabuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraparyupāsitāvinaste bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaiṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:3516: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti prakāśayiṣyanti saṃgrāhayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3522: ye kecid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi dhārayiṣyanti anumodayiṣyanti vā,
K10bsu036_u:3524: tatra bhaiṣajyarāja yaḥ kaścidanyataraḥ puruṣo vā strī vā evaṃ vadet - kīdṛśāḥ khalvapi te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti?
K10bsu036_u:3525: tasya bhaiṣajyarāja puruṣasya vā striyā vā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā darśayitavyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3526: ya ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayitā śrāvayitā vā deśayitā vā sagauravo veha dharmaparyāye /
K10bsu036_u:3527: ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
K10bsu036_u:3531: sa hi bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va tathāgato veditavyaḥ sadevakena lokena /
K10bsu036_u:3534: kaḥ punarvādo ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāpta mudgṛhṇīyād dhārayedvā vācayedvā paryavāpnuyādvā prakāśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā,
K10bsu036_u:3536: tatra ca pustake satkāraṃ kuryāt gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvādyāñjalinamaskāraiḥ praṇāmaiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3538: sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3540: lokasya hitānukampakaḥ praṇidhānavaśenopapanno 'smin jambudvīpe manuṣyeṣu asya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanatāyaiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3541: yaḥ svayamudāraṃ dharmābhisaṃskāramudārāṃ ca buddhakṣetropapattiṃ sthāpayitvā asya
K10bsu036_u:3545: bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3546: tathāgatakṛtyakarastathāgatasaṃpreṣitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saṃjñātavyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3547: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saṃprakāśayet,
K10bsu036_u:3548: antaśo rahasi cauryeṇāpi kasyacidekasattvasyāpi saṃprakāśayedācakṣīta vā //
K10bsu036_u:3549: yaḥ khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva sattvo duṣṭacittaḥ pāpacitto raudracittastathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ kalpamavarṇaṃ bhāṣet,
K10bsu036_u:3550: yaśca teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmasya sūtrāntasya dhārakāṇāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā ekāmapi vācamapriyāṃ saṃśrāvayed bhūtāṃ vā abhūtāṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:3553: tathāgatabhāraṇapratimaṇḍitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3555: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati /
K10bsu036_u:3557: tena tenaiva sattvairañjalīkaraṇīyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyo
K10bsu036_u:3560: sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3563: apyeva nāma ekavāramapi imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃśrāvayet,
K10bsu036_u:3564: yaṃ śrutvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpadyeyuḥ //
K10bsu036_u:3565: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3567: satkartavyāśca te sattvā ye dhārenti imaṃ nayam // Saddhp_10.1 //
K10bsu036_u:3568: sarvajñatvaṃ ca yo icchet kathaṃ śīrghaṃ bhavediti /
K10bsu036_u:3569: sa imaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ satkuryādvāpi dhārakam // Saddhp_10.2 //
K10bsu036_u:3572: upapattiṃ śūbhāṃ tyaktvā sa dhīra iha āgataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3574: upapatti vaśā tasya yena so dṛśyate tahi /
K10bsu036_u:3575: paścime kāli bhāṣanto idaṃ sūtraṃ niruttaram // Saddhp_10.5 //
K10bsu036_u:3577: divyehi puṣpehi ca satkareta mānuṣyakaiścāpi hi sarvagandhaiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3578: divyehi vastrehi ca chādayeyā ratnehi abhyokiri dharmabhāṇakam // Saddhp_10.6 //
K10bsu036_u:3579: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhaveta nityaṃ yathā jinendrasya svayaṃbhuvastathā /
K10bsu036_u:3580: yaḥ paścime kāli subhairave 'smin parinirvṛtasya ida sutra dhārayet // Saddhp_10.7 //
K10bsu036_u:3581: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vihāraśayyāsanavastrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3582: dadeya pūjārtha jinātmajasya apyekavāraṃ pi vadeta sūtram // Saddhp_10.8 //
K10bsu036_u:3583: tathāgatānāṃ karaṇīya kurvate mayā ca so preṣita mānuṣaṃ bhavam /
K10bsu036_u:3584: yaḥ sūtrametaccarimasmi kāle likheya dhāreya śruṇeya vāpi // Saddhp_10.9 //
K10bsu036_u:3585: yaścaiva sthitveha jinasya saṃmukhaṃ śrāvedavarṇaṃ paripūrṇakalpam /
K10bsu036_u:3586: praduṣṭacitto bhṛkuṭiṃ karitvā bahuṃ naro 'sau prasaveta pāpam // Saddhp_10.10 //
K10bsu036_u:3588: avarṇamākrośa vadeya teṣāṃ bahūtaraṃ tasya vadāmi pāpam // Saddhp_10.11 //
K10bsu036_u:3589: naraśca yo saṃmukha saṃstaveyā kṛtāñjalī māṃ paripūrṇakalpam /
K10bsu036_u:3591: bahuṃ khu so tatra labheta puṇyaṃ māṃ saṃstavitvāna praharṣajātaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3593: ataśca so bahutarakaṃ labheta yo varṇa teṣāṃ pravadenmanuṣyaḥ // Saddhp_10.13 //
K10bsu036_u:3594: aṣṭādaśa kalpasahasrakoṭyo yasteṣu pusteṣu karoti pūjām /
K10bsu036_u:3595: śabdehi rūpehi rasehi cāpi divyaiśca gandhaiśca sparśaiśca divyaiḥ // Saddhp_10.14 //
K10bsu036_u:3596: karitva pustāna tathaiva pūjāṃ aṣṭādaśa kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3597: yadi śruṇo ekaśa eta sūtraṃ āścaryalābho 'sya bhavenmahāniti // Saddhp_10.15 //
K10bsu036_u:3600: bahavo hi mayā bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyā bhāṣitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3602: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ bhaiṣajyarāja dharmaparyāyāṇāmayameva dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīkaḥ sarvalokāśraddadhanīyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3606: api tu khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja tathāgatacīvaracchannāste kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā veditavyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3610: tathāgatavihāraikasthānanivāsinaśca te bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3612: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śraddadhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti
K10bsu036_u:3613: yasmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā,
K10bsu036_u:3614: tasmin bhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatacaityaṃ kārayitavyaṃ mahantaṃ ratnamayamuccaṃ pragṛhītam /
K10bsu036_u:3618: yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā paṭhyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā likhyeta vā likhito vā pustakagatastiṣṭhet /
K10bsu036_u:3619: tasmiṃśca stūpe satkāro gurukāro mānanā pūjanā arcanā karaṇīyā sarvapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ
K10bsu036_u:3621: ye ca khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sattvāstaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ labheran vandanāya pūjanāya darśanāya vā,
K10bsu036_u:3622: sarve te bhaiṣajyarāja abhyāsannībhūtā veditavyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3626: na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā likhanāya vā pūjanāya vā /
K10bsu036_u:3627: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti,
K10bsu036_u:3631: tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:3633: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī /
K10bsu036_u:3635: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam,
K10bsu036_u:3638: atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet,
K10bsu036_u:3640: atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ - āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti /
K10bsu036_u:3641: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:3644: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti
K10bsu036_u:3650: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet,
K10bsu036_u:3651: navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3652: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
K10bsu036_u:3653: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:3654: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ
K10bsu036_u:3655: tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ
K10bsu036_u:3656: prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane niṣadya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3662: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam /
K10bsu036_u:3667: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3671: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3676: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:3678: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3680: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā // Saddhp_10.16 //
K10bsu036_u:3681: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale /
K10bsu036_u:3682: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.17 //
K10bsu036_u:3683: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:3684: idaṃ nimittaṃ dūre syāt śuṣkapāṃsuritotsṛtaḥ // Saddhp_10.18 //
K10bsu036_u:3685: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3686: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha // Saddhp_10.19 //
K10bsu036_u:3687: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3688: aśṛṇvanta idaṃ sūtramabhāvitvā punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.20 //
K10bsu036_u:3690: sūtrarājaṃ śruṇiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti vā sakṛt // Saddhp_10.21 //
K10bsu036_u:3691: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3692: yathaiva cārdre pāṃsusmin āsannaṃ jalamucyate // Saddhp_10.22 //
K10bsu036_u:3693: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram /
K10bsu036_u:3694: mamāsane niṣīditvā abhīto bhāṣi paṇḍitaḥ // Saddhp_10.23 //
K10bsu036_u:3696: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet // Saddhp_10.24 //
K10bsu036_u:3697: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā /
K10bsu036_u:3698: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet // Saddhp_10.25 //
K10bsu036_u:3701: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte /
K10bsu036_u:3702: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān // Saddhp_10.27 //
K10bsu036_u:3705: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api // Saddhp_10.28 //
K10bsu036_u:3707: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ // Saddhp_10.29 //
K10bsu036_u:3709: narairvirahite deśe aṭavyāṃ parvateṣu vā // Saddhp_10.30 //
K10bsu036_u:3711: skhalitaṃ cāsya svādhyāyamuccāriṣye punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.31 //
K10bsu036_u:3712: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3713: devān yakṣāṃśca preṣiṣye sahāyāṃstasya naikaśaḥ // Saddhp_10.32 //
K10bsu036_u:3714: etādṛśāstasya guṇā bhavanti caturṇa parṣāṇa prakāśakasya /
K10bsu036_u:3715: eko vihāre vanakandareṣu svādhyāya kurvantu mamāhi paśyet // Saddhp_10.33 //
K10bsu036_u:3716: pratibhāna tasya bhavatī asaṅgaṃ nirukti dharmāṇa bahū prajānāti /
K10bsu036_u:3717: toṣeti so prāṇisahasrakoṭyaḥ yathāpi buddhena adhiṣṭhitatvāt // Saddhp_10.34 //
K10bsu036_u:3718: ye cāpi tasyāśrita bhonti sattvāste bodhisattvā laghu bhonti sarve /
K10bsu036_u:3719: tatsaṃgatiṃ cāpi niṣevamāṇāḥ paśyanti buddhāna yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ // Saddhp_10.35 //
K10bsu036_u:3723: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo 'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena /
K10bsu036_u:3724: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ
K10bsu036_u:3726: ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3727: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:3729: tadyathā - suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya musāragalvasyāśmagarbhasya lohitamukteḥ karketanasya /
K10bsu036_u:3730: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti
K10bsu036_u:3731: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
K10bsu036_u:3735: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe
K10bsu036_u:3736: sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo
K10bsu036_u:3738: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3741: ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati?
K10bsu036_u:3742: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati ekaghanaḥ
K10bsu036_u:3745: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3747: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt - ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:3748: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:3749: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3751: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
K10bsu036_u:3752: parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
K10bsu036_u:3753: prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam - mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya
K10bsu036_u:3756: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt
K10bsu036_u:3757: - ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ (Vaidya 150)
K10bsu036_u:3760: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet /
K10bsu036_u:3761: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt /
K10bsu036_u:3764: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe 'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma //
K10bsu036_u:3765: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena
K10bsu036_u:3766: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tasya khalu
K10bsu036_u:3769: etadasya praṇidhānam - yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3770: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo 'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam /
K10bsu036_u:3771: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
K10bsu036_u:3772: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3773: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K10bsu036_u:3774: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām /
K10bsu036_u:3776: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K10bsu036_u:3778: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai
K10bsu036_u:3780: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti
K10bsu036_u:3782: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
K10bsu036_u:3785: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu036_u:3786: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu036_u:3796: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu036_u:3797: bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
K10bsu036_u:3800: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma - gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
K10bsu036_u:3803: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:3804: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī
K10bsu036_u:3810: iti hi tasmin samaye ye 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:3812: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:3813: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:3814: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:3816: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam /
K10bsu036_u:3818: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan //
K10bsu036_u:3819: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:3820: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:3821: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma /
K10bsu036_u:3829: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca (Vaidya
K10bsu036_u:3832: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt /
K10bsu036_u:3833: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma /
K10bsu036_u:3834: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham
K10bsu036_u:3845: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā //
K10bsu036_u:3846: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
K10bsu036_u:3848: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:3849: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:3850: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam /
K10bsu036_u:3851: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma - gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam /
K10bsu036_u:3852: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3853: vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3856: evaṃ ca vadadhvam - dadāti khalu punarbhagavāṃstathāgataśchandamasya mahāratnastūpasya samuddhāṭane /
K10bsu036_u:3857: evaṃ te tathāgatāḥ sarve svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayāmāsuḥ //
K10bsu036_u:3858: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svānnirmitānaśeṣataḥ samāgatān viditvā,
K10bsu036_u:3863: tāśca sarvāścatasraḥ pariṣadaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo 'ñjalīḥ parigṛhya bhagavato mukhamullokayantyastasthuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3865: mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:3866: samuddhāṭya ca dve bhittī pravisārayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:3868: evameva bhagavāṃstaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ vaihāyasaṃ sthitaṃ dakṣiṇayā hastāṅgulyā madhye samuddhāṭya apāvṛṇoti sma /
K10bsu036_u:3870: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddvā pariśuṣkagātraḥ saṃghaṭitakāyo yathā samādhisamāpannastathā saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10bsu036_u:3871: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
K10bsu036_u:3873: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ bhagavan śākyamune yastvamimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parṣanmadhye bhāṣase /
K10bsu036_u:3875: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3878: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddha
K10bsu036_u:3879: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ divyamānuṣyakai
K10bsu036_u:3881: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasminneva siṃhāsane
K10bsu036_u:3883: evaṃ ca vadati - ihaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato niṣīdatu /
K10bsu036_u:3884: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasminnardhāsane niṣasāda tenaiva tathāgatena sārdham /
K10bsu036_u:3885: ubhau ca tau tathāgatau tasya mahāratnastūpasya madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭau vaihāyasamantarīkṣasthau saṃdṛśyete //
K10bsu036_u:3886: atha khalu tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāmetadabhavat - dūrasthā vayamābhyāṃ tathāgatābhyām /
K10bsu036_u:3888: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya
K10bsu036_u:3889: tasyāṃ velāyāmṛddhibalena tāścatasraḥ parṣado vaihāyasamuparyantarīkṣe pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:3890: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣada āmantrayate
K10bsu036_u:3891: sma - ko bhikṣavo yuṣmākamutsahate tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ
K10bsu036_u:3897: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:3898: ayamāgato nirvṛtako maharṣī ratanāmayaṃ stūpa praviśya nāyakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3899: śravaṇārtha dharmasya imasya bhikṣavaḥ ko dharmahetorna janeta vīryam // Saddhp_11.1 //
K10bsu036_u:3901: bahukalpakoṭīparinirvṛto 'pi so nāma adyāpi śṛṇoti dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:3902: tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati dharmahetoḥ sudurlabho dharma yamevarūpaḥ // Saddhp_11.2 //
K10bsu036_u:3904: parinirvṛto 'pī imu sarvalokaṃ paryeṣatī sarvadaśaddiśāsu // Saddhp_11.3 //
K10bsu036_u:3905: ime ca sarve mama ātmabhāvāḥ sahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3906: te dharmakṛtyasya kṛtena āgatāḥ parinirvṛtaṃ ca imu draṣṭu nātham // Saddhp_11.4 //
K10bsu036_u:3907: choritva kṣetrāṇi svakasvakāni tatha śrāvakāntara marutaśca sarvān /
K10bsu036_u:3908: saddharmasaṃrakṣaṇahetu sarve kathaṃ ciraṃ tiṣṭhiya dharmanetrī // Saddhp_11.5 //
K10bsu036_u:3910: saṃkrāmitā me tatha sarvasattvā ṛddhībalena pariśodhitāśca // Saddhp_11.6 //
K10bsu036_u:3911: etādṛśī utsukatā iyaṃ me kathaṃ prakāśediya dharmanetrī /
K10bsu036_u:3912: ime ca buddhā sthita aprameyā drumāṇa mūle yatha padmarāśiḥ // Saddhp_11.7 //
K10bsu036_u:3914: śobhanti tiṣṭhanti ca nityakālaṃ hutāśaneneva yathāndhakāram // Saddhp_11.8 //
K10bsu036_u:3915: gandho manojño daśasū diśāsu pravāyate lokavināyakānām /
K10bsu036_u:3917: yenā ime mūrcchita sarvasattvā vāte pravāte iha nityakālam // Saddhp_11.9 //
K10bsu036_u:3918: mayi nirvṛte yo etaṃ dharmaparyāyu dhārayet /
K10bsu036_u:3919: kṣipraṃ vyāharatāṃ vācaṃ lokanāthāna saṃmukham // Saddhp_11.10 //
K10bsu036_u:3921: siṃhanādaṃ śruṇe tasya vyavasāyaṃ karoti yaḥ // Saddhp_11.11 //
K10bsu036_u:3922: ahaṃ dvitīyo bahavo ime ca ye koṭiyo āgata nāyakānām /
K10bsu036_u:3923: vyavasāya śroṣyāmi jinasya putrāt yo utsaheddharmamimaṃ prakāśitum // Saddhp_11.12 //
K10bsu036_u:3924: ahaṃ ca tena bhavi pūjitaḥ sadā prabhūtaratnaśca jinaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3925: yo gacchate diśavidiśāsu nityaṃ śravaṇāya dharmaṃ imamevarūpam // Saddhp_11.13 //
K10bsu036_u:3926: ime ca ye āgata lokanāthā vicitritā yairiya śobhitā bhūḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3927: teṣāṃ pi pūjā vipula analpakā kṛtā bhavetsūtraprakāśanena // Saddhp_11.14 //
K10bsu036_u:3928: ahaṃ ca dṛṣṭo iha āsanasmin bhagavāṃśca yo 'yaṃ sthitu stūpamadhye /
K10bsu036_u:3929: ime ca anye bahulokanāthā ye āgatāḥ kṣetraśatairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_11.15 //
K10bsu036_u:3933: tāni kaścitprakāśeta na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.17 //
K10bsu036_u:3935: kṣipeta kṣetrakoṭīyo na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.18 //
K10bsu036_u:3937: kṣipeta kṣetrakoṭīyo na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.19 //
K10bsu036_u:3939: bhavāgre yaśca tiṣṭhitvā dharmaṃ bhāṣennaro iha /
K10bsu036_u:3942: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ bhāṣedvā tatsuduṣkaram // Saddhp_11.21 //
K10bsu036_u:3944: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta na tadbhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.22 //
K10bsu036_u:3946: paścātkāle likheccāpi idaṃ bhavati duṣkaram // Saddhp_11.23 //
K10bsu036_u:3947: pṛthivīdhātuṃ ca yaḥ sarvaṃ nakhāgre saṃpraveśayet /
K10bsu036_u:3948: prakṣipitvā ca gaccheta brahmalokaṃ pi āruhet // Saddhp_11.24 //
K10bsu036_u:3949: na duṣkaraṃ hi so kuryānna ca vīryasya tattakam /
K10bsu036_u:3952: paścātkāle idaṃ sūtraṃ vadeyā yo muhūrtakam // Saddhp_11.26 //
K10bsu036_u:3953: na duṣkaramidaṃ loke kalpadāhasmi yo naraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3956: dhārayitvā idaṃ sūtramekasattvaṃ pi śrāvayet // Saddhp_11.28 //
K10bsu036_u:3959: na hyetaṃ duṣkaraṃ bhoti tasmin kālasmi bhikṣuṇām /
K10bsu036_u:3961: tasyedaṃ duṣkarataraṃ idaṃ sūtraṃ ca dhārayet /
K10bsu036_u:3964: ṣaḍabhijñān mahābhāgān yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // Saddhp_11.32 //
K10bsu036_u:3965: ato bahutaraṃ karma karoti sa narottamaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3966: nirvṛtasya hi yo mahyaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayate varam // Saddhp_11.33 //
K10bsu036_u:3968: adyāpi cāhaṃ bhāṣāmi buddhajñānasya kāraṇāt // Saddhp_11.34 //
K10bsu036_u:3971: dhāreti yo idaṃ sūtraṃ sa dhāre jinavigraham // Saddhp_11.35 //
K10bsu036_u:3973: ya utsahati vaḥ kaścit paścātkālasmi dhāraṇam // Saddhp_11.36 //
K10bsu036_u:3979: dāntabhūmimanuprāptaḥ sūtraṃ dhāreti yo idam // Saddhp_11.39 //
K10bsu036_u:3981: idaṃ sutraṃ prakāśitvā nirvṛte naranāyake // Saddhp_11.40 //
K10bsu036_u:3983: paścime kāli yo bhāṣet sūtramekaṃ muhūrtakam // Saddhp_11.41 //
K10bsu036_u:3984: atha khalu bhagavān kṛtsnaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ sasurāsuraṃ ca lokamāmantraya etadavocat
K10bsu036_u:3987: pūrvaṃ ca ahamanekān kalpānanekāni kalpaśatasahasrāṇi rājābhūvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:3993: tena ca samayena ayaṃ loko dīrghāyurabhat /
K10bsu036_u:3994: anekavarṣaśatasahasrajīvitena ca ahaṃ kālena dharmārthaṃ rājyaṃ kāritavān,
K10bsu036_u:3996: so 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya caturdiśaṃ jyeṣṭhadharmagaveṣaṇāya udyukto 'bhūvam /
K10bsu036_u:3997: evaṃ ghaṇṭayā ghoṣāpayitavān - yo me jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmamanupradāsyati,
K10bsu036_u:4001: sa māmetadavocat - asti mahārāja saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma sutraṃ jyeṣṭhadharmanirdeśakam /
K10bsu036_u:4004: so 'haṃ śrutvā tasyarṣervacanaṃ hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena sa ṛṣistenopeyivān /
K10bsu036_u:4005: upetyāvocat - yatte dāsena karma karaṇīyaṃ tatkaromi /
K10bsu036_u:4008: divasaṃ caivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtvā rātrau śayānasya mañcake pādān dhārayāmi /
K10bsu036_u:4009: na ca me kāyaklamo na cetasi klamo 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:4010: evaṃ ca me kurvataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣāsahasraṃ gatam //
K10bsu036_u:4012: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ paridyotayannimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4014: rājyaṃ came dharmahetoḥ kṛtaṃ tanna ca kāmahetorjyeṣṭhadharmahetoḥ // Saddhp_11.42 //
K10bsu036_u:4015: caturdiśaṃ me kṛta ghoṣaṇo 'yaṃ dharmaṃ vadedyastasya dāsyaṃ vrajeyam /
K10bsu036_u:4016: āsīdṛṣistena kālena dhīmān sūtrasya saddharmanāmnaḥ pravaktāḥ // Saddhp_11.43 //
K10bsu036_u:4017: sa māmavocadyadi te dharmakāṅkṣā upehi dāsyaṃ dharmamataḥ pravakṣye /
K10bsu036_u:4018: tuṣṭaścāhaṃ vacanaṃ taṃ niśāmya karmākaroddāsayogyaṃ tadā yam // Saddhp_11.44 //
K10bsu036_u:4020: praṇidhistadā me bhavi sattvahetornātmānamuddiśya na kāmahetoḥ // Saddhp_11.45 //
K10bsu036_u:4021: sa rāja āsīttadā abdhavīryo ananyakarmāṇi daśaddiśāsu /
K10bsu036_u:4022: paripūrṇa kalpāna sahasrakhinno yāvatsūtraṃ labdhavān dharmanāmam // Saddhp_11.46 //
K10bsu036_u:4023: tatkiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt?
K10bsu036_u:4026: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūvam /
K10bsu036_u:4027: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo 'nyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenarṣirabhūt?
K10bsu036_u:4029: ayameva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto bhikṣurṛṣirabhut /
K10bsu036_u:4031: devadattameva cāgamya mayā ṣaṭū pāramitāḥ paripūritāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4034: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūni aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā maharddhibalatā
K10bsu036_u:4038: prativedayāmi - eṣa devadatto bhikṣuranāgate 'dhvani aprameyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyairdevarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho (Vaidya 159)
K10bsu036_u:4039: bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān devasopānāyāṃ lokadhātau
K10bsu036_u:4046: devarājasya khalu punarbhikṣavastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
K10bsu036_u:4048: ekaghanaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ bhaviṣyati saptaratnastūpaṃ praviṣṭam /
K10bsu036_u:4051: sarve ca tatra devamanuṣyāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhirgāthābhiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4053: ye ca taṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kariṣyanti praṇāmaṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:4054: teṣāṃ kecidagraphalamarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyanti kecit pratyekabodhimanuprāpsyante acintyācāścāprameyā devamanuṣyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K10bsu036_u:4056: atha khalu bhagavān punareva bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma - yaḥ kaścit bhikṣavo 'nāgate 'dhvani kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraparivartaṃ śroṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:4057: śrutvā ca na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:4059: tena tisṛṇāṃ durgatīnāṃ dvāraṃ pithitaṃ bhaviṣyati ḥ narakatiryagyoniyamalokopapattiṣu na patiṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:4063: tasminnaupapāduke saptaratnamaye padme upapatsyate tathāgatasya saṃmukham //
K10bsu036_u:4064: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmadhastāddiśaḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādāgataḥ prajñākūṭo nāma bodhisattvaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4065: sa taṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - gacchāmo bhagavan svakaṃ buddhakṣetram /
K10bsu036_u:4066: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - muhūrtaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4067: tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvanmadīyena bodhisattvena mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdhaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4068: kaṃcideva dharmaviniścayaṃ kṛtvā paścāt svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gamiṣyasi /
K10bsu036_u:4069: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sahasrapatre padme śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātre
K10bsu036_u:4071: upari vaihāyasaṃ khagapathena gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavato 'ntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4072: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ padmādavatīrya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pādau śirasābhivanditvā yena prajñākūṭo bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
K10bsu036_u:4073: upasaṃkramya prajñākūṭena bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāmupasaṃgṛhya ekānte nyaṣīdat /
K10bsu036_u:4074: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - samudramadhyagatena tvayā mañjuśrīḥ kiyān sattvadhāturvinītaḥ?
K10bsu036_u:4076: tāvadaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni yāvadvācā na śakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ cittena vā cintayitum (Vaidya 160) /
K10bsu036_u:4077: muhūrtaṃ tāvat kulaputra āgamayasva yāvat pūrvanimittaṃ drakṣyasi /
K10bsu036_u:4079: tasyāṃ velāyāmanekāni padmasahasrāṇi samudramadhyādabhyudgatāni upari vaihāyasam /
K10bsu036_u:4081: atha te bodhisattvāstenaiva khagapathena yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4082: upasaṃkramya tataścopari vaihāyasaṃ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K10bsu036_u:4083: sarve ca te mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena vinītā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:4090: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - sarvo 'yaṃ kulaputra mayā samudramadhyagatena sattvavinayaḥ kṛtaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4092: atha khalu prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ gāthābhigītena paripṛcchati -
K10bsu036_u:4093: mahābhadra prajñayā sūranāman asaṃkhyeyā ye vinītāstvayādya /
K10bsu036_u:4094: sattvā amī kasya cāyaṃ prabhāvastadbūhi pṛṣṭo naradeva tvametat // Saddhp_11.47 //
K10bsu036_u:4095: kaṃ vā dharmaṃ deśitavānasi tvaṃ kiṃ vā sūtraṃ bodhimārgopadeśam /
K10bsu036_u:4096: yacchrutvāmī bodhaye jātacittāḥ sarvajñatve niścitaṃ labdhagādhāḥ // Saddhp_11.48 //
K10bsu036_u:4097: mañjuśrīrāha - samudramadhye saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣitavān, na cānyat /
K10bsu036_u:4098: prajñākūṭa āha - idaṃ sūtraṃ gambhīraṃ sūkṣmaṃ durdṛśam,
K10bsu036_u:4099: na cānena sutreṇa kiṃcidanyat sūtraṃ samamasti /
K10bsu036_u:4100: asti kaścit sattvo ya idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ satkuryādavaboddhumanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
K10bsu036_u:4101: mañjuśrīrāha - asti kulaputra sāgarasya nāgarājño duhitā aṣṭavarṣā jātyā mahāprajñā
K10bsu036_u:4104: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā /
K10bsu036_u:4106: smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate /
K10bsu036_u:4108: prajñākūṭo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto 'nekāni puṇyāni kṛtavān /
K10bsu036_u:4109: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān /
K10bsu036_u:4110: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro 'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4114: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10bsu036_u:4117: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4121: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me 'tra tathāgataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4123: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat - kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya cittamutpannam /
K10bsu036_u:4126: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati,
K10bsu036_u:4127: anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti,
K10bsu036_u:4131: pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti /
K10bsu036_u:4133: prathamaṃ brahmasthānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam //
K10bsu036_u:4134: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti,
K10bsu036_u:4135: yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate /
K10bsu036_u:4136: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4138: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat - yo 'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4139: sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti?
K10bsu036_u:4140: sthavira āha - tvayā ca śīghraṃ datto bhagavatā ca śīghraṃ pratigṛhītaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4141: sāgaranāgarājaduhitā āha - yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām,
K10bsu036_u:4144: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya
K10bsu036_u:4145: pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4148: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4149: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma,
K10bsu036_u:4150: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:4152: te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma,
K10bsu036_u:4154: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
K10bsu036_u:4157: iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
K10bsu036_u:4160: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām //
K10bsu036_u:4164: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāpratibhānaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K10bsu036_u:4167: vayamimaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sattvānāṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4168: kiṃcāpi bhagavan śaṭhakāḥ sattvāstasmin kāle bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:4169: parīttakuśalamūlā adhimānikā lābhasatkārasaṃniśritā akuśalamūlapratipannā durdamā adhimuktivirahitā anadhimuktibahulāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4170: api tu khalu punarvayaṃ bhagavan kṣāntibalamupadarśayitvā tasmin kāle idaṃ sūtramuddekṣyāmo
K10bsu036_u:4171: dhārayiṣyāmo deśayiṣyāmo likhiṣyāmaḥ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4172: kāyajīvitaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan utsṛjya idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4174: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavanta metadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan utsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4175: api tu khalu punarbhagavan anyāsu lokadhātuṣviti /
K10bsu036_u:4176: atha khalu yāvantaste bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:4178: sarvāṇi tāni yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu /
K10bsu036_u:4179: vayamapīmaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu /
K10bsu036_u:4181: asyāṃ bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhimānikāḥ sattvā alpakuśalamūlā nityaṃ vyāpannacittāḥ śaṭhā vaṅkajātīyāḥ //
K10bsu036_u:4182: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato mātṛbhaginī ṣaḍbhirbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4183: śaikṣāśaikṣābhirbhikṣuṇībhiḥ utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamullokayantī sthitābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:4184: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ tvaṃ gautami durmanasvinī sthitā tathāgataṃ vyavalokayasi?
K10bsu036_u:4185: nāhaṃ parikīrtitā vyākṛtā ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:4186: api tu khalu punargautami sarvaparṣadvayākaraṇena vyākṛtāsi /
K10bsu036_u:4187: api tu khalu punastvaṃ gautami ita upādāya aṣṭātriṃśatāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike
K10bsu036_u:4188: satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvo
K10bsu036_u:4190: imānyapi ṣaḍ bhikṣuṇīsahasrāṇi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tvayaiva sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike bodhisattvā dharmabhāṇakā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4191: tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma
K10bsu036_u:4192: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu036_u:4193: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu036_u:4194: sa ca gautami sarvasattvapriyadarśanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastāni ṣaḍ bodhisattvasahasrāṇi paraṃparāvyākaraṇena vyākariṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K10bsu036_u:4196: atha khalu rāhulamāturyaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyā etadabhavat - na me bhagavatā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitam /
K10bsu036_u:4197: atha khalu bhagavān yaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyāścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya yaśodharāṃ bhikṣuṇīmetadavocat - ārocayāmi te yaśodhare,
K10bsu036_u:4199: tvamapi daśānāṃ buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi /
K10bsu036_u:4200: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca anupūrveṇa paripūrya raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajo nāma tathāgato
K10bsu036_u:4202: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān bhadrāyāṃ lokadhātau /
K10bsu036_u:4203: aparimitaṃ ca tasya bhagavato raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:4204: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇī ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā yaśodharā ca
K10bsu036_u:4205: bhikṣuṇī caturbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā bhagavato 'ntikāt svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā
K10bsu036_u:4206: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:4207: bhagavan vinetāsi vināyako 'si śāstāsi lokasya sadevakasya /
K10bsu036_u:4208: āśvāsadātā naradevapūjito vayaṃ pi saṃtoṣita adya nātha // Saddhp_12.1 //
K10bsu036_u:4209: atha khalu tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan samutsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye,
K10bsu036_u:4211: atha khalu bhagavān yena tānyaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhāraṇīpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartikadharmacakrapravartakānāṃ tenāvalokayāmāsa /
K10bsu036_u:4212: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samanantarāvalokitā bhagavatā utthāyāsanebhyo
K10bsu036_u:4213: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmyaivaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ - asmākaṃ bhagavān adhyeṣati asya
K10bsu036_u:4215: te khalvevamanuvicintya saṃprakampitāḥ parasparamūcuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ kulaputrāḥ kariṣyāmo yad bhagavānadhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasyānāgate 'dhvani saṃprakāśanatāyai?
K10bsu036_u:4216: atha khalu te kulaputrā bhagavato gauraveṇa ātmanaśca purvacaryāpraṇidhānena bhagavato
K10bsu036_u:4217: 'bhimukhaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadante sma - vayaṃ bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4218: tathāgate parinirvṛte daśasu dikṣu gatvā sarvasattvāṃllekhayiṣyāmaḥ pāṭhayiṣyāmaścintāpayiṣyāmaḥ
K10bsu036_u:4221: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samasaṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -(Vaidya 164)
K10bsu036_u:4222: alpotsukastvaṃ bhagavan bhavasva vayaṃ tadā te parinirvṛtasya /
K10bsu036_u:4223: svaṃ paścime kāli subhairavasmin prakāśayiṣyāmida sūtramuttamam // Saddhp_12.2 //
K10bsu036_u:4227: aprāpte prāptasaṃjñī ca ghore kālasmi paścime // Saddhp_12.4 //
K10bsu036_u:4229: saṃlekhavṛtticāri sma evaṃ vakṣyanti durmatī // Saddhp_12.5 //
K10bsu036_u:4230: raseṣu gṛddha saktāśca gṛhīṇāṃ dharma deśayī /
K10bsu036_u:4231: satkṛtāśca bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍabhijñā yathā tathā // Saddhp_12.6 //
K10bsu036_u:4235: tīrthikā batime bhikṣū svāni kāvyāni deśayuḥ // Saddhp_12.8 //
K10bsu036_u:4239: viprāṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ cāpi bhikṣuṇām // Saddhp_12.10 //
K10bsu036_u:4241: sarvaṃ vayaṃ kṣamiṣyāmo gauraveṇa maharṣiṇām // Saddhp_12.11 //
K10bsu036_u:4242: ye cāsmān kutsayiṣyanti tasmin kālasmi durmatī /
K10bsu036_u:4243: ime buddhā bhaviṣyanti kṣamiṣyāmatha sarvaśaḥ // Saddhp_12.12 //
K10bsu036_u:4245: yakṣarūpā bahu bhikṣū asmākaṃ paribhāṣakāḥ // Saddhp_12.13 //
K10bsu036_u:4247: kṣāntīya kakṣyāṃ bandhitvā sūtrametaṃ prakāśaye // Saddhp_12.14 //
K10bsu036_u:4248: anarthikāḥ sma kāyena jīvitena ca nāyaka /
K10bsu036_u:4249: arthikāśca sma bodhīya tava nikṣepadhārakāḥ // Saddhp_12.15 //
K10bsu036_u:4253: bhṛkuṭī sarva soḍhavyā aprajñaptiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4256: bhāṣiṣyāma idaṃ sūtraṃ parṣanmadhye viśāradāḥ // Saddhp_12.18 //
K10bsu036_u:4258: gatvā gatvāsya dāsyāmo nikṣepaṃ tava nāyaka // Saddhp_12.19 //
K10bsu036_u:4260: alpotsuko bhava tvaṃ hi śāntiprāpto sunirvṛtaḥ // Saddhp_12.20 //
K10bsu036_u:4261: sarve ca lokapradyotā āgatā ye diśo daśa /
K10bsu036_u:4262: satyāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣāmo adhimuktiṃ vijānasi // Saddhp_12.21 //
K10bsu036_u:4266: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata - duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa
K10bsu036_u:4267: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ?
K10bsu036_u:4268: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu
K10bsu036_u:4269: pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime
K10bsu036_u:4272: iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4273: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
K10bsu036_u:4274: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati,
K10bsu036_u:4276: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati,
K10bsu036_u:4281: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate,
K10bsu036_u:4282: na rājaputrān na rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati,
K10bsu036_u:4285: na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
K10bsu036_u:4286: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
K10bsu036_u:4287: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān /
K10bsu036_u:4289: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
K10bsu036_u:4292: śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
K10bsu036_u:4293: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
K10bsu036_u:4294: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā /
K10bsu036_u:4295: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
K10bsu036_u:4298: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
K10bsu036_u:4299: na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:4301: na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate,
K10bsu036_u:4304: na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
K10bsu036_u:4306: na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4312: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati,
K10bsu036_u:4313: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
K10bsu036_u:4318: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati,
K10bsu036_u:4322: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare sthito bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:4324: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4326: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśetuṃ anolīno viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_13.1 //
K10bsu036_u:4329: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam /
K10bsu036_u:4334: upāsikāśca varjeta prākaṭā yā avasthitāḥ // Saddhp_13.5 //
K10bsu036_u:4335: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4336: varjayet saṃstavaṃ tābhiḥ ācāro ayamucyate // Saddhp_13.6 //
K10bsu036_u:4338: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ // Saddhp_13.7 //
K10bsu036_u:4341: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāṃ kumāryaśca vivarjayet // Saddhp_13.8 //
K10bsu036_u:4342: na tā saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ hāsa pṛcchitum /
K10bsu036_u:4343: saṃstavaṃ tehi varjeta saukaraurabhrikaiḥ saha // Saddhp_13.9 //
K10bsu036_u:4345: māṃsaṃ sūnāya vikrenti saṃstavaṃ tairvivarjayet // Saddhp_13.10 //
K10bsu036_u:4348: vāramukhyā na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4350: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4351: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet // Saddhp_13.13 //
K10bsu036_u:4352: yadāpi praviśed grāmaṃ bhojanārthī punaḥ punaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4353: dvitīyaṃ bhikṣu mārgeta buddhaṃ vā samanusmaret // Saddhp_13.14 //
K10bsu036_u:4355: viharanti yena saprajñā dhārentā sūtramīdṛśam // Saddhp_13.15 //
K10bsu036_u:4357: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛte cāpi bhūtābhūte ca sarvaśaḥ // Saddhp_13.16 //
K10bsu036_u:4358: strīti nācarate dhīro puruṣeti na kalpayet /
K10bsu036_u:4359: sarvadharma ajātatvād gaveṣanto na paśyati // Saddhp_13.17 //
K10bsu036_u:4360: ācāro hi ayaṃ ukto bodhisattvāna sarvaśaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4361: gocaro yādṛśasteṣāṃ taṃ śṛṇotha prakāśataḥ // Saddhp_13.18 //
K10bsu036_u:4362: asantakā dharma ime prakāśitā aprādubhūtāśca ajāta sarve /
K10bsu036_u:4363: śūnyā nirīhā sthita nityakālaṃ ayaṃ gocaro ucyati paṇḍitānām // Saddhp_13.19 //
K10bsu036_u:4364: viparītasaṃjñīhi ime vikalpitā asantasantā hi abhūtabhūtataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4366: anutthitāścāpi ajātadharmā jātātha bhūtā viparītakalpitāḥ // Saddhp_13.20 //
K10bsu036_u:4367: ekāgracitto hi samāhitaḥ sadā sumerukūṭo yatha susthitaśca /
K10bsu036_u:4368: evaṃ sthitaścāpi hi tān nirīkṣedākāśabhūtānima sarvadharmān // Saddhp_13.21 //
K10bsu036_u:4370: sthitā hi dharmā iti nityakālaṃ ayu gocaro ucyati paṇḍitānām // Saddhp_13.22 //
K10bsu036_u:4371: īryāpathaṃ yo mama rakṣamāṇo bhaveta bhikṣū mama nirvṛtasya /
K10bsu036_u:4372: prakāśayet sūtramidaṃ hi loke na cāpi saṃlīyana tasya kācit // Saddhp_13.23 //
K10bsu036_u:4373: kālena vā cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya lenaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā /
K10bsu036_u:4374: vipaśya dharmaṃ imu sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ // Saddhp_13.24 //
K10bsu036_u:4375: rājāna tasyeha karonti rakṣāṃ ye rājaputrāśca śṛṇonti dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:4376: anye 'pi co gṛhapati brāhmaṇāśca parivārya sarve 'sya sthitā bhavanti // Saddhp_13.25 //
