K10bsu036_u:4377: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrirbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle
K10bsu036_u:4378: paścime samaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitukāmaḥ
K10bsu036_u:4380: sa sukhasthitaśca dharmaṃ bhāṣate kāyagataṃ vā pustakagataṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:4385: na cānyeṣāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā avarṇa bhāṣate,
K10bsu036_u:4392: avivadamāno na ca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānena visarjayati /
K10bsu036_u:4395: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4396: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇastatha dharmu bhāṣate /
K10bsu036_u:4397: udāra prajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe // Saddhp_13.26 //
K10bsu036_u:4398: caukṣaṃ cāsau cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ supraśastaraṅgaiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4399: āsevakāṃ kṛṣṇa tathādaditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā // Saddhp_13.27 //
K10bsu036_u:4401: sudhautapādaśca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi // Saddhp_13.28 //
K10bsu036_u:4403: upasaṃhareccitrakathā bahūśca bhikṣūṇa co bhikṣūṇikāna caiva // Saddhp_13.29 //
K10bsu036_u:4404: upāsakānāṃ ca upāsikānāṃ rājñāṃ tathā rājasutāna caiva /
K10bsu036_u:4405: vicitritārthāṃ madhurāṃ katheyā anabhyasūyantu sadā sa paṇḍitaḥ // Saddhp_13.30 //
K10bsu036_u:4406: pṛṣṭo 'pi cāsau tada praśna tehi anulomamarthaṃ punarnirdiśeta /
K10bsu036_u:4407: tathā ca deśeya tamarthajātaṃ yatha śrutva bodhīya bhaveyu lābhinaḥ // Saddhp_13.31 //
K10bsu036_u:4408: kilāsitāṃ cāpi vivarjayitvā na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñām /
K10bsu036_u:4410: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijaheta paṇḍito maitrībalaṃ cā pariṣāya bhāvayet // Saddhp_13.32 //
K10bsu036_u:4412: saṃharṣayetparṣa tathaiva toṣayenna cāpi kiṃcittatu jātu prārthayet // Saddhp_13.33 //
K10bsu036_u:4413: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsana cīvaraṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:4414: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayeta na vijñapeyā pariṣāya kiṃcit // Saddhp_13.34 //
K10bsu036_u:4415: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇo bhaveya buddho 'hamime ca sattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4416: etanmamo sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke // Saddhp_13.35 //
K10bsu036_u:4417: yaścāpi bhikṣū mama nirvṛtasya anīrṣuko eta prakāśayeyā /
K10bsu036_u:4418: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na ca antarāyo śokopayāsā na bhavetkadācit // Saddhp_13.36 //
K10bsu036_u:4419: na tasya saṃtrāsana kaści kuryānna tāḍanāṃ nāpi avarṇa bhāṣet /
K10bsu036_u:4420: na cāpi nipkāsana jātu tasya tathā hi so kṣāntibale pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Saddhp_13.37 //
K10bsu036_u:4421: sukhasthitasyo tada paṇḍitasya evaṃ sthitasyo yatha bhāṣitaṃ mayā /
K10bsu036_u:4422: guṇāna koṭīśata bhontyaneke na śakyate kalpaśate hi vaktum // Saddhp_13.38 //
K10bsu036_u:4424: vartamāne idaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nīrṣuko bhavatyaśaṭho 'māyāvī,
K10bsu036_u:4427: na cānyeṣāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:4428: vā bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ vā kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati - dūre yūyaṃ kulaputrā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4439: ye ca daśasu dikṣu loke bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4441: dharmaṃ ca deśayamāno 'nūnamanadhikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati samena dharmapremṇā,
K10bsu036_u:4442: na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇāpyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:4443: anena mañjuśrīstṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya
K10bsu036_u:4444: parinirvṛtasya saddharmaparikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ
K10bsu036_u:4452: pustakagataṃ ca kṛtvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti //
K10bsu036_u:4455: śāṭhyaṃ ca mānaṃ tatha kūṭanāṃ ca aśeṣato ujjhiya dharmabhāṇakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4456: īrṣyāṃ na kuryāttatha jātu paṇḍito ya icchate sūtramidaṃ prakāśitum // Saddhp_13.39 //
K10bsu036_u:4457: avarṇa jātū na vadeya kasyaciddṛṣṭīvivādaṃ ca na jātu kuryāt /
K10bsu036_u:4458: kaukṛtyasthānaṃ ca na jātu kuryānna lapsyase jñānamanuttara tvam // Saddhp_13.40 //
K10bsu036_u:4459: sadā ca so ārjavu mardāvaśca kṣāntaśca bhotī sugatasya putraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4460: dharmaṃ prakāśetuḥ punaḥ punaścimaṃ na tasya khedo bhavatī kadācit // Saddhp_13.41 //
K10bsu036_u:4461: ye bodhisattvā daśasū diśāsu sattvānukampāya caranti loke /
K10bsu036_u:4462: te sarvi śāstāra bhavanti mahyaṃ gurugauravaṃ teṣu janeta paṇḍitaḥ // Saddhp_13.42 //
K10bsu036_u:4464: smaritva buddhāna dvipadānamuttamān jineṣu nityaṃ pitṛsaṃjña kuryāt /
K10bsu036_u:4465: adhimānasaṃjñāṃ ca vihāya sarvāṃ na tasya bhotī tada antarāyaḥ // Saddhp_13.43 //
K10bsu036_u:4466: śruṇitva dharmaṃ imamevarūpaṃ sa rakṣitavyastada paṇḍitena /
K10bsu036_u:4467: sukhaṃ vihārāya samāhitaśca surakṣito bhoti ca prāṇikoṭibhiḥ // Saddhp_13.44 //
K10bsu036_u:4469: vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitukāmastena bhikṣuṇā gṛhasthapravrajitānāmantikād
K10bsu036_u:4472: ye ca sattvā bodhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti,
K10bsu036_u:4476: ye tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ na śṛṇvanti na jānanti na budhyante na pṛcchanti na śraddadhanti nādhimucyante /
K10bsu036_u:4479: api tu khalu punarahametāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yo yasmin sthito bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:4480: taṃ tasminneva ṛddhibalenāvarjayiṣyāmi pattīyāpayiṣyāmi avatārayiṣyāmi paripācayiṣyāmi //
K10bsu036_u:4481: anenāpi mañjuśrīścaturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamāno 'vyābādho
K10bsu036_u:4482: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ rājñā rajaputrāṇāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām
K10bsu036_u:4483: antarīkṣāvacarāścāsya devatāḥ śrāddhāḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu036_u:4484: devaputrāścāsya sadānubaddhā bhaviṣyantyārakṣāyai grāmagatasya vā vihāragatasya vā /
K10bsu036_u:4486: tasya ca vyākaraṇenaṃ tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4490: durlabho 'sya mañjuśrīrdharmaparyāyasya bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu śabdo vā ghoṣo vā nāmaśravo vā //
K10bsu036_u:4491: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrī rājā bhavati balacakravartī,
K10bsu036_u:4493: tato 'sya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratirājānastena sārdhaṃ vigrahamāpannā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:4494: atha tasya rājño balacakravartino vividhā yodhā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:4496: atha sa rājā tān yodhān yudhyamānān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ prīto bhavatyāttamanaskaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4497: sa prīta āttamanāḥ samānasteṣāṃ yodhānāṃ vividhāni dānāni dadāti /
K10bsu036_u:4499: vā dadāti, nagaraṃ nagarakṣetrāṇi vā dadāti,
K10bsu036_u:4501: veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi
K10bsu036_u:4506: eka eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇī rājño mūrdhasthāyī /
K10bsu036_u:4507: yadā punarmañjuśrī rājā tamapi cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti,
K10bsu036_u:4508: tadā sa sarvo rājñaścaturaṅgabalakāya āścaryaprāpto bhavatyadbhutaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4509: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā svena bāhubalanirjitena puṇyabalanirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa dharmarājyaṃ kārayati /
K10bsu036_u:4511: atha khalu tathāgatasyāpi āryā yodhā māreṇa sārdhaṃ yudhyante /
K10bsu036_u:4512: atha khalu mañjuśrīstathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā teṣāmāryāṇāṃ
K10bsu036_u:4513: yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtraśatasahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣaṇārtham /
K10bsu036_u:4517: tatra mañjuśrīryathā sa rājā balacakravartī teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ mahatā puruṣakāreṇa
K10bsu036_u:4518: vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam /
K10bsu036_u:4519: yathā mañjuśrīstasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiścirarakṣito mūrdhasthāyī,
K10bsu036_u:4520: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastraidhātuke dharmarājo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayamāṇo yasmin samaye
K10bsu036_u:4521: paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān,
K10bsu036_u:4522: taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati,
K10bsu036_u:4525: sarveṣḥṃ sarvajñatḥhḥrakaṃ mahḥcūḍḥmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathḥgataḥ śrḥvakebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
K10bsu036_u:4529: yo 'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathḥgatena adya tenaiva rḥjñḥ balacakravartinḥ ciraparirakṣitaścūḍḥmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4530: evameva mañjuśrīstathḥgato 'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirḥnurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyḥyḥṇḥṃ mūrdhasthḥyi tathḥgatavijñeyam /
K10bsu036_u:4532: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4533: maitrībalaṃ co sada darśayantaḥ kṛpāyamāṇaḥ sada sarvasattvān /
K10bsu036_u:4534: prakāśayeddharmamimevarūpaṃ sūtraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sugatehi varṇitam // Saddhp_13.45 //
K10bsu036_u:4536: gṛhastha ye pravrajitāśca ye syuratha bodhisattvāstada kāli paścime /
K10bsu036_u:4537: sarveṣu maitrībala so hi darśayī mā haiva kṣepsyanti śruṇitva dharmam // Saddhp_13.46 //
K10bsu036_u:4538: ahaṃ tu bodhimanuprāpuṇitvā yadā sthito bheṣyi tathāgatatve /
K10bsu036_u:4539: tato upāneṣyi upāyi sthitvā saṃśrāvayiṣye imamagrabodhim // Saddhp_13.47 //
K10bsu036_u:4540: yathāpi rājā balacakravartī yodhāna dadyādvividhaṃ hiraṇyam /
K10bsu036_u:4541: hastīṃśca aśvāṃśca rathān padātīn nagarāṇi grāmāṃśca dadāti tuṣṭaḥ // Saddhp_13.48 //
K10bsu036_u:4542: keṣāṃci hastābharaṇāni prīto dadāti rūpyaṃ ca suvarṇasūtram /
K10bsu036_u:4543: muktāmaṇiṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ vividhāṃśca dāsān sa dadāti prītaḥ // Saddhp_13.49 //
K10bsu036_u:4544: yadā tu so uttamasāṃhasena vismāpito kenaci tatra bhoti /
K10bsu036_u:4545: vijñāya āścaryamidaṃ kṛtaṃ ti mukuṭaṃ sa muñcitva maṇiṃ dadāti // Saddhp_13.50 //
K10bsu036_u:4546: tathaiva buddho ahu dharmarājā kṣāntībalaḥ prajñaprabhūtakośaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4547: dharmeṇa śāsāmimu sarvalokaṃ hitānukampī karūṇāyamānaḥ // Saddhp_13.51 //
K10bsu036_u:4549: parākramaṃ jāniya teṣa prāṇināṃ ye śuddhasattvā iha kleśaghātinaḥ // Saddhp_13.52 //
K10bsu036_u:4552: jñātvā ca sattvān balavantu jñānī cūḍāmaṇiṃ vā ima sūtra deśayī // Saddhp_13.53 //
K10bsu036_u:4553: imu paścimu loki vadāmi sūtraṃ sūtrāṇa sarveṣa mamāgrabhūtam /
K10bsu036_u:4554: saṃrakṣitaṃ me na ca jātu proktaṃ taṃ śrāvayāmyadya śṛṇotha sarve // Saddhp_13.54 //
K10bsu036_u:4555: catvāri dharmā imi evarūpāḥ mayi nirvṛte ye ca niṣevitavyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4556: ye cārthikā uttamamagrabodhau vyāpāraṇaṃ ye ca karonti mahyam // Saddhp_13.55 //
K10bsu036_u:4557: na tasya śoko na pi cāntarāyo daurvarṇikaṃ nāpi gilānakatvam /
K10bsu036_u:4558: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti na cāpi hīne nagarasmi vāsaḥ // Saddhp_13.56 //
K10bsu036_u:4559: priyadarśano 'sau satataṃ maharṣī tathāgato vā yatha pūjya bhoti /
K10bsu036_u:4560: upasthāyakāstasya bhavanti nityaṃ ye devaputrā daharā bhavanti // Saddhp_13.57 //
K10bsu036_u:4561: na tasya śastraṃ na viṣaṃ kadācit kāye krame nāpi ca daṇḍaloṣṭam /
K10bsu036_u:4562: saṃmīlitaṃ tasya mukhaṃ bhaveya yo tasya ākrośamapī vadeyā // Saddhp_13.58 //
K10bsu036_u:4563: so bandhubhūto bhavatīha prāṇināmālokajāto vicarantu medinīm /
K10bsu036_u:4564: timiraṃ haranto bahuprāṇakoṭināṃ yo sūtradhāre imu nirvṛte mayi // Saddhp_13.59 //
K10bsu036_u:4565: supinasmi so paśyati bhadrarūpaṃ bhikṣūṃśca so paśyati bhikṣuṇīśca /
K10bsu036_u:4566: sihāsanasthaṃ ca tathātmabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ prakāśentu bahuprakāram // Saddhp_13.60 //
K10bsu036_u:4568: devāṃśca yakṣān yatha gaṅgāvālikā asurāṃśca nāgāṃśca bahuprakārān /
K10bsu036_u:4569: teṣāṃ ca so bhāṣati agradharmaṃ supinasmi sarveṣa kṛtāñjalīnām // Saddhp_13.61 //
K10bsu036_u:4570: tathāgataṃ so supinasmi paśyati deśenta dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭinām /
K10bsu036_u:4572: so cā tahī bhoti kṛtāñjalisthito abhiṣṭuvanto dvipaduttamaṃ munim /
K10bsu036_u:4573: so cā jino bhāṣati agradharmaṃ caturṇa parṣāṇa mahābhiṣaṭūkaḥ // Saddhp_13.63 //
K10bsu036_u:4574: so ca prahṛṣṭo bhavatī śruṇitvā prāmodyajātaśca karoti pūjām /
K10bsu036_u:4575: supine ca so dhāraṇi prāpuṇoti avivartiyaṃ jñāna spṛśitva kṣipram // Saddhp_13.64 //
K10bsu036_u:4576: jñātvā ca so āśayu lokanāthastaṃ vyākarotī puruṣarṣabhatve /
K10bsu036_u:4577: kulaputra tvaṃ pīha anuttaraṃ śivaṃ spṛśiṣyasi jñānamanāgate 'dhvani // Saddhp_13.65 //
K10bsu036_u:4578: tavāpi kṣetraṃ vipulaṃ bhaviṣyati parṣāśca catvāri yathaiva mahyam /
K10bsu036_u:4579: śroṣyanti dharmaṃ vipulaṃ anāsravaṃ sagauravā bhūtva kṛtāñjalī ca // Saddhp_13.66 //
K10bsu036_u:4580: punaśca so paśyati ātmabhāvaṃ bhāventa dharmaṃ girikandareṣu /
K10bsu036_u:4581: bhāvitva dharmaṃ ca spṛśitva dharmatāṃ samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati // Saddhp_13.67 //
K10bsu036_u:4582: suvarṇavarṇaṃ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ supinasmi dṛṣṭvā ca śṛṇoti dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:4584: śrutvā ca taṃ parṣadi saṃprakāśayī supino khu tasyo ayamevarūpaḥ // Saddhp_13.68 //
K10bsu036_u:4585: svapne 'pi sarvaṃ prajahitva rājyamantaḥpuraṃ jñātigaṇaṃ tathaiva /
K10bsu036_u:4586: abhiniṣkramī sarva jahitva kāmānupasaṃkramī yena ca bodhimaṇḍam // Saddhp_13.69 //
K10bsu036_u:4587: siṃhāsane tatra niṣīdiyāno drumasya mūle tahi bodhiarthikaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4588: divasāna saptāna tathātyayena anuprāpsyate jñānu tathāgatānām // Saddhp_13.70 //
K10bsu036_u:4589: bodhiṃ ca prāptastatu vyutthahitvā pravartayī cakramanāsravaṃ hi /
K10bsu036_u:4590: caturṇa parṣāṇa sa dharma deśayī acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_13.71 //
K10bsu036_u:4591: prakāśayitvā tahi dharma nāsravaṃ nirvāpayitvā bahu prāṇikoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4592: nirvāyatī hetukṣaye va dīpaḥ supino ayaṃ so bhavatevarūpaḥ // Saddhp_13.72 //
K10bsu036_u:4593: bahu ānuśaṃsāśca anantakāśca ye mañjughoṣā sada tasya bhonti /
K10bsu036_u:4594: yo paścime kāli iamamagradharmaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeya mayā sudeśitam // Saddhp_13.73 //
K10bsu036_u:4598: atha khalu anyalokadhātvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmaṣṭau gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasmin samaye tataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalādabhyutthitā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:4599: te 'ñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavato 'bhimukhā bhagavantaṃ namasyamānā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - saced bhagavānasmākamanujānīyāt,
K10bsu036_u:4600: vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya tasyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau saṃprakāśeyama vācayema lekhayema pūjayema,
K10bsu036_u:4603: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānetadavocat - alaṃ kulaputrāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4605: santi kulaputrā iha mamaivāsyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi ekasya bodhisattvasya parivāraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4606: evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ ṣaṣṭyeva gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:4607: yeṣāmekaikasya bodhisattvasya iyāneva parivāraḥ ye mama parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti //
K10bsu036_u:4609: atheyaṃ sahā lokadhātuḥ samantāt sphuṭitā visphuṭitā abhūt /
K10bsu036_u:4610: tebhyaśca sphoṭāntarebhyo bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyuttiṣṭhante sma suvarṇavarṇaiḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4612: imāmeva sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ niśritya te khalvimamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavataḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pṛthivyā adhaṃ samutthitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4614: tādṛśānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ gaṇīnāṃ mahāgaṇīnāṃ gaṇācāryāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukopamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:4615: ye itaḥ sahāyā lokadhātordharaṇīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajjante sma /
K10bsu036_u:4633: kaḥ punarvādaḥ pañcāśadbodhisattvaparivārāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām? peyālam /
K10bsu036_u:4637: na teṣāṃ saṃkhyā vā gaṇanā vā upamā vā upaniṣadvā upalabhyate,
K10bsu036_u:4638: ya iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau dharaṇīvivarebhyo bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samunmajjante sma /
K10bsu036_u:4639: te ca unmajjyonmajjya yena sa mahāratnastūpo vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4640: yasmin sa bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4641: bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sārdhaṃ siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4643: upasaṃkramya ca ubhayayostathāgatayorarhatoḥ samyaksaṃbuddhayoḥ pādau śirobhirvanditvā
K10bsu036_u:4645: ye te samantato daśasu dikṣvanyonyāsu lokadhātuṣu saṃnipatitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4647: tān sarvānabhivandya namaskṛtya ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvastāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān pradakṣiṇīkṛtya nānāprakārairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4648: añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ca prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhisaṃmukhaṃ namaskurvanti sma //
K10bsu036_u:4649: tena khalu punaḥ samayena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjatāṃ
K10bsu036_u:4652: tāṃśca pañcāśadantarakalpān sa bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastūṣṇīmabhūt /
K10bsu036_u:4655: yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena tāścatasraḥ parṣadastamevaikaṃ paścādbhaktaṃ saṃjānante sma /
K10bsu036_u:4656: imāṃ ca sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ śatasahasrākāśaparigṛhītāṃ bodhisattvaparipūrṇāmadrākṣuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4657: tasya khalu punarmahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeścatvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4663: ime catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:4664: atha khalu catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasya mahato (Vaidya 181)
K10bsu036_u:4666: pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - kaccid bhagavato 'lpābādhatā mandaglānatā sukhasaṃsparśavihāratā ca?
K10bsu036_u:4667: kaccid bhagavan sattvāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ?
K10bsu036_u:4669: atha khalu te catvāro bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantāmābhyāṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:4673: mā haiva khedaṃ janayanti lokanāthasya bhāṣataḥ // Saddhp_14.2 //
K10bsu036_u:4674: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhāṃścaturo bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - evametat kulaputrāḥ, evametat /
K10bsu036_u:4676: svākārāśca mamaiva te sattvāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suvineyāḥ suviśodhakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4677: na ca me khedaṃ janayanti viśodhyamānāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4679: mamaiva hyete kulaputrāḥ sattvāḥ paurvakeṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kṛtaparikarmāṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4682: yatra ye 'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratekabuddhabhūmau vā kṛtaparicaryā abhuvan,
K10bsu036_u:4683: te 'pi mayaiva etarhi buddhadharmajñānamavatāritāḥ saṃśrāvitāśca paramārtham //
K10bsu036_u:4684: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣanta -
K10bsu036_u:4686: svākārā yena te sattvāḥ suvineyāḥ suśodhakāḥ // Saddhp_14.3 //
K10bsu036_u:4687: ye cedaṃ jñāna gambhīraṃ śṛṇvanti tava nāyaka /
K10bsu036_u:4688: śrutvā ca adhimucyante uttaranti ca nāyaka // Saddhp_14.4 //
K10bsu036_u:4689: evamukte bhagavāṃstasya mahato bodhisattvagaṇasya mahato bodhisattvarāśeḥ pramukhebhyaścaturbhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4691: tena khalu punaḥ samayena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyeṣāṃ cāṣṭānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:4694: aśrutapūrvaśca yo 'yaṃ pṛthivīvivarebhyaḥ samunmajya bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā bhagavantaṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti bhagavantaṃ ca pratisaṃmodante /
K10bsu036_u:4695: kutaḥ khalvime bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgatā iti?(Vaidya 182)
K10bsu036_u:4696: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmanā vicikitsāṃ kathaṃkathāṃ viditvā
K10bsu036_u:4698: parivitarkamājñāya tasyāṃ velāyāmañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhigītenaitamevārthaṃ paripṛcchanti sma -
K10bsu036_u:4701: kuto ime kathaṃ vāpi āgacchanti maharddhikāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4702: mahātmabhāvā rūpeṇa kuta eteṣa āgamaḥ // Saddhp_14.6 //
K10bsu036_u:4704: priyadarśanāśca rūpeṇa kuta eteṣa āgamaḥ // Saddhp_14.7 //
K10bsu036_u:4706: aprameyaḥ parivāro yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // Saddhp_14.8 //
K10bsu036_u:4708: parivāro bodhisattvasya sarve bodhāya prasthitāḥ // Saddhp_14.9 //
K10bsu036_u:4714: ato bahutarāścānye yeṣāṃ daśa ca pañca ca // Saddhp_14.12 //
K10bsu036_u:4717: catvāri trīṇi dve cāpi gaṅgāvālikayā samāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4727: koṭī koṭī ca koṭī ca ardhakoṭī tathaiva ca // Saddhp_14.18 //
K10bsu036_u:4729: bodhisattvā mahāprajñāḥ sthitāḥ sarve sagauravāḥ // Saddhp_14.19 //
K10bsu036_u:4732: viṃśatiddaśa pañcātha catvāri trīṇi dve tathā /
K10bsu036_u:4733: parivāro 'tha vīrāṇāṃ gaṇanaiṣāṃ na vidyate // Saddhp_14.21 //
K10bsu036_u:4734: carantyekātmakā ye ca śāntiṃ vindanti caikakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4735: gaṇanā teṣa naivāsti ye ihādya samāgatāḥ // Saddhp_14.22 //
K10bsu036_u:4737: śalākāṃ gṛhya hastena paryantaṃ naiva so labhet // Saddhp_14.23 //
K10bsu036_u:4739: bodhisattvāna vīrāṇāṃ kuta eteṣa saṃbhavaḥ // Saddhp_14.24 //
K10bsu036_u:4740: kenaiṣāṃ deśito dharmaḥ kena bodhīya sthāpitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4741: rocanti śāsanaṃ kasya kasya śāsanadhārakāḥ // Saddhp_14.25 //
K10bsu036_u:4742: bhittvā hi pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ samantena caturdiśam /
K10bsu036_u:4747: ākhyāhi no tasya nāma lokadhātorvināyaka // Saddhp_14.28 //
K10bsu036_u:4749: na ca dṛṣṭā ime 'smābhirbodhisattvāḥ kadācana // Saddhp_14.29 //
K10bsu036_u:4751: ime 'dya sahasā dṛṣṭā ākhyāhi caritaṃ mune // Saddhp_14.30 //
K10bsu036_u:4755: kuta enti ime śūrā bodhisattvā viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_14.32 //
K10bsu036_u:4757: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyebhyo lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo 'bhyāgatā bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya
K10bsu036_u:4758: ye 'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
K10bsu036_u:4759: ye bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya samantādaṣṭabhyo digbhyo ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu mahāratnasiṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ paryaṅkabaddhāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4760: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ ye svakasvakā upasthāyakāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4761: te 'pi taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ bodhisattvarāśiṃ dṛṣṭvā samantāt pṛthivīvivarebhya unmajjantamākāśadhātupratiṣṭhitam,
K10bsu036_u:4762: te 'pyāścaryaprāptāstān svān svāṃstathāgatānetadūcuḥ - kuto bhagavan iyanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āgacchantyaprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ?
K10bsu036_u:4763: evamuktāste tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstān svān svānupasthāyakānetadūcuḥ - āgamayadhvaṃ yūyaṃ kulaputrā muhūrtam /
K10bsu036_u:4764: eṣa maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ śākyamuneranantaraṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K10bsu036_u:4765: sa etaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametamarthaṃ paripṛcchati /
K10bsu036_u:4766: eṣa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vyākariṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:4768: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu ajita /
K10bsu036_u:4770: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ sarva eva prayatā bhavadhvam /
K10bsu036_u:4775: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4776: prayatā bhavadhvaṃ kulaputra sarva imāṃ pramuñcāmi girāmananyathām /
K10bsu036_u:4777: mā khū viṣādaṃ kurutheha paṇḍitā acintiyaṃ jñānu tathāgatānām // Saddhp_14.33 //
K10bsu036_u:4778: dhṛtimanta bhūtvā smṛtimanta sarve samāhitāḥ sarviḥ sthitā bhavadhvam /
K10bsu036_u:4779: apūrvadharmo śruṇitavyu adya āścaryabhūto hi tathāgatānām // Saddhp_14.34 //
K10bsu036_u:4780: vicikitsa mā jātu kurudhva sarve ahaṃ hi yuṣmān parisaṃsthapemi /
K10bsu036_u:4781: ananyathāvādirahaṃ vināyako jñānaṃ ca me yasya na kāci saṃkhyā // Saddhp_14.35 //
K10bsu036_u:4782: gambhīra dharmāḥ sugatena buddhā atarkiyā yeṣa premāṇu nāsti /
K10bsu036_u:4784: tānadya haṃ dharma prakāśayiṣye śṛṇotha me yādṛśakā yathā ca te // Saddhp_14.36 //
K10bsu036_u:4785: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ maitrayaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - ārocayāmi te ajita,
K10bsu036_u:4787: ya ime ajita bodhisattvā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā acintyā atulyā agaṇanīyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4790: mayaite ajita sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4792: mayā caite kulaputrā asmin bodhisattvadharme paripācitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā niveśitāḥ parisaṃsthāpitā avatāritāḥ paribodhitāḥ pariśodhitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4793: ete ca ajita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhastādākāśadhātuparigrahe prativasanti /
K10bsu036_u:4794: svādhyāyoddeśacintāyoniśomanasikārapravṛttā ete kulaputrā asaṃgaṇikārāmā asaṃsargābhiratā anikṣiptadhurā ārabdhavīryāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4798: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4799: ye bodhisattvā ime aprameyā acintiyā yeṣa pramāṇu nāsti /
K10bsu036_u:4800: ṛddhīya prajñāya śrutenupetā bahukalpakoṭīcaritāśca jñāne // Saddhp_14.37 //
K10bsu036_u:4801: paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiti bodhaye mamaiva kṣetrasmi vasanti caite /
K10bsu036_u:4802: paripācitāḥ sarvi mayaiva ete mamaiva putrāścimi bodhisattvāḥ // Saddhp_14.38 //
K10bsu036_u:4803: sarve ti āraṇyadhutābhiyuktāḥ saṃsargabhūmiṃ sada varjayanti /
K10bsu036_u:4804: asaṅgacārī ca mamaiti putrā mamottamāṃ caryanuśikṣamāṇāḥ // Saddhp_14.39 //
K10bsu036_u:4805: vasanti ākāśaparigrahe 'smin kṣetrasya heṣṭhā paricāri vīrāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4808: ārabdhavīryāḥ smṛtimanta sarve prajñābalasmin sthita aprameye /
K10bsu036_u:4809: viśāradā dharmu kathenti caite prabhāsvarā putra mamaiti sarve // Saddhp_14.41 //
K10bsu036_u:4810: mayā ca prāpya imamagrabodhiṃ nagare gayāyāṃ drumamūli tatra /
K10bsu036_u:4811: anuttaraṃ vartiya dharmacakraṃ paripācitāḥ sarvi ihāgrabodhau // Saddhp_14.42 //
K10bsu036_u:4812: anāsravā bhūta iyaṃ mi vācā śruṇitva sarve mama śraddadhadhvam /
K10bsu036_u:4813: evaṃ ciraṃ prāpta mayāgrabodhi paripācitāścaiti mayaiva sarve // Saddhp_14.43 //
K10bsu036_u:4814: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
K10bsu036_u:4815: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni - kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ
K10bsu036_u:4817: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena
K10bsu036_u:4821: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
K10bsu036_u:4823: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca?
K10bsu036_u:4824: asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapyanto nopalabhyate /
K10bsu036_u:4827: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:4829: evaṃ ca vadet - ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti /
K10bsu036_u:4830: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ - eṣo 'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti /
K10bsu036_u:4831: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam /
K10bsu036_u:4840: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati - mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4842: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti /
K10bsu036_u:4843: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ - ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti /
K10bsu036_u:4845: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante /
K10bsu036_u:4846: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4847: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4850: anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti //
K10bsu036_u:4851: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:4853: prāpto 'si bodhiṃ nagare gayāhvaye kālo 'yamalpo 'tra tu lokanātha // Saddhp_14.44 //
K10bsu036_u:4854: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū ye kalpakoṭīcaritā mahāgaṇī /
K10bsu036_u:4855: ṛddhībale ca sthita aprakampitāḥ suśikṣitāḥ prajñabale gatiṃgatāḥ // Saddhp_14.45 //
K10bsu036_u:4856: anūpaliptāḥ padumaṃ va vāriṇā bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4857: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ smṛtimanta lokādhipatisya putrāḥ // Saddhp_14.46 //
K10bsu036_u:4858: kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4859: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ // Saddhp_14.47 //
K10bsu036_u:4860: yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4861: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān // Saddhp_14.48 //
K10bsu036_u:4863: valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4864: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ // Saddhp_14.49 //
K10bsu036_u:4865: emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4866: smṛtimanta prajñāya viśāradāśca suśikṣitāḥ kalpasahasrakoṭiṣu // Saddhp_14.50 //
K10bsu036_u:4867: dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
K10bsu036_u:4869: asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4870: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim // Saddhp_14.52 //
K10bsu036_u:4871: kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
K10bsu036_u:4872: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā // Saddhp_14.53 //
K10bsu036_u:4873: vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4874: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime // Saddhp_14.54 //
K10bsu036_u:4878: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4880: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4882: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4884: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu
K10bsu036_u:4887: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
K10bsu036_u:4890: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
K10bsu036_u:4893: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4894: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
K10bsu036_u:4898: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
K10bsu036_u:4899: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4901: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet /
K10bsu036_u:4902: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:4903: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet /
K10bsu036_u:4904: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
K10bsu036_u:4905: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat - asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavaṃllokadhātavaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4907: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:4908: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate /
K10bsu036_u:4911: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4913: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
K10bsu036_u:4915: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
K10bsu036_u:4917: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
K10bsu036_u:4919: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4923: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati /
K10bsu036_u:4925: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4926: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ
K10bsu036_u:4929: tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti,
K10bsu036_u:4932: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4933: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
K10bsu036_u:4934: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
K10bsu036_u:4939: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
K10bsu036_u:4940: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā /
K10bsu036_u:4941: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4945: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati
K10bsu036_u:4949: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā /
K10bsu036_u:4951: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt /
K10bsu036_u:4953: khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi /
K10bsu036_u:4955: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me 'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato
K10bsu036_u:4957: andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4958: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti /
K10bsu036_u:4961: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma /
K10bsu036_u:4963: tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ
K10bsu036_u:4965: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti /
K10bsu036_u:4966: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:4968: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya /
K10bsu036_u:4969: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:4970: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya /
K10bsu036_u:4973: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya /
K10bsu036_u:4974: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:4976: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4977: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4978: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4979: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet /
K10bsu036_u:4980: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4983: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4984: evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4987: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
K10bsu036_u:4988: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
K10bsu036_u:4989: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
K10bsu036_u:4990: evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam /
K10bsu036_u:4991: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
K10bsu036_u:4993: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4994: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:4995: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:4996: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti /
K10bsu036_u:5000: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
K10bsu036_u:5002: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet - ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5006: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet - jīrṇo 'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5014: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5015: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
K10bsu036_u:5017: atīva parideveyuḥ - yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako 'nukampakaḥ so 'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5019: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5020: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:5021: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5024: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet /
K10bsu036_u:5025: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
K10bsu036_u:5029: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham /
K10bsu036_u:5030: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati //
K10bsu036_u:5031: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5032: acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyo yāsāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate /
K10bsu036_u:5033: prāptā mayā eṣa tadāgrabodhirdharmaṃ ca deśemyahu nityakālam // Saddhp_15.1 //
K10bsu036_u:5034: samādapemī bahubodhisattvān bauddhasmi jñānasmi sthapemi caiva /
K10bsu036_u:5038: na cāpi nirvāmyahu tasmi kāle ihaiva co dharmu prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_15.3 //
K10bsu036_u:5039: tatrāpi cātmānamadhiṣṭhahāmi sarvāṃśca sattvāna tathaiva cāham /
K10bsu036_u:5040: viparītabuddhī ca narā vimūḍhāḥ tatraiva tiṣṭhantu na paśyiṣū mām // Saddhp_15.4 //
K10bsu036_u:5041: parinirvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭva mamātmabhāvaṃ dhātūṣu pūjāṃ vividhāṃ karonti /
K10bsu036_u:5042: māṃ cā apaśyanti janenti tṛṣṇāṃ tatorjukaṃ citta prabhoti teṣām // Saddhp_15.5 //
K10bsu036_u:5043: ṛjū yadā te mṛdumārdavāśca utsṛṣṭakāmāśca bhavanti sattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5044: tato ahaṃ śrāvakasaṃgha kṛtvāḥ ātmāna darśemyahu gṛdhrakūṭe // Saddhp_15.6 //
K10bsu036_u:5045: evaṃ ca haṃ teṣa vadāmi paścāt ihaiva nāhaṃ tada āsi nirvṛtaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5046: upāyakauśalya mameti bhikṣavaḥ punaḥ puno bhomyahu jīvaloke // Saddhp_15.7 //
K10bsu036_u:5047: anyehi sattvehi puraskṛto 'haṃ teṣāṃ prakāśemi mamāgrabodhim /
K10bsu036_u:5048: yūyaṃ ca śabdaṃ na śṛṇotha mahyaṃ anyatra so nirvṛtu lokanāthaḥ // Saddhp_15.8 //
K10bsu036_u:5049: paśyāmyahaṃ sattva vihanyamānān na cāhu darśemi tadātmabhāvam /
K10bsu036_u:5050: spṛhentu tāvanmama darśanasya tṛṣitāna saddharmu prakāśayiṣye // Saddhp_15.9 //
K10bsu036_u:5053: na ca cyavāmī itu gṛdhrakūṭāt anyāsu śayyāsanakoṭibhiśca // Saddhp_15.10 //
K10bsu036_u:5054: yadāpi sattvā ima lokadhātuṃ paśyanti kalpenti ca dahyamānam /
K10bsu036_u:5055: tadāpi cedaṃ mama buddhakṣetraṃ paripūrṇa bhotī marumānuṣāṇām // Saddhp_15.11 //
K10bsu036_u:5056: krīḍā ratī teṣa vicitra bhoti udyānaprāsādavimānakoṭyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5058: upariṃ ca devābhihananti tūryān mandāravarṣaṃ ca visarjayanti /

K10bsu036_u:5158: kiyatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasavantīti tacchṛṇu,

K10bsu036_u:5169: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

K10bsu036_u:5212: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta,
K10bsu036_u:5214: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:5217: yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
K10bsu036_u:5218: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam - yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5220: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām /
K10bsu036_u:5221: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:5222: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam //
K10bsu036_u:5223: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,
K10bsu036_u:5224: ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:5226: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ 'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati /
K10bsu036_u:5227: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5231: kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
K10bsu036_u:5233: yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ savaijayantīkā ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5234: teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā nānāvidhairdivyairmānuṣyakaiḥ
K10bsu036_u:5238: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā (Vaidya 202)
K10bsu036_u:5239: prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5242: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:5243: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5245: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā,
K10bsu036_u:5246: tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi - na me tena parinirvṛtasya dhātustūpāḥ kārayitavyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5248: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena
K10bsu036_u:5250: bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam /
K10bsu036_u:5251: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu,
K10bsu036_u:5252: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān
K10bsu036_u:5253: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā /
K10bsu036_u:5267: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā
K10bsu036_u:5268: so 'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ - bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati /
K10bsu036_u:5269: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā,
K10bsu036_u:5271: tathāgatastūpo 'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti //
K10bsu036_u:5272: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5273: puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5274: ya idaṃ dhārayetsūtraṃ nirvṛte naranāyake // Saddhp_16.37 //

K10bsu036_u:5287: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā // Saddhp_16.43 //
K10bsu036_u:5291: praveṇī praṇīta prajñaptā āvāsāśca sahasraśaḥ // Saddhp_16.45 //
K10bsu036_u:5294: saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham /

K10bsu036_u:5296: adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5297: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā // Saddhp_16.48 //
K10bsu036_u:5300: dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam /
K10bsu036_u:5302: kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5303: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet // Saddhp_16.51 //
K10bsu036_u:5306: kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5310: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ // Saddhp_16.54 //
K10bsu036_u:5311: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati /
K10bsu036_u:5312: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu // Saddhp_16.55 //
K10bsu036_u:5313: ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam /
K10bsu036_u:5316: dhārayantamidaṃ sūtraṃ kuryādvai tasya satkriyām // Saddhp_16.57 //
K10bsu036_u:5318: mūrdhena vanditva ca tasya pādau tathāgato 'yaṃ janayeta saṃjñām // Saddhp_16.58 //
K10bsu036_u:5319: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle gamiṣyate eṣa drumasya mūlam /
K10bsu036_u:5320: budhyiṣyate bodhimanuttarāṃ śivāṃ hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_16.59 //
K10bsu036_u:5321: yasmiṃśca so caṃkrami tādṛśo viduḥ tiṣṭheta vā yatra niṣīdayedvā /
K10bsu036_u:5322: śayyāṃ ca kalpeya kahiṃci dhīro bhāṣantu gāthāṃ pi tu ekasūtrāt // Saddhp_16.60 //
K10bsu036_u:5324: uddiśya buddhaṃ bhagavanta nāyakaṃ pūjāṃ ca citrāṃ tahi kārayettathā // Saddhp_16.61 //
K10bsu036_u:5325: mayā sa bhuktaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo mayā svayaṃ caṃkramitaṃ ca tatraṃ /
K10bsu036_u:5326: tatropaviṣṭo ahameva ca syāṃ yatra sthitaḥ so bhavi buddhaputraḥ // Saddhp_16.62 //
K10bsu036_u:5327: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:5330: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā anumodet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
K10bsu036_u:5331: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavediti?
K10bsu036_u:5332: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5334: śrutvā cābhyanumodeyā kiyantaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavet // Saddhp_17.1 //
K10bsu036_u:5335: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścidajita
K10bsu036_u:5336: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāya deśyamānaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5337: saṃprakāśyamānaṃ śṛṇuyād bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā vijñapuruṣo vā kumārako vā,
K10bsu036_u:5341: sa ca vihāragato vā gṛhagato vā araṇyagato vā vīthīgato vā grāmagato vā janapadagato
K10bsu036_u:5342: vā tān hetūṃstāni kāraṇāni taṃ dharmaṃ yathāśrutaṃ yathodgṛhītaṃ yathābalamaparasya
K10bsu036_u:5344: saṃmoditasya vā anyasya vā saṃstutasya kasyacit,
K10bsu036_u:5351: atha khalvajita yo 'sau pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣo bhavet paraṃparāśravānumodakaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5352: tasyāpi tāvadahamajita kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhinirdekṣyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:5353: taṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
K10bsu036_u:5355: tadyathāpi nāma ajita caturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu ye sattvāḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānāḥ ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5356: aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā
K10bsu036_u:5357: asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñino vā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā
K10bsu036_u:5358: vā yāvadeva sattvāḥ sattvadhātau saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti /
K10bsu036_u:5359: atha kaścideva puruṣaḥ samutpadyeta puṇyakāmo hitakāmastasya sattvakāyasya sarvakāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāniṣṭān kāntān priyān manāpān dadyāt /
K10bsu036_u:5360: ekaikasya sattvasya jambudvīpaṃ paripūrṇaṃ dadyāt kāmakrīḍāratiparibhogāya,
K10bsu036_u:5362: anena paryāyeṇa ajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ paripūrṇānyaśītiṃ varṣāṇi dānaṃ dadyāt /
K10bsu036_u:5363: atha khalvajita sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirevaṃ cintayet - ime khalu sattvāḥ sarve mayā krīḍāpitā ramāpitāḥ sukhaṃ jivāpitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5364: ime ca te bhavantaḥ sattvā balinaḥ palitaśiraso jīrṇavṛddhā mahallakā (Vaidya 206)
K10bsu036_u:5368: atha khalvajita sa puruṣastān sarvasattvān samādāpayet /
K10bsu036_u:5370: tasya te sattvāstaṃ ca dharmaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5371: śrutvā ca ekakṣaṇena ekamuhūrtena ekalavena sarve srotaāpannāḥ syuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5374: tatkiṃ manyase ajita api nu sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatistatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam?
K10bsu036_u:5375: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
K10bsu036_u:5377: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo dānapatirmahādānapatirbahu puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K10bsu036_u:5381: evamukte bhagavānajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ārocayāmi te ajita,
K10bsu036_u:5383: yaśca sa dānapatirmahādānapatiḥ puruṣaścaturṣu lokadhātuṣvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasreṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ paripūrya arhattve pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K10bsu036_u:5384: yaśca pañcāśattamaḥ puruṣaḥ paraṃparāśravānugataḥ śravaṇena ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodeta /
K10bsu036_u:5389: tataḥ puruṣaparaṃparāta ito dharmaparyāyādekāmapi gāthāmekapadamapi śrutvā anumodet /
K10bsu036_u:5390: asya anumodanāsahagatasya ajita puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārasya anumodanāsahagatasya
K10bsu036_u:5393: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti /
K10bsu036_u:5394: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniḥadamapi na kḥamate /
K10bsu036_u:5395: evamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamajita so 'pi tāvat pañcāśattamaḥ paraṃparāśravaṇe puruḥa ito dharmaparyāyādantaśa ekagāthāmapi ekapadamapi anumodya ca puṇyaṃ prasavati /
K10bsu036_u:5396: kaḥ punarvādo 'jita yo 'yaṃ mama saṃmukhamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt,
K10bsu036_u:5399: yaḥ khalu punarajita asya dharmaparyāyasya śravāṇārthaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svagṛhānniṣkramya vihāraṃ gacchet /
K10bsu036_u:5400: sa ca gattvā tasminnimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ muhūrtakamapi śṛṇuyāt sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā /
K10bsu036_u:5401: sa sattvastanmātreṇa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa kṛtenopacitena jātivinivṛtto dvitīye samucchraye dvitīye ātmabhāvapratilambhe gorathānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:5402: aśvarathānāṃ hastirathānāṃ śibikānāṃ goyanānāmṛṣabhayānānāṃ divyānāṃ ca vimānānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:5403: sacet punastatra dharmaśravaṇe muhūrtamātramapi niṣadya idaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyāt, (Vaidya 207)
K10bsu036_u:5406: tena sa puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa lābhī bhaviṣyati śakrāsanānāṃ brahmāsanānāṃ cakravartisaṃhāsanānām /
K10bsu036_u:5407: sacet punarajita kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aparaṃ puruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
K10bsu036_u:5409: sa ca puruṣastasya tāṃ protsāhanāmāgamya yadi muhūrtamātramapi śṛṇuyāt,
K10bsu036_u:5410: sa sattvastena protsāhena kuśalamūlenābhisaṃskṛtena dhāraṇīpratilabdhairbodhisattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu036_u:5413: na tasya jātiśatasahasrairapi pūti mukhaṃ bhavati na durgandhi /
K10bsu036_u:5419: na duḥsaṃsthitadanto na khaṇḍadanto na patitadanto na vakradanto na lamboṣṭho bhavati,
K10bsu036_u:5420: nābhyantaroṣṭho na prasāritoṣṭho na khaṇḍoṣṭho na vaṅkoṣṭho na kṛṣṇoṣṭho na bībhatsoṣṭho bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:5427: api tu khalvajita sūkṣmasujātajihvādantoṣṭho bhavati āyatanāsaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5431: kṣipraṃ ca buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ pratilabhate /
K10bsu036_u:5432: paśya ajita ekasattvamapi nāma utsāhayitvā iyat puṇyaṃ prasavati /
K10bsu036_u:5436: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5438: anumodayitvā ca prasannacittaḥ śṛṇuṣva puṇyaṃ bhavi yattakaṃ tat // Saddhp_17.2 //
K10bsu036_u:5439: sa caiva puruṣo bhavi dānadātā sattvān koṭīnayuteṣu nityam /
K10bsu036_u:5440: ye pūrvamaupamyakṛtā mayā vai tān sarvi tarpeya aśīti varṣān // Saddhp_17.3 //
K10bsu036_u:5441: so dṛṣṭva teṣāṃ ca jarāmupasthitāṃ valī ca khaṇḍaṃ ca śiraśca pāṇḍaram /
K10bsu036_u:5442: hāhādhimucyanti hi sarvasattvā yannūna dharmeṇa hu ovadeyam // Saddhp_17.4 //
K10bsu036_u:5444: so teṣa dharmaṃ vadatīha paścānnirvāṇabhūmiṃ ca prakāśayeta /
K10bsu036_u:5445: sarve bhavāḥ phenamarīcikalpā nirvidyathā sarvabhaveṣu kṣipram // Saddhp_17.5 //
K10bsu036_u:5446: te sarvasattvāśca śruṇitva dharmaṃ tasyaiva dātuḥ puruṣasya antikāt /
K10bsu036_u:5447: arhantabhūtā bhavi ekakāle kṣīṇāsravā antimadehadhāriṇaḥ // Saddhp_17.6 //
K10bsu036_u:5448: puṇyaṃ tato bahutaru tasya hi syat paraṃparātaḥ śruṇi ekagāthām /
K10bsu036_u:5449: anumodi vā yattaku tasya puṇyaṃ kala puṇyaskandhaḥ purimo na bhoti // Saddhp_17.7 //
K10bsu036_u:5450: evaṃ bahu tasya bhaveta puṇyaṃ anantakaṃ yasya pramāṇu nāsti /
K10bsu036_u:5451: gāthāṃ pi śrutvaika paraṃparāya kiṃ vā punaḥ saṃmukha yo śruṇeyā // Saddhp_17.8 //
K10bsu036_u:5452: yaścaikasattvaṃ pi vadeya tatra protsāhaye gaccha śṛṇuṣva dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:5453: sudurlabhaṃ sutramidaṃ hi bhoti kalpāna koṭīnayutairanekaiḥ // Saddhp_17.9 //
K10bsu036_u:5454: sa cāpi protsāhitu tena sattvaḥ śruṇeya sūtrema muhūrtakaṃ pi /
K10bsu036_u:5455: tasyāpi dharmasya phalaṃ śṛṇohi mukharoga tasya na kadāci bhoti // Saddhp_17.10 //
K10bsu036_u:5456: jihvāpi tasya na kadāci duḥkhati na tasya dantā patitā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:5457: śyāmātha pītā viṣamā ca jātu bībhatsitoṣṭho na ca jātu bhoti // Saddhp_17.11 //
K10bsu036_u:5458: kuṭilaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca na jātu dīrghaṃ mukhaṃ na cipiṭaṃ sya kadāci bhoti /
K10bsu036_u:5460: susaṃsthitā nāsa tathā lalāṭaṃ dantā ca oṣṭho mukhamaṇḍalaṃ ca // Saddhp_17.12 //
K10bsu036_u:5461: priyadarśano bhoti sadā narāṇāṃ pūrtiṃ ca vakraṃ na kadāci bhoti /
K10bsu036_u:5462: yathotpalasyeha sadā sugandhiḥ pravāyate tasya mukhasya gandhaḥ // Saddhp_17.13 //
K10bsu036_u:5463: gṛhādvihāraṃ hi vrajitva dhīro gaccheta sūtraṃ śravaṇāya etat /
K10bsu036_u:5464: gatvā ca so tatra śṛṇe muhūrtaṃ prasannacittasya phalaṃ śṛṇotha // Saddhp_17.14 //
K10bsu036_u:5465: sugauru tasyo bhavatetmabhāvaḥ pariyāti co aśvarathehi dhīraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5466: hastīrathāṃśco abhiruhya uccān ratanehi citrānanucaṃkrameyā // Saddhp_17.15 //
K10bsu036_u:5467: vibhūṣitāṃ so śibikāṃ labheta narairanekairiha vāhyamānām /
K10bsu036_u:5468: gatvāpi dharmaṃ śravaṇāya tasya phalaṃ śubhaṃ bhoti ca evarūpam // Saddhp_17.16 //
K10bsu036_u:5469: niṣadya cāsau pariṣāya tatra śuklena karmeṇa kṛtena tena /
K10bsu036_u:5470: śakrāsanānāṃ bhavate sa lābhī brahmāsanānāṃ ca nṛpāsanānām // Saddhp_17.17 //
K10bsu036_u:5471: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye anumodanāpuṇyanirdeśaparivarto nāma saptadaśamaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:5474: atha khalu bhagavān satatasamitābhiyuktaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayāmāsa - yaḥ kaścit kulaputra imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati vā deśayiṣyati vā likhiṣyati va,
K10bsu036_u:5475: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va aṣṭau cakṣurguṇaśatāni pratilapsyate,
K10bsu036_u:5482: sa evaṃ pariśuddhena cakṣurindriyeṇa prākṛtena māṃsacakṣuṣā mātāpitṛsaṃbhavena trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ
K10bsu036_u:5483: lokadhātuṃ sāntarbahiḥ saśailavanaṣaṇḍāmadho yāvadavīcimahānirayamupādāya upari ca
K10bsu036_u:5484: yāvat bhavāgraṃ tat sarvaṃ drakṣyati prākṛtena māṃsacakṣuṣā /
K10bsu036_u:5488: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5489: ya imaṃ sūtra bhāṣeta parṣāsu ca viśāradaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5490: anolīnaḥ prakāśeyā guṇāṃstasya śṛṇuṣva me // Saddhp_18.1 //
K10bsu036_u:5492: yenāsya vimalaṃ bhoti śuddhaṃ cakṣuranāvilam // Saddhp_18.2 //
K10bsu036_u:5495: meruṃ sumeru sarvā ca cakravālā sa paśyati /
K10bsu036_u:5496: ye cānye parvatāḥ khaṇḍāḥ samudrāṃścāpi paśyati // Saddhp_18.4 //
K10bsu036_u:5498: sarvaṃ sa paśyate dhīro māṃsacakṣusya īdṛśam // Saddhp_18.5 //
K10bsu036_u:5499: na tāva divyacakṣu sya bhoti no cāpi jāyate /
K10bsu036_u:5501: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5502: saṃprakāśayamānaḥ pareṣāṃ ca saṃśrāvayamānastairdvādaśabhiḥ śrotraguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ
K10bsu036_u:5503: ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau vividhāḥ śabdā niścaranti yāvadavīcirmahānirayo
K10bsu036_u:5505: tadyathā - hastiśabdā vā aśvaśabdā vā uṣṭraśabdā vā gośabdā vā ajaśabdā vā janapadaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5506: vā rathaśabdā vā ruditaśabdā vā śokaśabdā vā bhairavaśabdā vā śaṅkhaśabdā vā ghaṇṭāśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5507: vā paṭahaśabdā vā bherīśabdā vā krīḍāśabdā vā gītaśabdā vā nṛtyaśabdā vā tūryaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5508: vā vādyaśabdā vā strīśabdā vā puruṣaśabdā vā dārakaśabdā vā (Vaidya 211)
K10bsu036_u:5509: dārikāśabdā vā dharmaśabdā vā adharmaśabdā vā sukhaśabdā vā duḥkhaśabdā vā bālaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5510: vā āryaśabdā vā manojñaśabdā vā amanojñaśabdā vā devaśabdā vā nāgaśabdā vā yakṣaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5511: vā rākṣasaśabdā vā gandharvaśabdā vā asuraśabdā vā garuḍaśabdā vā kinnaraśabdā vā
K10bsu036_u:5512: mahoragaśabdā vā manuṣyaśabdā vā amanuṣyaśabdā vā agniśabdā vā vāyuśabdā vā udakaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5513: vā grāmaśabdā vā nagaraśabdā vā bhikṣuśabdā vā śrāvakaśabdā vā pratyekabuddhaśabdā
K10bsu036_u:5515: yāvantaḥ kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahiḥ śabdā niścaranti,
K10bsu036_u:5516: tān śabdāṃstena prākṛtena pariśuddhena śrotrendriyeṇa śṛṇoti /
K10bsu036_u:5519: vibhāvayati vibhajati tena ca prākṛtena śrotrendriyeṇa /
K10bsu036_u:5520: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rutāni śṛṇvatastasya taiḥ sarvaśabdaiḥ śrotrendriyaṃ nābhibhūyate /
K10bsu036_u:5521: evaṃrūpaḥ satatasamitābhiyukta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyapratilambho bhavati,
K10bsu036_u:5525: śrotrendriyaṃ tasya viśuddhu bhoti anāvilaṃ prākṛtakaṃ ca tāvat /
K10bsu036_u:5526: vividhān hi yeneha śṛṇoti śabdāniha lokadhātau hi aśeṣato 'yam // Saddhp_18.7 //
K10bsu036_u:5527: hastīna aśvāna śṛṇoti śabdān rathāna goṇāna ajaiḍakānām /
K10bsu036_u:5528: bherīmṛdaṅgāna sughoṣakānāṃ vīṇāna veṇūnatha vallakīnām // Saddhp_18.8 //
K10bsu036_u:5529: gītaṃ manojñaṃ madhuraṃ śṛṇoti na cāpi so sajjati tatra dhīraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5530: manuṣyakoṭīna śṛṇoti śabdān bhāṣanti yaṃ yaṃ ca yahiṃ yahiṃ te // Saddhp_18.9 //
K10bsu036_u:5531: devāna co nitya śṛṇoti śabdān gītasvaraṃ ca madhuraṃ manojñam /
K10bsu036_u:5532: puruṣāṇa istrīṇa rutāni cāpi tatha dārakāṇāmatha dārikāṇām // Saddhp_18.10 //
K10bsu036_u:5533: ye parvateṣveva guhānivāsī kalaviṅkakā kokila barhiṇaśca /
K10bsu036_u:5535: pakṣīṇa ye jīvakajīvakā hi teṣāṃ ca valgū śṛṇute hi śabdān // Saddhp_18.11 //
K10bsu036_u:5536: narakeṣu ye vedana vedayanti sudāruṇāṃścāpi karonti śabdān /
K10bsu036_u:5537: āhāraduḥkhairavapīḍitānāṃ yān preta kurvanti tathaiva śabdān // Saddhp_18.12 //
K10bsu036_u:5538: asurāśca ye sāgaramadhyavāsino muñcanti ghoṣāṃstatha cānyamanyān /
K10bsu036_u:5539: sarvānihastho sa hi dharmabhāṇakaḥ śṛṇoti śabdānna ca ostarīyati // Saddhp_18.13 //
K10bsu036_u:5540: tiryāṇa yonīṣu rutāni yāni anyonyasaṃbhāṣaṇatāṃ karonti /
K10bsu036_u:5541: iha sthitastānapi so śṛṇoti vividhāni śabdāni bahūvidhāni // Saddhp_18.14 //
K10bsu036_u:5542: ye brahmaloke nivasanti devā akaniṣṭha ābhāsvara ye ca devāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5543: ye cānyamanyasya karonti ghoṣān śṛṇoti tatsarvamaśeṣato 'sau // Saddhp_18.15 //
K10bsu036_u:5544: svādhyāya kurvantiha ye ca bhikṣavaḥ sugatāniha śāsani pravrajitvā /
K10bsu036_u:5545: parṣāsu ye deśayate ca dharmaṃ teṣāṃ pi śabdaṃ śṛṇute sa nityam // Saddhp_18.16 //
K10bsu036_u:5546: ye bodhisattvāściha lokadhātau svādhyāya kurvanti paraspareṇa /
K10bsu036_u:5547: saṃgīti dharmeṣu ca ye karonti śṛṇoti śabdān vividhāṃśca teṣām // Saddhp_18.17 //
K10bsu036_u:5548: bhagavān pi buddho naradamyasārathiḥ parṣāsu dharmaṃ bruvate yamagram /
K10bsu036_u:5549: taṃ cāpi so śṛṇvanti ekakāle yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet // Saddhp_18.18 //
K10bsu036_u:5551: sarve trisāhasri imasmi kṣetre ye sattva kurvanti bahūṃ pi śabdān /
K10bsu036_u:5552: abhyantareṇāpi ca bāhireṇa avīciparyanta bhavāgramūrdhvam // Saddhp_18.19 //
K10bsu036_u:5553: sarveṣa sattvāna śṛṇoti śabdān naṃ cāpi kṣetraṃ uparudhyate 'sya /
K10bsu036_u:5554: paṭvindriyo jānati sthānasthānaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ prākṛtakaṃ hi tāvat // Saddhp_18.20 //
K10bsu036_u:5555: na ca tāva divyasmi karoti yatnaṃ prakṛtya saṃtiṣṭhati śrotrametat /
K10bsu036_u:5556: sūtraṃ hi yo dhārayate viśārado guṇā sya etādṛśakā bhavanti // Saddhp_18.21 //
K10bsu036_u:5557: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5558: dhārayataḥ prakāśayataḥ svādhyāyato likhato 'ṣṭābhirguṇaśataiḥ samanvāgataṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5560: sa tena pariśuddhena ghrāṇendriyeṇa ye trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sāntarbahirvividhagandhāḥ saṃvidyante,
K10bsu036_u:5561: tadyathā - pūtigandhā vā manojñagandhā vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ sumanasāṃ gandhāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5578: sa ihasthita eva devānāmapi gandhān ghrāyati,
K10bsu036_u:5579: tadyathā - pārijātakasya kovidārasya māndāravamahāmāndāravamañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakānāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati /
K10bsu036_u:5581: divyānāṃ ca nānāvidhānāṃ puṣpavikṛtiśatasahasrāṇāṃ gandhān ghrāyati,
K10bsu036_u:5585: taṃ ca jānīte yadi vā vaijayante prāsāde krīḍantaṃ ramantaṃ paricārayantaṃ yadi vā
K10bsu036_u:5586: sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ yadi vā udyānabhūmau
K10bsu036_u:5594: anena paryāyeṇa yāvad bhavāgropapannānāmapi sattvānāmātmabhāvagandhān ghrāyati /
K10bsu036_u:5599: yasmiṃśca sthāne te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā viharanti,
K10bsu036_u:5601: na cāsya tad ghrāṇendiyaṃ taistairvividhairgandhaiḥ pratihanyate,
K10bsu036_u:5606: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5607: ghrāṇendriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti vividhāṃśca gandhān bahu ghrāyate 'sau /
K10bsu036_u:5608: ye lokadhātau hi imasmi sarve sugandha durgandha bhavanti kecit // Saddhp_18.22 //
K10bsu036_u:5609: jātīya gandho atha mallikāyā tamālapatrasya ca candanasya /
K10bsu036_u:5610: tagarasya gandho agarusya cāpi vividhāna puṣpāṇa phalāna cāpi // Saddhp_18.23 //
K10bsu036_u:5611: sattvāna gandhān pi tathaiva jānati narāṇa nārīṇa ca dūrataḥ sthitaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5612: kumārakāṇāṃ ca kumārikāṇāṃ gandhena so jānati teṣa sthānam // Saddhp_18.24 //
K10bsu036_u:5613: rājñāṃ pi so jānati cakravartināṃ balacakravartīnatha maṇḍalīnām /
K10bsu036_u:5614: kumārakāmātya tathaiva teṣāṃ gandhena cāntaḥpura sarva jānati // Saddhp_18.25 //
K10bsu036_u:5615: paribhogaratnāni bahūvidhāni kupyāni bhūmau nihitāni yāni /
K10bsu036_u:5616: strīratnabhūtāni bhavanti yāpi gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.26 //
K10bsu036_u:5618: teṣāṃ ca yā ābharaṇā bhavanti kāyasmi āmukta vicitrarūpā /
K10bsu036_u:5619: vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.27 //
K10bsu036_u:5620: sthitāṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ śayitāṃ tathaiva krīḍāratiṃ ṛddhibalaṃ ca sarvam /
K10bsu036_u:5621: so jānatī ghrāṇabalena dhīro yo dhārayet sūtramidaṃ variṣṭham // Saddhp_18.28 //
K10bsu036_u:5622: sugandhatailāna tathaiva gandhān nānāvidhān puṣpaphalāna gandhān /
K10bsu036_u:5623: sakṛtasthito jānati ghrāyate ca amukasmi deśasmi imasmi gandhān // Saddhp_18.29 //
K10bsu036_u:5624: ye parvatānāṃ vivarāntareṣu bahu candanā puṣpita tatra santi /
K10bsu036_u:5625: ye cāpi tasminnivasanti sattvāḥ sarveṣa gandhena vidurvijānati // Saddhp_18.30 //
K10bsu036_u:5626: ye cakravālasya bhavanti pārśve ye sāgarasyo nivasanti madhye /
K10bsu036_u:5627: pṛthivīya ye madhyi vasanti sattvāḥ sarvān sa gandhena vidurvijānati // Saddhp_18.31 //
K10bsu036_u:5628: surāṃśca jānāti tathāsurāṃśca asurāṇa kanyāśca vijānate 'sau /
K10bsu036_u:5629: asurāṇa krīḍāśca ratiṃ ca jānati ghrāṇasya tasyedṛśakaṃ balaṃ hi // Saddhp_18.32 //
K10bsu036_u:5630: aṭavīṣu ye keci catuṣpadāsti siṃhāśca vyāghrāstatha hastināgāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5631: mahiṣā gavā ye gavayaśca tatra ghrāṇena so jānati teṣa vāsam // Saddhp_18.33 //
K10bsu036_u:5632: striyaśca yā gurviṇikā bhavanti kumārakāṃ vāpi kumārikāṃ vā /
K10bsu036_u:5633: dhārenti kukṣau hi kilāntakāyā gandhena so jānati yaṃ tahiṃ syāt // Saddhp_18.34 //
K10bsu036_u:5635: āpannasattvāṃ pi vijānate 'sau vināśadharmāṃ pi vijānate 'sau /
K10bsu036_u:5636: iyaṃ pi nārī vyapanītaduḥkhā prasaviṣyate puṇyamayaṃ kumāram // Saddhp_18.35 //
K10bsu036_u:5637: puruṣāṇa abhiprāyu bahuṃ vijānate abhiprāyagandhaṃ ca tathaiva ghrāyate /
K10bsu036_u:5638: raktāna duṣṭāna tathaiva mrakṣiṇāṃ upaśāntacittāna ca gandha ghrāyate // Saddhp_18.36 //
K10bsu036_u:5639: pṛthivīya ye cāpi nidhāna santi ghanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyam /
K10bsu036_u:5640: mañjūṣa lohī ca tathā supūrṇā gandhena so ghrāyati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.37 //
K10bsu036_u:5641: hārārdhahārān maṇimuktikāśca anarghaprāptā vividhā ca ratnā /
K10bsu036_u:5642: gandhena so jānati tāni sarvā anarghanāmaṃ dyutisaṃsthitaṃ ca // Saddhp_18.38 //
K10bsu036_u:5643: upariṃ ca deveṣu tathaiva puṣpā mandāravāṃścaiva mañjūṣakāṃśca /
K10bsu036_u:5644: yā pārijātasya ca santi puṣpā iha sthito ghrāyati tā sa dhīraḥ // Saddhp_18.39 //
K10bsu036_u:5645: vimāna ye yādṛśakāśca yasya udāra hīnāstatha madhyamāśca /
K10bsu036_u:5646: vicitrarūpāśca bhavanti yatra iha sthito ghrāṇabalena ghrāyati // Saddhp_18.40 //
K10bsu036_u:5647: udyānabhūmiṃ ca tathā prajānate sudharma devāsani vaijayante /
K10bsu036_u:5648: prāsādaśreṣṭhe ca tathā vijānate ye co ramante tahi devaputrāḥ // Saddhp_18.41 //
K10bsu036_u:5649: iha sthito ghrāyati gandhu teṣāṃ gandhena so jānati devaputrān /
K10bsu036_u:5651: yo yatra karmā kurute sthito vā śete vā gacchati yatra vāpi // Saddhp_18.42 //
K10bsu036_u:5653: ramanti gacchanti ca yatra yatra gandhena so jānati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.43 //
K10bsu036_u:5654: yāvadbhavāgrādupariṃ ca devā brahmā mahābrahma vimānacāriṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5655: tāṃścāpi gandhena tahiṃ prajānate sthitāṃśca dhyāne atha vyutthitān vā // Saddhp_18.44 //
K10bsu036_u:5657: ghrāṇendriyaṃ īdṛśa tasya bhoti yo bodhisattvo imu sūtra dhārayet // Saddhp_18.45 //
K10bsu036_u:5658: ya keci bhikṣū sugatasya śāsane abhiyuktarūpā sthita cakrameṣu /
K10bsu036_u:5659: uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca bhikṣavo sarvān hi so jānati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.46 //
K10bsu036_u:5660: ye śrāvakā bhonti jinasya putrā viharanti kecit sada vṛkṣamūle /
K10bsu036_u:5661: gandhena sarvān vidu jānate tān amutra bhikṣū amuko sthito ti // Saddhp_18.47 //
K10bsu036_u:5662: ye bodhisattvāḥ smṛtimanta dhyāyino uddeśasvādhyāyaratāśca ye sadā /
K10bsu036_u:5663: parṣāsu dharmaṃ ca prakāśayanti gandhena tān jānati bodhisattvaḥ // Saddhp_18.48 //
K10bsu036_u:5664: yasyāṃ diśāyāṃ sugato mahāmunirdharmaṃ prakāśeti hitānukampakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5665: puraskṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṃghamadhye gandhena so jānati lokanātham // Saddhp_18.49 //
K10bsu036_u:5667: ye cāpi sattvā sya śṛṇoti dharmaṃ śrutvā ca ye prītamanā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:5668: iha sthito jānati bodhisattvo jinasya parṣāmapui tatra sarvām // Saddhp_18.50 //
K10bsu036_u:5669: etādṛśaṃ ghrāṇabalaṃ sya bhoti na ca tāva divyaṃ bhavate sya ghrāṇam /
K10bsu036_u:5670: pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya tu eta bhoti divyasya ghrāṇasya anāsravasya // Saddhp_18.51 //
K10bsu036_u:5671: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5674: sa tathārūpeṇa jihvendriyeṇa yān yān rasānāsvādayati,
K10bsu036_u:5677: tathā ca āsvādayiṣyati yathā na kaṃcid rasamamanaāpamāsvādayiṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:5678: ye 'pi amanaāpā rasāste 'pi tasya jihvendriye samupanikṣiptāḥ divyaṃ rasaṃ mokṣyante /
K10bsu036_u:5680: tena tasya te sattvāḥ prīṇitendriyā bhaviṣyanti tuṣṭāḥ paramatuṣṭāḥ prāmodyajātāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5681: madhuraścāsya valgumanojñasvaro gambhīro niścariṣyati hṛdayaṃgamaḥ premaṇīyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5684: te cāsya madhuranirghoṣaṃ śrutvā valgumanojñaṃ devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravanāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5685: devaputrā api devakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5686: śakrā api brahmāṇo 'pi brahmakāyikā api devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5687: nāgā nāgakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5688: asurā asurakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5689: garūḍā garūḍakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5693: piśācāḥ piśācakanyā api upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
K10bsu036_u:5697: rājāno 'pi rājaputrā api rājāmātyā api rājamahāmātrā api darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:5699: cakravartino 'pi saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ sakumārāḥ sāmātyāḥ sāntaḥpuraparivārā darśanakāmā bhaviṣyanti
K10bsu036_u:5701: tāvanmadhuraṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyate yathābhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ tathāgatena /
K10bsu036_u:5707: yasyāṃ ca diśi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vihariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:5711: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5712: jihvendriyaṃ tasya viśiṣṭu bhoti na jātu hīnaṃ rasa svādayeta /
K10bsu036_u:5713: nikṣiptamātrāśca bhavanti divyā rasena divyena samanvitāśca // Saddhp_18.52 //
K10bsu036_u:5714: valgusvarāṃ madhura prabhāṣate girāṃ śravaṇīyamiṣṭāṃ ca manoramāṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:5715: parṣāya madhyasmi ha premaṇīyaṃ gambhīraghoṣaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate // Saddhp_18.53 //
K10bsu036_u:5717: prāmodya tatrāpi janeti so 'graṃ pūjāṃ ca tasya kurute 'prameyām // Saddhp_18.54 //
K10bsu036_u:5718: devā pi nāgāsuraguhyakāśca draṣṭuṃ tamicchanti ca nityakālam /
K10bsu036_u:5719: śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ ca sagauravāśca ime guṇāstasya bhavanti sarve // Saddhp_18.55 //
K10bsu036_u:5721: snigdhaḥ svaro 'sya madhuraśca bhoti gambhīra valguśca supremaṇīyaḥ // Saddhp_18.56 //
K10bsu036_u:5723: saputradārā kariyāṇa añjaliṃ śṛṇvanti dharmasya ca nityakālam // Saddhp_18.57 //
K10bsu036_u:5725: yakṣāṇa co bhoti sadā puraskṛto nāgāna gandharvagaṇāna caiva /
K10bsu036_u:5726: piśācakānāṃ ca piśācikānāṃ susatkṛto mānitu pūjitaśca // Saddhp_18.58 //
K10bsu036_u:5727: brahmāpi tasya vaśavarti bhoti maheśvaro īśvara devaputraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5729: buddhāśca ye lokahitānukampakāḥ saśrāvakāstasya niśāmya ghoṣam /
K10bsu036_u:5730: karonti rakṣāṃ mukhadarśanāya tuṣṭāśca bhonti bruvato 'sya dharmam // Saddhp_18.60 //
K10bsu036_u:5731: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo
K10bsu036_u:5732: vā vācayamāno vā prakāśayamāno vā deśayamāno vā likhamāno vā aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyati /
K10bsu036_u:5733: tasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśuddho vaiḍūryapariśuddhacchavivarṇo bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:5735: sa tasminnātmabhāve pariśuddhe sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ drakṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:5736: ye ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāścyavanti upapadyante ca,
K10bsu036_u:5740: ye ca cakravālamahācakravāleṣu merusumeruṣu ca parvatarājeṣu sattvāḥ prativasanti,
K10bsu036_u:5741: ye ca adhastādavīcyāmūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ sattvāḥ prativasanti,
K10bsu036_u:5743: ye cāpi kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātrau śrāvakā vā pratyekabuddhā vā bodhisattvā vā tathāgatā vā prativasanti,
K10bsu036_u:5744: yaṃ ca te tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K10bsu036_u:5746: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmātmabhāvapratilambhān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati /

K10bsu036_u:5752: ādarśapṛṣṭhe yatha vimbu paśyet loko 'sya kāye ayu dṛśyate tathā /

K10bsu036_u:5757: vimāna devāna bhavāgra yāvacchailaṃ pi co parvatacakravālam /

K10bsu036_u:5764: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayato deśayataḥ saṃprakāśayato likhato vācayatastairdvādaśabhirmanaskāraguṇaśataiḥ
K10bsu036_u:5766: sa tena pariśuddhena manaindriyeṇa yadyekagāthāmapyantaśaḥ śroṣyati,

K10bsu036_u:5771: so 'sya smṛto na sa saṃpramoṣaṃ yāsyati /

K10bsu036_u:5774: yāvantaśca kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsaranti,
K10bsu036_u:5777: apratilabdhe ca tāvadāryajñāne evaṃrūpaṃ cāsya manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:5778: yāṃ yāṃ ca dharmaniruktimanuvicintya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:5782: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5783: manaindriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhamanāvilaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:5784: so tena dharmān vividhān prajānati hīnānathotkṛṣṭa tathaiva madhyamān // Saddhp_18.67 //
K10bsu036_u:5785: ekāmapi gātha śruṇitva dhīro artha bahuṃ jānati tasya tatra /

K10bsu036_u:5789: ṣaṭsu gatīṣu nivasanti sattvā vicintitaṃ teṣa bhaveta yaṃ ca /

K10bsu036_u:5793: bahūn vicinteti ca agradharmān bahūṃśca so bhāṣati nityakālam /

K10bsu036_u:5795: saṃdhiṃ visaṃdhiṃ ca vijānate 'sau sarveṣu dharmeṣu vilakṣaṇāni /

K10bsu036_u:5798: yaṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhotiha dīrgharātraṃ pūrvehi lokācariyehi sūtram /

K10bsu036_u:5800: manaindriyaṃ īdṛśamasya bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imu vācayitvā /

K10bsu036_u:5802: ācāryabhūmau hi sthitaśca bhoti sarveṣa sattvāna katheya dharmam /
K10bsu036_u:5803: niruktikoṭīkuśalaśca bhoti imu dhārayanto sugatasya sutram // Saddhp_18.76 //
K10bsu036_u:5807: atha khalu bhagavān mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - anenāpi

K10bsu036_u:5814: ye ca imamaevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K10bsu036_u:5816: teṣāmevamiṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati yādṛśo mayā pūrvaṃ parikīrtitaḥ /

K10bsu036_u:5821: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vinirbhoge kalpe mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau /
K10bsu036_u:5822: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavān bhīṣmagarjitasvararājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ
K10bsu036_u:5823: mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purato dharmaṃ deśayati sma /

K10bsu036_u:5826: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya tathāgatajñānadarśanaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /

K10bsu036_u:5831: tasyāṃ khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya
K10bsu036_u:5832: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratirūpake ca antarhite
K10bsu036_u:5833: aparo 'pi bhīṣmagarjitasvararāja eva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
K10bsu036_u:5834: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca

K10bsu036_u:5841: kena kāraṇena mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāparibhūta ityucyate?
K10bsu036_u:5842: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yameva paśyati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣūṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:5843: taṃ tamupasaṃkramya eva vadati - nāhamāyuṣmanto yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
K10bsu036_u:5847: bhaviṣyatha yūyaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /

K10bsu036_u:5851: sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:5852: taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /

K10bsu036_u:5860: paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ ca /
K10bsu036_u:5861: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti /
K10bsu036_u:5864: ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti,
K10bsu036_u:5865: sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti /

K10bsu036_u:5867: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ
K10bsu036_u:5868: pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:5869: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo viṃśatibhirgāthāviṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairbhāṣito 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:5870: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt /
K10bsu036_u:5871: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,

K10bsu036_u:5873: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
K10bsu036_u:5875: ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5879: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan //
K10bsu036_u:5880: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān,

K10bsu036_u:5890: śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt //

K10bsu036_u:5892: koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā

K10bsu036_u:5896: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
K10bsu036_u:5897: yastasya bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt,
K10bsu036_u:5898: yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan?

K10bsu036_u:5907: yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni
K10bsu036_u:5908: bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5915: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ /

K10bsu036_u:5917: / tenaiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:5918: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - katame tena
