K10bsu036_u:5920: asyāmeva mahāsthāmaprāpta parṣadi bhadrapālapramukhāṇi pañca bodhisattvaśatāni siṃhacandrāpramukhāni
K10bsu036_u:5923: evamiyaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta mahārthasya dharmaparyāyasya dhāraṇā vācanā deśanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā saṃvartate /
K10bsu036_u:5924: tasmāttarhi mahāsthāmaprāpta ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvairmahāsattvaistathāgate parinirvṛte abhīkṣṇaṃ dhārayitavyo vācayitavyo deśayitavyaḥ saṃprakāśayitavya iti //
K10bsu036_u:5925: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:5928: tasya jinasya parinirvṛtasya saddharma saṃkṣobha vrajanti paścime /
K10bsu036_u:5929: bhikṣū abhūṣī tada bodhisattvo nāmena so sadaparibhūta ucyate // Saddhp_19.2 //
K10bsu036_u:5930: upasaṃkramitvā tada bhikṣu anyān upalambhadṛṣṭīna tathaiva bhikṣuṇī /
K10bsu036_u:5931: paribhāva mahyaṃ na kadācidasti yūyaṃ hi caryāṃ carathāgrabodhaye // Saddhp_19.3 //
K10bsu036_u:5932: evaṃ ca saṃśrāvayi nityakālaṃ ākrośa paribhāṣa sahantu teṣām /
K10bsu036_u:5933: kālakriyāyāṃ samupasthitāyāṃ śrutaṃ idaṃ sūtramabhūṣi tena // Saddhp_19.4 //
K10bsu036_u:5934: akṛtva kālaṃ tada paṇḍitena adhiṣṭhihitvā ca sudīrghamāyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5935: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tadāsīt tahi śāsane tasya vināyakasya // Saddhp_19.5 //
K10bsu036_u:5937: te cāpi sarve bahu opalambhikā bodhīya tena paripācitāsīt /
K10bsu036_u:5938: tataścyavitvāna sa bodhisattvo ārāgayī buddhasahasrakoṭyaḥ // Saddhp_19.6 //
K10bsu036_u:5939: anupūrva puṇyena kṛtena tena prakāśayitvā imu sūtra nityam /
K10bsu036_u:5940: bodhiṃ sa saṃprāpta jinasya putro ahameva so śākyamunistadāsīt // Saddhp_19.7 //
K10bsu036_u:5941: ye cāpi bhikṣū tada opalambhikā yā bhikṣuṇī ye ca upāsakā vā /
K10bsu036_u:5942: upāsikāstatra ca yā tadāsīd ye bodhi saṃśrāvita paṇḍitena // Saddhp_19.8 //
K10bsu036_u:5943: te cāpi dṛṣṭvā bahubuddhakoṭya ime ca te pañcaśatā anūnakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5944: tathaiva bhikṣūṇa ca bhikṣuṇī ca upāsikāścāpi mi mahya saṃmukham // Saddhp_19.9 //
K10bsu036_u:5945: sarve mayā śrāvita agradharmā te caiva sarve paripācitā me /
K10bsu036_u:5946: mayi nirvṛte cāpimi sarvi dhīrā imu dhārayiṣyanti ha sūtramagram // Saddhp_19.10 //
K10bsu036_u:5947: kalpāna koṭyo bahubhīracintyairna kadācidetādṛśa dharma śrūyate /
K10bsu036_u:5948: buddhāna koṭīśata caiva bhonti na ca te pimaṃ sūtra prakāśayanti // Saddhp_19.11 //
K10bsu036_u:5949: tasmācchrūṇitvā idamevarūpaṃ parikīrtitaṃ dharmu svayaṃ svayaṃbhūvā /
K10bsu036_u:5950: ārāgayitvā ca punaḥ punaścimaṃ prakāśayet sūtra mayīha nirvṛte // Saddhp_19.12 //
K10bsu036_u:5954: atha khalu yāni tāni sāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pṛthivīvivarebhyo niṣkrāntāni,
K10bsu036_u:5955: tāni sarvāṇi bhagavato 'bhimukhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayaṃ bhagavan
K10bsu036_u:5956: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni yāni bhagavato buddhakṣetrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:5959: arthino vayaṃ bhagavan anenaikavamudāreṇa dharmaparyāyeṇa dhāraṇāya vācanāya deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya vā likhanāya //
K10bsu036_u:5960: atha khalu mañjuśrīpramukhāni bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau vāstavyāni,
K10bsu036_u:5962: bahavaśca gaṅgānadīvālikopamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya addaṣṭenātmabhāvena,
K10bsu036_u:5965: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ teṣāṃ paurvikāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:5966: gaṇināṃ mahāgaṇināṃ gaṇācāryāṇāmekaṃ pramukhaṃ viśiṣṭacāritraṃ nāma bodhisattvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5967: mahāsattvaṃ mahāgaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryamāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu viśiṣṭacāritra /
K10bsu036_u:5970: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgataḥ sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ stūpamadhye /
K10bsu036_u:5974: tābhyāṃ ca jihvendriyābhyāṃ bahūni raśmikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
K10bsu036_u:5975: tāsu ca raśmiṣvekaikasyā raśmerbahūni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5976: suvarṇavarṇāḥ kāyairdvātriṃśadbhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5977: te ca bodhisattvā digvidikṣu lokadhātuśatasahasreṣu visṛtāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5979: yathaiva bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5980: karoti prabhūtaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tathaiva te sarve tathāgatā
K10bsu036_u:5982: ye te 'nyalokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrebhyo 'bhyāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭā jihvendriyeṇa ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ kurvanti
K10bsu036_u:5983: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ te ca sarve tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tamṛddhayabhisaṃskāraṃ paripūrṇaṃ varśaśatasahasraṃ kṛtavantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:5984: atha khalu varṣaśatasahasrasyātyayena te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstāni
K10bsu036_u:5985: jihvendriyāṇi punarevopasaṃhṛtya ekasminneva kṣaṇalavamuhūrte samakālaṃ sarvairmahāsiṃhotkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5987: tena ca mahotkāsanaśabdena mahācchaṭāsaṃghātaśabdena yāvanti daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:5989: prakampitāni saṃprakampitāni calitāni pracalitāni saṃpracalitāni vedhitāni pravedhitāni saṃpravedhitāni /
K10bsu036_u:5990: teṣu ca sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāvantaḥ sarvasattvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:5991: te 'pi sarve buddhānubhāvena tatrasthā evamimāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:5992: tāni ca sarvatathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni
K10bsu036_u:5993: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ
K10bsu036_u:5994: prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ tasya mahāratnastūpasya
K10bsu036_u:5995: madhye siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatena sārdhaṃ niṣaṇṇāṃ tāśca
K10bsu036_u:5997: dṛṣṭvā ca āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:5998: evaṃ ca antarīkṣād ghoṣamaśrauṣuḥ - eṣa mārṣā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6000: sa etarhi saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
K10bsu036_u:6002: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskurudhvam
K10bsu036_u:6003: atha khalu te sarvasattvā imamevaṃrūpamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tatrasthā eva namo
K10bsu036_u:6004: bhagavate śākyamunaye tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti vācaṃ bhāṣante sma añjaliṃ pragṛhya /
K10bsu036_u:6005: vividhāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyo yeneyaṃ sahā lokadhātustena kṣipanti sma,
K10bsu036_u:6006: nānavidhāni cābharaṇāni pindhāṇi hārārdhahāramaṇiratnānyapi kṣipanti sma,
K10bsu036_u:6007: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ prabhūtaratnasya ca tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe,
K10bsu036_u:6009: tāśca puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantyastāni ca hārārdhahāramaṇiratnāni kṣiptāni imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
K10bsu036_u:6014: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānāmantrayāmāsa - acintyaprabhāvāḥ kulaputrāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
K10bsu036_u:6015: bahūnyapyahaṃ kulaputrāḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi asya dharmaparyāyasya parīndanārthaṃ nānādharmapramukhairbahūnānuśaṃsān bhāṣeyam /
K10bsu036_u:6016: na cāhaṃ guṇānāṃ pāraṃ gaccheyamasya dharmaparyāyasya bhāṣamāṇaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6017: saṃkṣepeṇa kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhavṛṣabhitā sarvabuddharahasyaṃ sarvabuddhagambhīrasthānaṃ mayā asmin dharmaparyāye deśitam /
K10bsu036_u:6018: tasmāttarhi kulaputrā yuṣmābhistathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyo deśayitavyo likhitavyo vācayitavyaḥ prakāśayitavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6019: (Vaidya 231) yasmiṃśca kulaputrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśe ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo vācyeta vā prakāśyeta
K10bsu036_u:6020: vā deśyeta vā likhyeta vā cintyeta vā bhāṣyeta vā svādhyāyeta vā pustakagato vā tiṣṭhat
K10bsu036_u:6021: ārāme vā vihāre vā gṛhe vā vane vā nagare vā vṛkṣamūle vā prāsāde vā layane vā guhāyāṃ vā,
K10bsu036_u:6024: sarvatathāgatānāṃ hi sa pṛthivīpradeśo bodhimaṇḍo veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6025: tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe sarvatathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā iti veditavyam /
K10bsu036_u:6028: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K10bsu036_u:6030: ye ṛddhi darśenti anantacakṣuṣaḥ prāmodyahetoriha sarvadehinām // Saddhp_20.1 //
K10bsu036_u:6032: āścaryabhūtā iha ṛddhidarśitāḥ te sarvi ye prasthita agrabodhau // Saddhp_20.2 //
K10bsu036_u:6033: utkāsitaṃ cāpi karonti buddhā ekācchaṭā ye ca karonti śabdam /
K10bsu036_u:6034: te vijñapentī imu sarvalokaṃ daśo diśāyāṃ ima lokadhātum // Saddhp_20.3 //
K10bsu036_u:6035: etāni cānyāni ca prātihāryā guṇānnidarśenti hitānukampakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6036: kathaṃ nu te harṣita tasmi kāle dhāreyu sūtraṃ sugatasya nirvṛte // Saddhp_20.4 //
K10bsu036_u:6037: bahū pi kalpāna sahasrakoṭyo vadeya varṇaṃ sugatātmajānām /
K10bsu036_u:6038: ye dhārayiṣyantima sūtramagraṃ parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin // Saddhp_20.5 //
K10bsu036_u:6039: na teṣa paryanta bhavedguṇānāṃ ākāśadhātau hi yathā diśāsu /
K10bsu036_u:6040: acintiyā teṣā guṇā bhavanti ye sūtra dhārenti idaṃ śubhaṃ sadā // Saddhp_20.6 //
K10bsu036_u:6041: dṛṣṭo ahaṃ sarva ime ca nāyakā ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtu lokanāyakaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6043: ime ca sarve bahubodhisattvāḥ parṣāśca catvāri anena dṛṣṭāḥ // Saddhp_20.7 //
K10bsu036_u:6044: ahaṃ ca ārāgitu tenihādya ime ca ārāgita sarvi nāyakāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6045: ayaṃ ca yo nirvṛtako jinendro ye cāpi anye daśasū diśāsu // Saddhp_20.8 //
K10bsu036_u:6046: anāgatātīta tathā ca buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti ye cāpi daśasu ddiśāsu /
K10bsu036_u:6047: te sarvi dṛṣṭāśca supūjitāśca bhaveyu yo dhārayi sūtrametat // Saddhp_20.9 //
K10bsu036_u:6049: anucintayetso pi tu kṣiprameva yo dhārayet sūtrimu bhūtadharmam // Saddhp_20.10 //
K10bsu036_u:6050: pratibhānu tasyāpi bhavedanantaṃ yathāpi vāyurna kahiṃci sajjati /
K10bsu036_u:6051: dharme 'pi cārthe ca nirukti jānati yo dhārayet sutramidaṃ viśiṣṭam // Saddhp_20.11 //
K10bsu036_u:6052: anusaṃdhisūtrāṇa sadā prajānati saṃdhāya yaṃ bhāṣitu nāyakehi /
K10bsu036_u:6053: parinirvṛtasyāpi vināyakasya sūtrāṇa so jānati bhutamartham // Saddhp_20.12 //
K10bsu036_u:6054: candropamaḥ sūryasamaḥ sa bhāti ālokapradyotakaraḥ sa bhoti /
K10bsu036_u:6055: vicarantu so medini tena tena samādapetī bahubodhisattvān // Saddhp_20.13 //
K10bsu036_u:6056: tasmāddhi ye paṇḍita bodhisattvāḥ śrutvānimānīddaśa ānuśaṃsān /
K10bsu036_u:6057: dhāreyu sūtraṃ mama nirvṛtasya na teṣa bodhāya bhaveta saṃśayaḥ // Saddhp_20.14 //
K10bsu036_u:6058: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye tathāgataddharyabhisaṃskāraparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6061: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
K10bsu036_u:6062: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:6063: kiyad bhagavan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K10bsu036_u:6066: evamukte bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yaḥ kaścid
K10bsu036_u:6067: bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aśītigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni tathāgatakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu036_u:6069: takiṃ manyase bhaiṣajyarāja kiyatkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K10bsu036_u:6070: bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - bahu bhagavan,
K10bsu036_u:6074: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā asmāt saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśa ekāmapi catuṣpadīgāthāṃ dhārayet,
K10bsu036_u:6078: ataḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //
K10bsu036_u:6079: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:6080: - dāsyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ vā yeṣāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko
K10bsu036_u:6084: anye manye mane mamane citte carite same samitā viśānte mukte muktatame same aviṣame
K10bsu036_u:6085: samasame jaye kṣaye akṣaye akṣiṇe śānte samite dhāraṇi ālokabhāṣe pratyavekṣaṇi nidhiru
K10bsu036_u:6086: abhyantaraniviṣṭe abhyantarapāriśuddhimutkule araḍe paraḍe sukāṅkṣi asamasame buddhavilokite
K10bsu036_u:6087: dharmaparīkṣite saṃghanirghoṣaṇi nirghoṇi bhayābhayaviśodhani mantre mantrākṣayate
K10bsu036_u:6088: rute rutakauśalye akṣaye akṣayavanatāye vakkule valoḍra amanyanatāye svāhā //
K10bsu036_u:6090: te sarve buddhā bhagavantastena drugdhāḥ syuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6092: atha khalu bhagavān bhaiṣajyarājāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt sādhu sādhu bhaiṣajyarāja,
K10bsu036_u:6096: atha khalu pradānaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahamapi bhagavan evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmarthāya dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi,
K10bsu036_u:6097: yatteṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ na kaścidavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate /
K10bsu036_u:6098: tadyathā yakṣo vā rākṣaso vā pūtano vā kṛtyo vā kumbhāṇḍo vā preto vā avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ na lapsyata iti //
K10bsu036_u:6100: atha khalu pradānaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣate sma / tadyathā -
K10bsu036_u:6101: jvale mahājvale ukke tukke mukke aḍe aḍāvati nṛtye nṛtyāvati iṭṭini viṭṭini ciṭṭini nṛtyani nṛtyāvati svāhā //
K10bsu036_u:6106: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājo bhagavantametadavocat - ahamapi bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni bhāṣiṣye teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ hitāya sukhāya anukampāyai rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye // tadyathā -
K10bsu036_u:6107: aṭṭe taṭṭe naṭṭe vanaṭṭe anaḍe nāḍi kunaḍi svāhā //
K10bsu036_u:6108: ebhirbhagavan dhāraṇīpadaisteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ pudgalānāṃ rakṣāṃ karomi,
K10bsu036_u:6109: yojanaśatāccāhaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ rakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:6111: atha khalu virūḍhako mahārājo tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaśca kumbhāṇḍakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6112: sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat - ahamapi bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni bhāṣiṣye bahujanahitāya
K10bsu036_u:6113: teṣāṃ ca tathārūpāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye dhāraṇīmantrapadāni / tadyathā -
K10bsu036_u:6114: agaṇe gaṇe gauri gandhāri caṇḍāli mātaṅgi pukkasi saṃkule vrūsali sisi svāhā //
K10bsu036_u:6119: atha khalu lambā ca nāma rākṣasī vilambā ca nāma rākṣasī kūṭadantī ca nāma rākṣasī
K10bsu036_u:6120: puṣpadantī ca nāma rākṣasī makuṭadantī ca nāma rākṣasī keśinī ca nāma rākṣasī acalā
K10bsu036_u:6121: ca nāma rākṣasī mālādhārī ca nāma rākṣasī kuntī ca nāma rākṣasī sarvasattvojohārī
K10bsu036_u:6122: ca nāma rākṣasī hḥrītī ca nḥma rḥkṣasī saputraparivḥrḥ etḥḥ sarvḥ rḥkṣasyo yena bhagavḥṃstenopasaṃkrḥntḥḥ /

K10bsu036_u:6341: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāmutsasarastaḍāgānāṃ mahāsamudro mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6342: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6343: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ kālaparvatānāṃ cakravālānāṃ mahācakravālānāṃ ca sumeruḥ parvatarājo mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6345: ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ rājā mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6346: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramāḥ prabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6347: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaścandrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātirekaprabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6348: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
K10bsu036_u:6349: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvākuśalatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
K10bsu036_u:6350: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6351: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmindraḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6352: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ rājā brahmaloke pitṛkāryaṃ karoti,
K10bsu036_u:6353: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6354: sattvānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6356: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvabālapṛthagjanānatikrāntaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaśca,
K10bsu036_u:6357: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān sūtrāntānatikramya abhyudgato mūrdhaprāpto veditavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6361: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvo 'gra ākhyāyate,
K10bsu036_u:6362: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sutrāntānāmagra ākhyāyate /
K10bsu036_u:6363: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tathāgato dharmarājaḥ paṭṭabaddhaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6364: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastathāgatabhūto bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānām /
K10bsu036_u:6365: trātā khalvapi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvabhayebhyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6367: taḍāga iva tṛṣitānāmagniriva śītārtānāṃ cailamiva nagnānāṃ sārthavāha iva vaṇijānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6368: māteva putrāṇāṃ nauriva pāragāmināṃ vaidya iva āturāṇāṃ dīpa iva tamondhakārāvṛtānāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6369: ratnamiva dhanārthināṃ cakravartīva sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ samudra iva saritāmulkeva sarvatamondhakāravidhamanāya /
K10bsu036_u:6370: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocakaḥ sarvavyādhicchedakaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayabandhanasaṃkaṭapramocakaḥ
K10bsu036_u:6371: yena cāyaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:6374: eṣāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña puṇyābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bauddhena jñānena na śakyaṃ paryanto 'dhigantum,
K10bsu036_u:6375: yāvantaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:6376: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā deśayitvā vā śrutvā vā likhitvā (Vaidya 242)
K10bsu036_u:6377: vā pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākavaijayantībhirvādyavastrāñjalikarmabhirvā
K10bsu036_u:6380: pūjābhiḥ satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ kuryāt pūjanāṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:6382: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūvayogaparivartaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati śroṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:6383: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña mātṛgrāma imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā udgahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvo bhaviṣyati
K10bsu036_u:6385: pañcāśatyāṃ śrutvā mātṛgrāmaḥ pratipatsyate sa khalvataścyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate
K10bsu036_u:6386: yasyāṃ sa bhagavānamitāyustathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
K10bsu036_u:6387: sa tasyāṃ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upapatsyate /
K10bsu036_u:6389: na dveṣo na moho na māno na mātsaryaṃ na krodho na vyāpādaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6392: anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvāsaptatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃstathāgatān drakṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:6394: yena cakṣurindriyeṇa pariśuddhena tān buddhān bhagavato drakṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:6395: te cāsya buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K10bsu036_u:6396: yattvayā saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10bsu036_u:6397: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane uddiṣṭaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ bhāvitaṃ cintitaṃ manasi kṛtaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6399: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyamagninā dagdhuṃ nodakena hartum /
K10bsu036_u:6400: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyaṃ buddhasahesreṇāpi nirdeṣṭum /
K10bsu036_u:6403: na tava kulaputra sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadṛśo vidyate tathāgatamekaṃ vinirmucya /
K10bsu036_u:6404: nānyaḥ kaścicchrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā yastvāṃ śaktaḥ puṇyena vā prajñayā vā samādhinā vā abhibhavitum /
K10bsu036_u:6405: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:6406: yaḥ kaścinnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvā sādhukāramanupradāsyati,
K10bsu036_u:6412: tasmāttarhi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña anuparindāmyahamimaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūrvayogaparivartam,
K10bsu036_u:6413: yathā paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasmin jambudvīpe pracaret,
K10bsu036_u:6417: na nāgā na yakṣā na gandharvā na kumbhāṇḍā avatāraṃ labheyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6420: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vyādhiḥ kāye na kramiṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:6422: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paśyedevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣum,
K10bsu036_u:6424: abhyavakīrya caivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam /
K10bsu036_u:6432: vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam
K10bsu036_u:6434: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:6435: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña,
K10bsu036_u:6438: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma dvāviṃśatimaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6441: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,
K10bsu036_u:6442: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:6443: tāni ca aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6444: tatra kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati vipulenāyuṣpramāṇena /
K10bsu036_u:6445: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6446: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6447: sā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatyā ābhayā spharati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6448: tasyāṃ khalu punarvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati sma avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6449: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6458: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:6459: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ
K10bsu036_u:6461: - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6471: samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvayā kulaputra
K10bsu036_u:6475: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho hrasvakāyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6482: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre //
K10bsu036_u:6486: gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatabalādhānena tathāgatavikrīḍitena tathāgatavyūhena tathāgatābhyudgatajñānena
K10bsu036_u:6487: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmanuccalita eva tasmād buddhakṣetrādanutthitaścaiva tasmādāsanāt tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
K10bsu036_u:6488: yasya samādheḥ samanantarasamāpannasya gadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya atha tāvadeveha
K10bsu036_u:6489: sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gṛdhrakūṭe parvate tasya tathāgatadharmāsanasya purastāccaturaśītipadmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu036_u:6490: prādurbhūtānyabhūvan suvarṇadaṇḍāni rupyapatrāṇi padmakiṃśukarvaṇāni saṃdṛśyante sma //
K10bsu036_u:6491: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastaṃ padmavyūhaprādurbhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ
K10bsu036_u:6492: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yenemāni
K10bsu036_u:6495: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - eṣa mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmāddigbhāgādvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyā
K10bsu036_u:6498: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K10bsu036_u:6500: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kastena bhagavan kulaputreṇa kuśalasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6501: yena sa kuśalasaṃbhāreṇa kṛtenopacitena ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ?
K10bsu036_u:6504: tatra ya vayaṃ bhagavan samādhau carema /
K10bsu036_u:6505: taṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paśyema,
K10bsu036_u:6511: tatsādhu bhagavan karotu tathāgatastathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ yena nimittena saṃcoditaḥ samānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet
K10bsu036_u:6512: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6515: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet /
K10bsu036_u:6516: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtastasyāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6517: velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ prāduścakāragadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K10bsu036_u:6518: saṃcodanārtham - āgaccha kulaputra imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātum /
K10bsu036_u:6520: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya bhagavataḥ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya
K10bsu036_u:6521: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
K10bsu036_u:6523: vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyā lokadhātorantarhitaḥ imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati sma,
K10bsu036_u:6533: saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāramabhiruhya vaihāyase saptatālamātreṇa bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āgacchati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6536: upasaṃkramya tasmāt kūṭāgārādavatīrya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu036_u:6537: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya taṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavataḥ pūjākarmaṇe niryātayāmāsa /
K10bsu036_u:6539: bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati alpābādhatām ālpataṅkatāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6541: evaṃ ca sa bhagavānavocat - kaccitte bhagavan kṣamaṇīyam,
K10bsu036_u:6547: mā atīva dveṣacaritā mā atīva mohacaritā mā atīva bhagavan sattvā īrṣyālukā mā matsariṇo
K10bsu036_u:6548: mā amātṛjñā mā apitṛjñā mā aśrāmaṇya mā abrāhmaṇyā mā mithyādṛṣṭyo mā adāntacittā mā aguptendriyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6550: kaccid bhagavan prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgato dharmaśravaṇāya saptaratnamaye stūpe madhyagataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6551: taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ tathāgatarmahantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sa bhagavān paripṛcchati - kaccidbhagavaṃstasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kṣamaṇīyam,
K10bsu036_u:6554: vayamapi bhagavaṃstasya prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahaṃ paśyema /
K10bsu036_u:6555: tatsādhu bhagavān darśayatu tathāgatastasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātuvigrahamiti //
K10bsu036_u:6556: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ (Vaidya 247)
K10bsu036_u:6557: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvaro
K10bsu036_u:6558: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6560: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K10bsu036_u:6561: yatra hi nāma tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭukāmo 'bhyāgataḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6562: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāya śrāvaṇāya mañjuśriyaṃ ca kumārabhūtaṃ darśanāyeti //
K10bsu036_u:6563: atha khalu padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
K10bsu036_u:6565: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padmaśriyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6566: mahāsattvametadavocat - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani asaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare
K10bsu036_u:6568: tena kālena tena samayena meghadundubhisvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K10bsu036_u:6569: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
K10bsu036_u:6570: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān sarvarūpasaṃdarśanāyāṃ lokadhātau priyadarśane kalpe /
K10bsu036_u:6571: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10bsu036_u:6575: tatra kulaputra meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasya pravacane gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyamīdṛśī śrīḥ prāptā /
K10bsu036_u:6576: syāt khalu punaste kulaputra kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K10bsu036_u:6577: yena sā tasya bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
K10bsu036_u:6579: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu036_u:6581: ayameva sa kulaputra gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
K10bsu036_u:6582: yena sā tasya bhagavato meghadundubhisvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
K10bsu036_u:6584: evaṃ bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ kulaputra gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ bahubuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kṛtabuddhaparikarmā /
K10bsu036_u:6585: dṛṣṭapūrvāścānena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6586: paśyasi tvaṃ padmaśrīretaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
K10bsu036_u:6589: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu punaḥ padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahubhī rūpairimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6612: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6613: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra rūpasaṃdarśanairgadgadasvaro bodhisatvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6614: yāvat keṣāṃcid yakṣarūpeṇa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6618: keṣāṃcinmahoragarūpeṇa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6619: yāvannirayatiryagyoniyamalokākṣaṇopapannānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayaṃstrātā bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:6620: yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatānāmapi sattvānāṃ gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ strīrūpamabhinirmāya ima saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6621: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:6622: trātā khalvapi padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannānāṃ sattvānām /
K10bsu036_u:6623: tasyāṃ ca sahāyāṃ lokadhātāveva sa gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyadbhī rūpanimittairimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sattvānāṃ deśayati /
K10bsu036_u:6625: iyadbhiḥ kulaputra jñānāvabhāsairgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajñāyate /
K10bsu036_u:6633: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ khalu punaḥ padmaśrīrgadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6634: atha khalu padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - avaropitakuśalamūlo 'yaṃ bhagavan gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6635: katama eṣa bhagavan samādhiryasmin samādhāvavasthitena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyantaḥ sattvā vinītā iti?
K10bsu036_u:6636: evamukte bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padmaśriyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - eṣa hi kulaputra sarvarūpasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6637: asmin samādhāvavasthitena gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamaprameyaḥ sattvārthaḥ kṛtaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6638: asmin khalu punargadgadasvaraparivarte nirdiśyamāne yāni gadgadasvareṇa bodhisattvena
K10bsu036_u:6642: gaṇanāsamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ sarvarūpasaṃdarśanasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
K10bsu036_u:6643: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
K10bsu036_u:6644: samyaksaṃbuddhasya tasya ca bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
K10bsu036_u:6645: dhātustūpe vipulāṃ vistīrṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā punarapi saptaratnamaye kūṭāgāre 'bhiruhya
K10bsu036_u:6649: samabhigamya ca taṃ bhagavantaṃ kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - kṛto me bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvārthaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6650: tasya ca bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dhātustūpo dṛṣṭaḥ vanditaśca /
K10bsu036_u:6651: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato dṛṣṭo vanditaśca /
K10bsu036_u:6653: sa ca bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryabalabegaprāptaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6654: sa ca pradānaśūro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6655: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ caturaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarūpasaṃdarśanasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
K10bsu036_u:6656: asmin khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gamanāgamanaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe dvācatvāriṃśatāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:6657: padmaśriyaśca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya samādheḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
K10bsu036_u:6658: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye gadgadasvaraparivarto nāma trayoviṃśatimaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6661: atha khalu akṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
K10bsu036_u:6662: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:6663: - kena kāraṇena bhagavan avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvara ityucyate?
K10bsu036_u:6664: evamukte bhagavānakṣayamatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha kulaputra yāvanti sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni duḥkhāni pratyuanubhavanti,
K10bsu036_u:6665: tāni sacedavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6667: ye ca kulaputra sattvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:6669: sarve te avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā tasmānmahato 'gniskandhāt parimucyeran /
K10bsu036_u:6670: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sattvā nadībhiruhyamānā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryuḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6672: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sāgaramadhye vahanābhirūḍhānāṃ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ
K10bsu036_u:6674: kṛtanidhīnāṃ sa potasteṣāṃ kālikāvātena rākṣasīdvīpe kṣiptaḥ syāt,
K10bsu036_u:6675: tasmiṃśca kaścidevaikaḥ sattvaḥ syāt yo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:6677: anena khalu punaḥ kulaputra kāraṇena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvara iti saṃjñāyate //
K10bsu036_u:6678: sacet kulaputra kaścideva vadhyotsṛṣṭo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:6680: sacet khalu punaḥ kulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturyakṣarākṣasaiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:6681: te 'valokiteśvarasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena duṣṭacittā draṣṭumapyaśaktāḥ syuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6682: sacetkhalu punaḥ kulaputra kaścideva sattvo dārvāyasmayairhaḍinigaḍabandhanairbaddho bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:6684: tasyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena kṣipraṃ tāni haḍinigaḍabandhanāni vivaramanuprayacchanti /
K10bsu036_u:6685: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6686: sacetkulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturdhūrtairamitraiścauraiśca śastrapāṇibhiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
K10bsu036_u:6687: tasmiṃścaikaḥ sārthavāho mahāntaṃ sārthaṃ ratnāḍhyamanardhyaṃ gṛhītvā gacchet /
K10bsu036_u:6688: te gacchantastāṃścaurān dhūrtān śatrūṃśca śastrahastān paśyeyuḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6690: sa ca sārthavāhastaṃ sārthamevaṃ brūyāt - mā bhaiṣṭa kulaputrāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6694: atha khalu sarva eva sa sārthaḥ ekasvareṇa avalokiteśvaramākrandet - namo namastasmai abhayaṃdadāyāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāyeti (Vaidya 251)/
K10bsu036_u:6695: sahanāmagrahaṇenaiva sa sārthaḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimukto bhavet /
K10bsu036_u:6696: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6698: te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatarāgā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:6700: te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatadveṣā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:6702: te 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatamohā bhavanti /
K10bsu036_u:6703: evaṃ maharddhikaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6704: yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya putrakāmo mātṛgrāmo namaskāraṃ karoti,
K10bsu036_u:6705: tasya putraḥ prajāyate abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6708: tasya dārikā prajāyate abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatā dārikā - lakṣaṇasamanvāgatā bahujanapriyā manāpā avaropitakuśalabhūlā ca bhavati /
K10bsu036_u:6709: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6710: ye ca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:6713: yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:6715: yaśca dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ namaskāraṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:6717: yaśca tāvatāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāt,
K10bsu036_u:6718: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kiyantaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavet?
K10bsu036_u:6719: evamukte akṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - bahu bhagavan,
K10bsu036_u:6720: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahuṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavet /
K10bsu036_u:6721: bhagavānāha - yaśca kulaputra tāvatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvā puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6722: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antaśa ekamapi namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
K10bsu036_u:6724: yaśca teṣāṃ dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyāni ca dhārayet,
K10bsu036_u:6725: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
K10bsu036_u:6726: etāvubhau puṇyaskandhau na sukarau kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi /
K10bsu036_u:6727: evamaprameyaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadhāraṇāt puṇyam //
K10bsu036_u:6728: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau

K10bsu036_u:6737: keṣāṃcid brahmarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /

K10bsu036_u:6740: keṣāṃcid gandharvarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /

K10bsu036_u:6754: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - dāsyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dharmaprābhṛtaṃ dharmācchādam /
K10bsu036_u:6758: sma - pratīccha satpuruṣa imaṃ dharmācchādaṃ mamāntikāt /
K10bsu036_u:6760: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pratigṛhāṇa tvaṃ kulaputra imaṃ muktāhāramasmākamanukampāmupādāya
K10bsu036_u:6762: taṃ muktāhāraṃ pratigṛhṇāti sma akṣayamaterbodhisattvasya mahasattvasyānukampāmupādāya,
K10bsu036_u:6763: tāsāṃ ca catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ teṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāmanukampāmupādāya /

K10bsu036_u:6767: īdṛśyā kulaputra vikurvayā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuvicarati //
K10bsu036_u:6768: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

K10bsu036_u:6836: upapāduka te jinorasāḥ padmagarbheṣu niṣaṇṇa nirmalāḥ // Saddhp_24.31 //

K10bsu036_u:6838: siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇako śālarajo va yathā virājate // Saddhp_24.32 //

K10bsu036_u:6842: atha khalu dharaṇiṃdharo bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā
K10bsu036_u:6843: dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:6844: - na te bhagavan sattvāḥ avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:6848: asmin khalu punaḥ samantamukhaparivarte bhagavatā nirdeśyamāne tasyāḥ parṣadaścaturaśītināṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmasamasamāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannānyabhūvan //
K10bsu036_u:6852: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayāmāsa - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairyadāsīt
K10bsu036_u:6853: tena kālena tena samayena jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
K10bsu036_u:6854: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān priyadarśane kalpe vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau /
K10bsu036_u:6855: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya pravacane śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:6856: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya vimaladattā nāma bhāryābhūt /
K10bsu036_u:6857: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya dvau putrāvabhūtām - eko vimalagarbho nāma,
K10bsu036_u:6860: prajñāvantau ca puṇyavantau ca jñānavantau ca bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ ca abhiyuktāvabhūtām /
K10bsu036_u:6863: maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāmupekṣāyāṃ yāvat saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu /
K10bsu036_u:6871: sa ca bhagavāṃstena kālena tena samayena imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayāmāsa teṣāṃ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
K10bsu036_u:6873: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako yena svamātā janayitrī,
K10bsu036_u:6875: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya janayitrīmetadavocatām ehyamba gamiṣyāvastasya
K10bsu036_u:6882: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6885: evamukte kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā vimalagarbhaṃ dārakaṃ vimalanetraṃ ca dārakametadavocat - eṣa khalu kulaputrau yuvayoḥ pitā rājā śubhavyūho brāhmaṇeṣvabhiprasannaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6887: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - mithyādṛṣṭikule 'sminnāvāṃ jātau?
K10bsu036_u:6889: atha khalu kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā tau dvau dārakāvetadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputrau (Vaidya 259)/
K10bsu036_u:6890: yuvāṃ tasya svapitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai kiṃcideva prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayatam /
K10bsu036_u:6892: prasannacittaśca asmākamanujānīyāt tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhigantum
K10bsu036_u:6893: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ
K10bsu036_u:6894: vaihāyasamabhyudgamya tasya pitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai buddhānujñātāni yamakāni
K10bsu036_u:6903: tau tasminnevākāśe mahāntau bhūtvā khuḍḍakau bhavataḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6908: iyadbhiḥ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā ṛddhiprātihāryaistābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sa śubhavyūho rājā svapitā vinītaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6909: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastayordārakayostamṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā
K10bsu036_u:6910: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto daśanakhamañjaliṃ
K10bsu036_u:6911: pragṛhya tau dārakāvetadavocat - ko yuvayoḥ kulaputrau śāstā,
K10bsu036_u:6913: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau taṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat - eṣa sa
K10bsu036_u:6915: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati ratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6916: sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
K10bsu036_u:6919: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastau dārakāvetadavocat - paśyāmo vayaṃ kulaputrau taṃ yuvayoḥ śāstāram /
K10bsu036_u:6921: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau tato 'ntarīkṣādavatīrya yena svamātā janayitrī tenopasaṃkrāmatām /
K10bsu036_u:6922: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām - eṣa āvābhyāmamba vinītaḥ svapitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K10bsu036_u:6925: āvāṃ tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe pravrajiṣyāva iti //
K10bsu036_u:6926: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣatām -
K10bsu036_u:6928: āvāṃ vai pravrajiṣyāvo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ // Saddhp_25.1 //
K10bsu036_u:6934: vayaṃ pi pravrajiṣyāmo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ // Saddhp_25.3 //
K10bsu036_u:6936: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakāvime gāthe bhāṣitvā tau mātāpitarāvetadavocatām - sādhu amba tāta eta /
K10bsu036_u:6937: vayaṃ sarve sahitā bhūtvā gamiṣyāmastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam /
K10bsu036_u:6938: upasaṃkramiṣyāmastaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya /
K10bsu036_u:6943: tasmāttarhi amba tāta paramapuṇyopastabdhā vayamīdṛśe pravacane upapannāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6946: tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāvaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6947: durlabhaṃ hi amba tāta tathāgatānāṃ darśanam /
K10bsu036_u:6951: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ samayena tasya rājñaḥ śūbhavyūhasya antaḥpurāccaturaśītirantaḥpurikāsahasrāṇi asya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya bhājanabhutānyabhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:6953: vimalagarbhaśca dārako bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasattvapāpajahane samādhau carito 'bhūt kimiti sarvasattvāḥ sarvapāpaṃ jaheyuriti
K10bsu036_u:6954: sā ca tayordārakayormātā vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvabuddhasaṃgītiṃ sarvabuddhadharmaguhyasthānāni ca saṃjānīte sma /
K10bsu036_u:6955: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ tathāgataśāsane vinītaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6958: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya
K10bsu036_u:6959: putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ
K10bsu036_u:6963: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ //
K10bsu036_u:6965: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā
K10bsu036_u:6967: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ (Vaidya 261)
K10bsu036_u:6968: saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya saputrasvajanaparivāraḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6970: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6972: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6973: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan /
K10bsu036_u:6974: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma /
K10bsu036_u:6977: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
K10bsu036_u:6978: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ /
K10bsu036_u:6983: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,
K10bsu036_u:6985: evamukte bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat - evametanmahārāja,
K10bsu036_u:6987: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
K10bsu036_u:6991: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau?
K10bsu036_u:6994: bhagavānāha - etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānḥṃ tathḥgatḥnḥmarhatḥṃ samyaksaṃbuddhḥnḥmantike pūjḥṃ kariṣyataḥ,
K10bsu036_u:6995: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyḥyaṃ dhḥrayiṣyataḥ sattvḥnḥmanukampḥyai,
K10bsu036_u:6997: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ
K10bsu036_u:7000: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ - kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,
K10bsu036_u:7003: sā ca samasahitā dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati,
K10bsu036_u:7006: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ
K10bsu036_u:7009: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam,
K10bsu036_u:7012: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7015: na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7016: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato 'ntikamupasaṃkramitum /
K10bsu036_u:7017: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt //
K10bsu036_u:7018: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe 'kṣaipsīt /
K10bsu036_u:7019: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ
K10bsu036_u:7021: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma /
K10bsu036_u:7022: atha khalu rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyaitadabhavat - mahānubhāvamidaṃ buddhajñānam,
K10bsu036_u:7024: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ //
K10bsu036_u:7026: parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ
K10bsu036_u:7029: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:7030: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau /
K10bsu036_u:7032: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:7034: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7036: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?
K10bsu036_u:7037: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu036_u:7039: ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut /
K10bsu036_u:7040: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma (Vaidya 263)
K10bsu036_u:7042: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu036_u:7044: ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut /
K10bsu036_u:7045: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato 'bhūt /
K10bsu036_u:7046: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
K10bsu036_u:7047: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K10bsu036_u:7049: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām /
K10bsu036_u:7050: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
K10bsu036_u:7054: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena //
K10bsu036_u:7055: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham //
K10bsu036_u:7056: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:7059: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ
K10bsu036_u:7060: sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prakampadbhiḥ kṣetrai pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ pravādyamānaistūryakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7061: mahatā bodhisattvānubhāvena mahatyā bodhisattvavikurvayā mahatyā bodhisattvaddharyā
K10bsu036_u:7062: mahata bodhisattvamāhātmyena mahatā bodhisattvasamāhitena mahatā bodhisattvatejasā jājvalyamānena,
K10bsu036_u:7066: puraskṛtaḥ evamacintyairṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
K10bsu036_u:7068: sa yenagṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājaḥ yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
K10bsu036_u:7069: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantametadavocat
K10bsu036_u:7070: - ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bhagavato ratnatejobhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādihāgataḥ
K10bsu036_u:7071: iha bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo deśyata iti /
K10bsu036_u:7073: amūni ca bhagavannetāvanti bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāyāgatāni /
K10bsu036_u:7074: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍārīkaṃ dharmaparyāyameṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa
K10bsu036_u:7075: evamukte bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - uddhaṭitajñā hi kulaputra ete bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7076: api tvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo yaduta asaṃbhinnatathatā /
K10bsu036_u:7079: atha khalu yāstasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāśca saṃnipatitāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7080: tāsāṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ punarapi bhagavān samantabhadraṃ
K10bsu036_u:7081: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya
K10bsu036_u:7082: mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7089: ebhiḥ kulaputra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:7090: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan
K10bsu036_u:7091: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ
K10bsu036_u:7096: yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate /
K10bsu036_u:7097: na māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate,
K10bsu036_u:7098: na māraputrā na mārakāyikā devaputrā na mārakanyā na mārapārṣadyā yāvanna bhūyo māraparyutthito bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7099: na devaputrā na yakṣā na pretā na pūtanā na kṛtyā na vetālāstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
K10bsu036_u:7100: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasya satatasamitaṃ nityakālaṃ rakṣāṃ (Vaidya 265) kariṣyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:7101: yadā ca sa dharmabhāṇako 'smin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktaścaṃkramābhirūḍho bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:7102: tadāhaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike śvetaṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya tasya
K10bsu036_u:7104: yadā punastasya dharmabhāṇakasya asmin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktasya sataḥ ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaḥ padavyañjanaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:7105: tadāhaṃ tasmin śvetaṣaḍdante gajarāje 'bhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya saṃmukhamupadarśayitvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ pratyuccārayiṣyāmi
K10bsu036_u:7106: sa ca dharmabhāṇako mamātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā imaṃ ca dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ mamāntikācchrutvā
K10bsu036_u:7107: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
K10bsu036_u:7108: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
K10bsu036_u:7113: ye ca bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhikṣavo vā bhikṣūṇyo
K10bsu036_u:7114: vā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakā evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakā evaṃ sūtrāntamārgakā
K10bsu036_u:7115: evaṃ sūtrāntavācakā ye paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāmasmin dharmaparyāye
K10bsu036_u:7118: tameva śvetaṃ ṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ ekaviṃśatime divase teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ caṃkramamāgamiṣyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:7119: āgatya ca tān dharmabhāṇakān parisaṃharṣayiṣyāmi samādāpayiṣyāmi samuttejayiṣyāmi saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:7121: yathā te dharmabhāṇakā na kenaciddharṣaṇīyā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7122: na caiṣāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ lapsyante,
K10bsu036_u:7128: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan dharmabhāṇakānāmimāni dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi /
K10bsu036_u:7130: adaṇḍe daṇḍapati daṇḍāvartani daṇḍakuśale daṇḍasudhāri sudhārapati buddhapaśyane
K10bsu036_u:7131: sarvadhāraṇi āvartani saṃvartani saṃghaparīkṣite saṃghanirghātani dharmaparīkṣite
K10bsu036_u:7132: sarvasattvarutakauśalyānugate siṃhavikrīḍite anuvarte vartani vartāli svāhā //
K10bsu036_u:7133: imāni tāni bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyasyāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:7135: ayaṃ ca bhagavan saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracaramāṇo yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hastagato bhaviṣyati,
K10bsu036_u:7136: tairbhagavan dharmabhāṇakairevaṃ veditavyam - samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānubhāvena
K10bsu036_u:7137: yadasmākamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā /
K10bsu036_u:7139: mahāsattvasya caryāyāste bhagavan sattvā lābhino bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7146: likhitvā ca te bhagavannidaṃ sūtramitaścyutvā trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāya upapatsyante,
K10bsu036_u:7148: bherīmātreṇa mukuṭena te devaputrāstāsāmapsarasāṃ madhye sthāsyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7149: īdṛśaḥ kulaputrā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā puṇyaskandhaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7150: kaḥ punarvādo ye etamuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti manasi kariṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7151: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo likhitavyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7160: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ paṇḍitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ satkṛtya likhitavyaḥ satkṛtyoddeṣṭavyaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7163: imaṃ kulaputrā dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā uddiśya svādhyāyitvā bhāvayitvā manasikṛtvā evamaprameyā guṇā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7164: tasmāttarhi tena paṇḍitena bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7167: yathā bhagavan mamādhiṣṭhānena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracariṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:7168: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samantabhadrāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu samantabhadra,
K10bsu036_u:7169: yatra hi nāma tvamevaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya pratipannaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7173: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:7175: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikācchrutaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7178: anumoditaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhaviṣyati śākyamuninā ca tathāgatena teṣāṃ mūrdhni pāṇiḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7180: tathāgataśāsanaparigrāhakāśca te samantabhadra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro (Vaidya 267)
K10bsu036_u:7184: na nṛttakā na mallā na nartakā na śauṇḍikaurabhrikakaukkuṭikasaukarikastrīpoṣakāḥ sattvāsteṣāmabhirucitā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu036_u:7185: īdṛśāṃśca sūtrāntān śrutvā likhitvā dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā na teṣāmanyadabhirucitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7192: na dveṣo na moho nerṣyā na mātsaryaṃ na mrakṣo na māno nādhimāno na mithyāmānaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7194: yaḥ samantabhadra paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ
K10bsu036_u:7202: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:7208: ya evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mohaṃ dāsyanti,
K10bsu036_u:7211: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme kāyaścitro bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu036_u:7221: ye īdṛśānāṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāṃ sūtrāntavācakānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ ca sūtrāntadeśakānāṃ ca apriyāṃ vācaṃ bhūtāmabhūtāṃ vā saṃśrāvayiṣyanti,
K10bsu036_u:7223: tasmāttarhi samantabhadra asya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dūrata eva pratyutthātavyam /
K10bsu036_u:7225: tathā teṣāmeva sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāmevaṃ gauravaṃ kartavyam //
K10bsu036_u:7226: asmin khalu punaḥ samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarte nirdiśyamāne gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
K10bsu036_u:7227: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ //
K10bsu036_u:7230: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utthāya tasmāddharmāsanāt
K10bsu036_u:7231: sarvāṃstān bodhisattvāan piṇḍīkṛtya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ṛddhayabhisaṃskārapariniṣpannena
K10bsu036_u:7233: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipāmi /
K10bsu036_u:7236: dvaitīyakamapi traitīyakamapi bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇināadhyālambyaitadavocat
K10bsu036_u:7238: yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi nikṣipāmi upanikṣipami /
K10bsu036_u:7239: yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputra udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā deśayitavyā prakāśayitavyā /
K10bsu036_u:7241: amātsaryo 'haṃ kulaputrā aparigṛhītacitto viśārado buddhajñānasya dātā,
K10bsu036_u:7245: amatsaribhirbhūtvemaṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanaṃ mahopāyakauśalyamāgatānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃśrāvayitavyaḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7246: ye ca aśrāddhāḥ sattvāste 'smin dharmaparyāye samādāpayitavyāḥ /
K10bsu036_u:7247: evaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ kulaputrāstathāgatānāṃ pratikāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati //
K10bsu036_u:7248: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan /
K10bsu036_u:7249: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ
K10bsu036_u:7250: praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa
K10bsu036_u:7251: bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - tathā bhagavan
K10bsu036_u:7257: traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī /
K10bsu036_u:7258: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati /
K10bsu036_u:7260: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma /
K10bsu036_u:7261: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma - yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
K10bsu036_u:7262: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa /
K10bsu036_u:7266: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7267: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7268: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo 'bhyudgatāḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7269: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
K10bsu036_u:7271: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye 'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ // * * * * * *
K10bsu036_u:7272: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K10bsu036_u:7273: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
